炼猪油
liàn zhūyóu 
boil down fat to get lard
猪油渣儿
zhūyóuzhār
cracklings
猪油已经凝住了
The tracks were occasionally lubricated with lard.
Zhèxiē guǐdào yǒushíhòu yòng zhūyóu lái rùnhuá。
这些轨道有时候用猪油来润滑。
Lard was also used, though its congener, butter, was more frequently employed.
Hái shǐyòngle zhūyóu，suīrán gèng cháng shǐyòng de shì tā de tónglèi，jí huángyóu。
还使用了猪油，虽然更常使用的是它的同类，即黄油。
猪下水
zhūxiàshui
pig\'s tripe and chitterlings
猪头肉
zhūtóuròu 
pieces of meat cut from a pig\'s head served as a cold dish to go with drinks
他家养活了上百头猪。
Tā jiā yǎnghuo le shàngbǎi tóu zhū。
His family raises nearly a hundred pigs.
这头猪已经长得滚瓜溜圆，来年就能出栏了。
Zhè tóu zhū yǐjing zhǎng de gǔnguā liūyuán，láinián jiùnéng chūlán le。
The pig is already round and fat, and will be ready for slaughter next year.
他家养了一头阉猪，明天要宰杀了。
Tā jiā yǎng le yì tóu yānzhū，míngtiān yào zǎishā le。
He keeps a hog, which is to be killed tomorrow.
一直到快过年了，它还只是一头壳郎猪，没法拿到集市上卖。
Yìzhí dào kuài guònián le，tā hái zhǐshì yì tóu kélángzhū，méifǎ nádào jíshìshàng mài。
As New Year approached, it was still a feeder pig and couldn\'t be sold in the market.
猪头。
这头猪吃口还好，不会有大病。
这头猪可以出栏了。
这头猪毛估不少于100公斤。
那头猪精瘦。
One of my sows has a litter about three days old.
Wǒ de yìtóu mǔzhū shēng de jǐtóu xiǎo zhū yǒu sāntiān dà le。
我的一头母猪生的几头小猪有三天大了。
She kept five pigs, which rambled loose but evidently knew her voice.
Tā yǎngle wǔ tóu zhū，tāmen dàochù liūda，dànshì xiǎnrán shúxī tā de shēngyīn。
她养了五头猪，它们到处溜达，但是显然熟悉她的声音。
The pig was rooting for truffles.
Zhè tóu zhū bùtíng de gǒngtǔ xúnzhǎo kuàijūn。
这头猪不停地拱土寻找块菌。
The farmer killed a pig for the holidays.
Zhè míng nóngfū wèi guòjié zǎishāle yì tóu zhū。
这名农夫为过节宰杀了一头猪。
The pig nuzzled the truffle.
Zhè tóu zhū gǒngtǔ xúnzhǎo kuàijūn。
这头猪拱土寻找块菌。
He\'s a veritable swine.
Tā zhēnshì tóu zhū！
他真是头猪！
猪肉松
zhūròusōng
dried minced pork
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
这块猪肉里有肉枣，不能食用了。
Zhèkuài zhūròu lǐ yǒu ròuzǎo，bùnéng shíyòng le。
The pork has toxic lymph nodes in it. It can\'t be eaten.
这道菜是阉猪肉做的，你尝尝鲜。
Zhè dào cài shì yānzhūròu zuò de，nǐ chángcháng xiān。
This dish is made of hog meat, have a try!
过去新鲜的猪肉吃不完，妈妈就腌肉保鲜。
Guòqù xīnxiān de zhūròu chībùwán，māma jiù yānròu bǎoxiān。
Last year my mother preserved the meat that we had left.
猪肉
zhūròu
pork
猪头肉
zhūtóuròu 
pieces of meat cut from a pig\'s head served as a cold dish to go with drinks
小型肉猪
xiǎoxíng ròuzhū
small hog; light porker
中型肉猪
zhōngxíng ròuzhū
medium porker
猪肉
伊斯兰教忌食猪肉
猪肉烩酸菜
The pig, say its supporters, has many other fine attributes in addition to its meat.
Zhīchí yǎngzhū de rén shuō，chúle zhūròu zhī wài，zhū shēnshàng háiyǒu hěnduō qítā kě lìyòng de dōngxi。
支持养猪的人说，除了猪肉之外，猪身上还有很多其他可利用的东西。
This dish sounds delicious, fried pork on a bed of roasted vegetables.
这道菜听起来就觉得好吃，它是把炸过的猪肉放在烤蔬菜下面。
They expect an increase in the price of pork due to cases of disease.
由于发现了多例病猪，他们预计猪肉价格将会上涨。
We had a pork sausages for lunch.
我们午餐吃了猪肉香肠。
Take the pepper and rub onto pork ten minutes prior to grilling.
烤前十分钟，把胡椒抹到猪肉上。
Of all kinds of meat, my preference is pork.
所有肉类里，我更喜欢猪肉。
At 6pm, I gorged myself on some rather fatty belly of pork.
Zài zǎoshang 6 diǎn，wǒ chīle yìxiē bǐjiào féi de zhūròu。
在早上6点，我吃了一些比较肥的猪肉。
I usually eat barbeque pork on the weekends.
Wǒ zhōumò tōngcháng chī kǎo zhūròu。
我周末通常吃烤猪肉。
Increase oven heat to crisp the pork for about twenty minutes.
Tígāo kǎoxiāng rèliàng，jiāng zhūròu kǎo èrshí fēnzhōng，ràng tā biàncuì。
提高烤箱热量，将猪肉烤20分钟，让它变脆。
It is a finely ground mixture of pork and beef with a comparatively bland seasoning.
Zhè shì yì zhǒng zhūròu hé niúròu yǔ yì zhǒng xiāngduì qīngdàn de tiáowèijì yánmó ér chéng de hùnhéwù。
这是一种猪肉和牛肉与一种相对清淡的调味剂研磨而成的混合物。
猪排
They are having a special on pork chops.
Tāmen zhèngzài xiǎngshòu yí dào zhūpái tè cān。
他们正在享受一道猪排特餐。
Bread the pork chops before frying them.
Zhá zhūpái qián xiān zài shàngmiàn sǎ yìdiǎn miànbāo suìxiè。
炸猪排前先在上面撒一点面包碎屑。
这家厂今年的生猪出栏率比去年增长不少。
Zhèjiā chǎng jīnnián de shēngzhū chūlánlǜ bǐ qùnián zēngzhǎng bùshǎo。
There has been an increase in the percentage of pigs available for slaughter in this factory this year.
这头猪已经长得滚瓜溜圆，来年就能出栏了。
Zhè tóu zhū yǐjing zhǎng de gǔnguā liūyuán，láinián jiùnéng chūlán le。
The pig is already round and fat, and will be ready for slaughter next year.
一直到快过年了，它还只是一头壳郎猪，没法拿到集市上卖。

As New Year approached, it was still a feeder pig and couldn\'t be sold in the market.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
猪狗不如。
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
猪狗不如。
收生猪的人要来之前，广大的养猪户都忙着抓膘。
Shōu shēngzhū de rén yào lái zhīqián，guǎngdà de yǎngzhūhù dōu máng zhe zhuābiāo。
All the pig farmers are busy fattening their pigs before the pig purchaser comes.
白条猪
báitiáozhū 
pig carcass
猪肝据说能补血。
Zhūgān jùshuō néngbǔxiě。
Pork liver is said to be a blood-builder.
养猪不独可以改善人民生活，还能多积肥料。
Yǎngzhū bùdú kěyǐ gǎishàn rénmín shēnghuó，hái néngduō jī féiliào。
Pig-breeding not only improves the people\'s diet, it makes more manure available.
大白猪产仔了。
Dà báizhū chǎnzǎi le。
The big white sow is farrowing.
别饿着小猪。
Bié èzhe xiǎozhū。

猪鬃
zhūzōng
(hog) bristles
过不了几天这只母猪就要产崽了。
Guòbùliǎo jǐtiān zhèzhī mǔzhū jiùyào chǎnzǎi le。
This sow will give birth in a few days.
这家厂今年的生猪出栏率比去年增长不少。

There has been an increase in the percentage of pigs available for slaughter in this factory this year.
给猪喂精饲料可以催膘。
Gěi zhū wèi jīngsìliào kěyǐ cuībiāo。
Giving pigs fine feed can fatten them up.
这些猪的胴体要送到工厂去加工。
Zhèxiē zhū de dòngtǐ yào sòng dào gōngchǎng qù jiāgōng。
These dead pigs are to be transported to factories for processing.
这些都是豆猪，坚决不能卖杀。
Zhèxiē dōushì dòuzhū，jiānjué bùnéng mài shā。
These pigs have bean-sized cysts inside their bodies, so they cannot be sold.
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
《西游记》中，猪八戒总是爱偷吃供果。
《Xīyóujì》zhōng，zhūbājiè zǒngshì ài tōuchī gòngguǒ。
In Journey to the west, Zhubajie always eats the fruit that he steals from offerings.
这头猪已经长得滚瓜溜圆，来年就能出栏了。
Zhè tóu zhū yǐjing zhǎng de gǔnguā liūyuán，láinián jiùnéng chūlán le。
The pig is already round and fat, and will be ready for slaughter next year.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
这只架子猪就差往身上催膘了。
Zhèzhī jiàzizhū jiù chà wǎng shēnshàng cuībiāo le。
The feeder pig is waiting to be fattened up.
中枪的野猪挣扎了一会后就僵卧在地上，一动不动了。
Zhòngqiāng de yězhū zhēngzā le yíhuì hòu jiù jiāngwòzàidìshàng，yídòng búdòng le。
The wild boar lay stiff and rigid after being shot.
一直到快过年了，它还只是一头壳郎猪，没法拿到集市上卖。
Yìzhí dào kuài guònián le，tā hái zhǐshì yì tóu kélángzhū，méifǎ nádào jíshìshàng mài。
As New Year approached, it was still a feeder pig and couldn\'t be sold in the market.
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
由于这批饲料的质量太差，养殖场的猪都落膘了。
Yóuyú zhè pī sìliào de zhìliàng tài chà，yǎngzhíchǎng de zhū dōu luòbiāo le。
The pigs in the pig farm became thin due to the poor quality of the feedstuff.
经过检验这些都是米猪，不能继续出售了。
Jīngguò jiǎnyàn zhèxiē dōushì mǐzhū，bùnéng jìxù chūshòu le。
After examination, these pigs are all infested with cysticercus , and can no longer be sold.
这块猪肉里有肉枣，不能食用了。
Zhèkuài zhūròu lǐ yǒu ròuzǎo，bùnéng shíyòng le。
The pork has toxic lymph nodes in it. It can\'t be eaten.
我从山上采了些苕子回家喂猪。
Wǒ cóng shān shàng cǎi le xiē sháozi huíjiā wèizhū。
I\'ve collected some Chinese trumpet creepers to feed the pigs.
他衣服上有血渍，估计是杀猪的时候弄的。
Tā yīfu shàng yǒu xuèzì，gūjì shì shāzhū de shíhou nòng de。
There are some bloodstains on his clothes. They must be from the pig butchering.
他家养了一头阉猪，明天要宰杀了。
Tā jiā yǎng le yì tóu yānzhū，míngtiān yào zǎishā le。
He keeps a hog, which is to be killed tomorrow.
这道菜是阉猪肉做的，你尝尝鲜。
Zhè dào cài shì yānzhūròu zuò de，nǐ chángcháng xiān。
This dish is made of hog meat, have a try!
过去新鲜的猪肉吃不完，妈妈就腌肉保鲜。
Guòqù xīnxiān de zhūròu chībùwán，māma jiù yānròu bǎoxiān。
Last year my mother preserved the meat that we had left.
张勇每天一大早就到山上刈草喂猪。
Zhāng Yǒng měitiān yídàzǎo jiù dào shān shàng yìcǎo wèizhū。
Every day in the early morning, Zhang Yong goes to the mountain and mows grass to feed the pigs.
她说自己最讨厌吃猪肚儿了。
Tā shuō zìjǐ zuì tǎoyàn chī zhūdùr le。
She said that she hated to eat pork tripe most.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
他虽然是个猪倌儿，却很有钱呢！
Tā suīrán shì gè zhūguānr，què hěn yǒu qián ne！
Though he is a swineherd, he is very rich.
无家可归的他只好睡在猪栏里。
Wújiā kěguī de tā zhǐhǎo shuìzài zhūlán lǐ。
Being homeless, he has no choice but to sleep in a pigsty.
你看看他，真是个猪脑袋！
Nǐ kànkàn tā，zhēnshì gè zhū nǎodài！
Look at him, what a fool!
猪娃可真能吃！
Zhūwá kě zhēn néngchī！
The piglets eat so much!
他呀，早被人拐骗到外国做猪仔去了！
Tā ya，zǎo bèi rén guǎipiàn dào wàiguó zuò zhūzǎi qù le！
Long ago, he was abducted to labor in foreign countries.
这些小猪崽太可爱了！
Zhèxiē xiǎozhūzǎi tài kě\'ài le！
These piglets are so cute!
这把扫帚是由野猪的鬃毛制成的。
Zhèbǎ sàozhou shì yóu yězhū de zōngmáo zhìchéng de。
This broom is made of wild boars\'hair.
养猪是最好的家庭副业，是农民致富的好帮手。
Yǎngzhū shì zuìhǎo de jiātíng fùyè，shì nóngmín zhìfù de hǎobāngshǒu。
Raising pigs is the best household sideline and a good way of making money for farmers.

Their devotion to each other was beautiful.
Tāmen bǐcǐ shēn àizhe duìfāng，zhè ràng rén gǎnjué tài měi le。

hòucǐbóbǐ

品学兼优
pǐn xué jiān yōu 
(of a student) of good character and scholarship; (of a person) of integrity and learning
他是个品学兼优的好孩子。
Tā shì gè pǐnxué jiānyōu de hǎo háizi。
He is a child outstanding in both morality and learning.
他品学兼优，第一批加入了青年团。
Tā pǐnxué jiānyōu，dìyī pī jiārù le qīngniántuán。
He was outstanding both in morality and learning, and was one of the first group to join the Communist Youth League.
他因品学兼优被选入团校进一步学习。
Tā yīn pǐnxué jiānyōu bèi xuǎnrù tuánxiào jìnyíbùxuéxí。
Thanks to his excellent performance in both morals and study, he was picked up to go on to further study in the CYL school.
他品学兼优，所以老师经常在各种场合揄扬他。
Tā pǐnxué jiānyōu，suǒyǐ lǎoshī jīngcháng zài gèzhǒng chǎnghé yúyáng tā。
He is good both in his studies and in his character; therefore, his teachers always praise him in different situations.

兼职过多
jiānzhí guò duō
hold too many posts at the same time
辞去兼职
cíqù jiānzhí 
resign one\'s concurrent job
聘请一位工程师担任技校兼职教师
pìnqǐngyí wèi gōngchéngshī dānrèn jìxiào jiānzhí jiàoshī
get an engineer to act as a part-time teacher in the technical school
做兼职的前提是应先做好自己的本业。
Zuò jiānzhí de qiántí shì yīng xiān zuòhǎo zìjǐ de běnyè。
The precondition of doing part time jobs is to fulfill one’s primary occupation first.
他除了上班之外还能抽空儿做兼职捞外快。
Tā chú le shàngbān zhīwài hái néng chōukòngr zuò jiānzhí lāo wàikuài。
Besides his work, he makes extra income from moonlighting.
由于兼职太多，他终于累垮了。
Yóuyú jiānzhí tàiduō，tā zhōngyú lèikuǎle.
Because he had too many jobs, he eventually collapsed with exhaustion.

Tā hái jì le běn hòuzhàng，jiù suǒzài chōutì lǐ。

他把这几天的行程，记了一篇流水帐。
Tā bǎ zhè jǐtiān de xíngchéng，jì le yì piān liúshuǐzhàng。
He wrote a journal account of the journey of these days.
他每天都要记上一笔流水帐。
Tā měitiān dōuyào jì shàng yìbǐ liúshuǐzhàng。
He keeps a daily account every day.
to keep books of account
在帐本上记帐
Since we didn\'t have any cash, we charged the meals.
Yīnwèi méi dài xiànjīn，zhè dùn fàn wǒmen zhǐhǎo jìzhàng。
因为没带现金，这顿饭我们只好记帐。
Many bills were entered against his account.
许多帐单被记入他的帐户。
to keep an account of sales
记销售帐

我要归还一笔2000美元的整款，而把余款记到下一笔帐上。
Investments in debt obligations usually are maintained in the accounts at cost until they are sold or mature.
债权投资在帐户中以成本记录，直到出售或到期。

持卡人必须要年满18周岁，银行才可以发放银行担保卡和支票簿，来作为活期帐户方案的一部分。
He drew fifty pounds from his savings account.
他从活期帐户上取走了50英镑。

帐目核对无误

check the accounts
查对帐目
The accounts check.
帐目核对无误
On a windy day, guy ropes are needed to hold the tent upright.

呆帐

查克帮我支了帐篷。

总裁将出席下次会议。

我致电以表达我的赞赏，并向贵方总裁致以敬意。

由于公司亏损经营，总裁决定重组管理层。

新任总裁在讲话中说：“安全第一”。
The central point of his argument were flaws in the president\'s speech.
他的主要意思就是说总裁的讲话中存在着几处漏洞。
The HR manager has gained the trust of both the president and the labor union.
这位人力经理已经获得了总裁和工会的信任。
The president of the company has approved a corporate budget of two million dollars.
公司总裁批准了两百万美元的公司预算。

总裁让所有员工十分钟后在大厅集合。

他的职务调动是公司总裁亲自指定的。

他是个两面派的下属,他懂得如何向总裁阿谀谄媚。

你自荐当选总裁是不明智的。
He is a white-haired boy of the president.
他是总裁的大红人。
He\'s absolutely nothing like the president.
Tā wánquán bú xiàng zǒngcái。
他完全不像总裁。
The chairman of the company told the salesmen to move the computers.

She was vice-presidential material.

她有能力担任副总裁。
The chairman resigned when he was found to have misappropriated funds.

总裁被发现挪用资金以后辞职了。
The president\'s resignation was the result of a turf war with the board of directors.
Nàgè zǒngcái de cízhí shì yǔ dǒngshìhuì zhēngquán de jiéguǒ。
那个总裁的辞职是与董事会争权的结果。
The president of the company never manages to get away during the summer.

The track record shows that he will be a good president.

法律制裁
fǎlǜ zhìcái
legal sanction
用经济制裁来卡别国的脖子
yòngjīngjì zhìcái lái qiǎ bié guó de bózi
apply economic sanctions against another country in an attempt to force it into submission
受法律制裁
shòu fǎlǜ zhìcái
be dealt with according to law
不法分子逃脱不了法律的制裁。
Bùfǎ fènzǐ táotuō bùliǎo fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
The lawbreakers will never escape punishment according to law.
予以制裁
yǔyǐ zhìcái 
mete out punishment to sb.; apply sanctions against sb.
制裁
zhìcái
sanction; punish
无论你有什么理由，触法就要受到法律的制裁。
Wúlùn nǐ yǒu shénme lǐyóu，chùfǎ jiùyào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
Regardless of your excuse, you have violated the war and will be judged accordingly.
他最终一定会受到法律制裁。
Tā zuì zhōng yídìng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
He is certain to be punished by the law.
法律早晚会制裁你们这些人渣的。
Fǎlǜ zǎowǎn huì zhìcái nǐmen zhèxiē rénzhā de。
Sooner or later the law will punish scum like you.
私吞集体财产终究会得到法律的制裁！
Sītūn jítǐ cáichǎn zhōng jiū huì dédào fǎlǜ de zhìcái！
He who appropriates collective goods will be punished by the law!
他如此贪贿无厌，终会受到法律制裁的。
Tā rúcǐ tānhuì wúyàn，zhōng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái de。
His greediness for material comforts will one day bring him to justice.
这些贪污腐化的官员都受到了应有的制裁。
Zhèxiē tānwū fǔhuà de guānyuán dōu shòudào le yīngyǒu de zhìcái。
These government officials led a dissipated life and have all been subjected to the punishment they deserve.
偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。
Tōuyùn wéijìn wùpǐn de xíngwéi，yào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
对异性进行性侵犯会受到法律制裁。
Duì yìxìng jìnxíng xìng qīnfàn huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
Those who sexually harrass the opposite sex will be punished by the law.
有些政治犯为躲避本国的法律制裁，到别国寻求政治避难。
Yǒuxiē zhèngzhìfàn wèi duǒbì běnguó de fǎlǜ zhìcái，dào biéguó xúnqiú zhèngzhì bìnàn。
Some political criminals went to other countries as political refuges to escape from their own countries\' legal punishments.

Fǎlǜzhìcái
legal sanctions

The tailor’s wonderful skills attracted a lot of customers.
对于他的裁制控制，大家都很不满。

Discontent was common because the use of punishment to control.
既然提倡民主，就不能以独裁手段压制清议。

Now that we advocate democracy, we shouldn\'t despotically suppress political criticism.
这条裁绒地毯是手工制作的。
Zhè tiáo cáiróng dìtǎn shì shǒugōng zhìzuò de。
This synthetic tuft carpet is made by hand.
制裁
制裁。
这种残虐行为要受法律制裁。
对这种赤裸裸的敲诈行径，必须依法制裁
逃脱不了法律的制裁。
吞蚀公物应受法律制裁。
凶狂的偷猎者终于受到制裁。
严厉制裁。
外交制裁。
裁制。
按标样裁剪、制作。
the bar of public opinion
舆论制裁
held down by harsh laws
因受严厉的法律制裁而败落
the tribunal of popular sentiment
舆论的制裁
sanctions against
对…的制裁
to impose sanctions (on {or} against)
（对…）实施制裁
People evading taxes will be disciplined by the law.
逃税的人会受到法律的制裁。
The committee placed economic sanctions on the country.
委员会对这个国家实行了经济制裁。

Tā bù lǐhuì xǔduō píngcháng shùfù fùnǚ shēnghuó de kòngzhì hé zhìcái。
她不理会许多平常束缚妇女生活的控制和制裁。
Not everything that falls under this heading is a sanctioned prohibition.

并非归入这个标题下的每一条都要受制裁受处罚。
Nearly always they have protectors in high places to help them escape the arm of the law.
Jīhū měicì，tāmen dōu néng zài gèng gāo dìwèi bǎohùzhě de bāngzhù xià táotuō fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
几乎每次，他们都能在更高地位保护者的帮助下逃脱法律的制裁。

Duì qīnfànrénquán guójiā de guǎngfàn zhìcái。

He tried to give his falsehood the gloss of moral sanction.
Tā shìtú yòng dàodé zhìcái de jiǎxiàng lái yǎngài tā de miùwù。
他试图用道德制裁的假象来掩盖他的谬误。
a custom tailor
承接定制衣服的裁缝

段氏(段玉裁)《说文解字注》
独出心裁
dúchūxīncái
show originality; be original
独出心裁
独裁者
dúcáizhě
autocrat; dictator
经过武装起义，独裁者终于被推翻了。
Jīngguò wǔzhuāng qǐyì，dúcáizhě zhōng yú bèi tuīfān le。
The dictator was overthrown by the armed uprising.
法西斯独裁者。
The streets ran with blood during the tyrant\'s reign of power.
在这个独裁者统治时期，到处都充满了血腥味。
The people should not conceive the illusion that dictator may quit his power.
人们可不能指望独裁者会放弃他的权力。
The dictator can not stand the constraint of the constitution any more.
这个独裁者不能再忍受宪法的约束了。
The dictator\'s intent to rule the world is only an imagination.
这个独裁者统治世界的企图只是他的妄想。
The dictator was on his way to grave for his constant violence against people.
这个独裁者不断地向人民实行暴政，就是在自取灭亡。
The dictator wanted to extinguish all of his opposition in one go.
Zhè wèi dúcáizhě xiǎng yìkǒuqì xiāomiè suǒyǒu duìshǒu。
这位独裁者想一口气消灭所有对手。
The dictator fell from power.
Gāi dúcáizhě dǎotái le。
该独裁者倒台了。
The dictator put a price on the opposition leader\'s head.
Dúcáizhě xuánshǎng fǎnkàng shìlì lǐngxiù de shǒují。
独裁者悬赏反抗势力领袖的首级。
There was an assassination attempt on the dictator.
Céngjīng (yǒu rén）shìtú ànshā zhè wèi dúcáizhě。
曾经（有人）试图暗杀这位独裁者。
The dictator was chucking about his influence over the public.
Zhège dúcáizhě duì tā de mínzhòng làn shī quánlì。
这个独裁者对他的民众滥施权力。
The dictator relaxed his grip on several key industries.
Zhège dúcáizhě fàngsōngle duì jǐ gè guānjiàn hángyè de kòngzhì。
这个独裁者放松了对几个关键行业的控制。
We need to permanently shift power away from the dictator.
Wǒmen yào yǒngyuǎn de bōduó dúcáizhě de quánlì。
我们要永远地剥夺独裁者的权力。
All dissenters were silenced when the dictator assumed power.
Dúcáizhě zhǎngquán zhīhòu，suǒyǒu de yìyìzhě dōu bèi jìnshēng le。
独裁者掌权之后，所有的异议者都被噤声了。
The coup disposed of the dictator bloodlessly.
Zài zhècì zhèngbiàn zhōng，méiyǒu liúxuè，dúcáizhě jiù bèi gǎnxiàle tái。
在这次政变中，没有流血，独裁者就被赶下了台。
The government was overthrown nonviolently, but the dictator was killed.
Zhège zhèngfǔ bèi yǐ fēibàolì de xíngshì tuīfānle，dànshì dúcáizhě què bèi shā le。
这个政府被以非暴力的形式推翻了，但是独裁者却被杀了。
Dictators are suppressors of free speech.
Dúcáizhě yāzhì zìyóu yánlùn。
独裁者压制自由言论。
My boss is a dictator who makes everyone work overtime.
Wǒ de lǎobǎn shì gè jīngcháng qiángpò dàjiā jiābān de dúcáizhě。
我的老板是个经常强迫大家加班的独裁者。
an absolute ruler
独裁统治者
独裁者
dúcáizhě
autocrat; dictator
独裁政治
dúcái zhèngzhì
autocracy
利用独裁权力横征暴敛
lìyòngdúcái quánlì héngzhēngbàoliǎn
use one\'s dictatorial powers to extort taxes and levies

The dictator was overthrown by the armed uprising.

Now that we advocate democracy, we shouldn\'t despotically suppress political criticism.
推翻独裁统治
tuīfān dúcáitǒngzhì

dúchūxīncái
show originality; be original

Huíwénshī shì wǒguó gǔdiǎn shīgē zhōng yìzhǒng jiàowéi dútè de tǐcái。
Palindrome poem is a unique literature type of the  ancient poems of our country.

对于他的裁制控制，大家都很不满。

法律制裁
fǎlǜ zhìcái
legal sanction
用经济制裁来卡别国的脖子
yòngjīngjì zhìcái lái qiǎ bié guó de bózi
apply economic sanctions against another country in an attempt to force it into submission
受法律制裁
shòu fǎlǜ zhìcái
be dealt with according to law
不法分子逃脱不了法律的制裁。
Bùfǎ fènzǐ táotuō bùliǎo fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
The lawbreakers will never escape punishment according to law.
予以制裁
yǔyǐ zhìcái 
mete out punishment to sb.; apply sanctions against sb.
制裁
zhìcái
sanction; punish
无论你有什么理由，触法就要受到法律的制裁。
Wúlùn nǐ yǒu shénme lǐyóu，chùfǎ jiùyào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
Regardless of your excuse, you have violated the war and will be judged accordingly.
他最终一定会受到法律制裁。
Tā zuì zhōng yídìng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
He is certain to be punished by the law.
法律早晚会制裁你们这些人渣的。
Fǎlǜ zǎowǎn huì zhìcái nǐmen zhèxiē rénzhā de。
Sooner or later the law will punish scum like you.
私吞集体财产终究会得到法律的制裁！
Sītūn jítǐ cáichǎn zhōng jiū huì dédào fǎlǜ de zhìcái！
He who appropriates collective goods will be punished by the law!
他如此贪贿无厌，终会受到法律制裁的。
Tā rúcǐ tānhuì wúyàn，zhōng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái de。
His greediness for material comforts will one day bring him to justice.
这些贪污腐化的官员都受到了应有的制裁。
Zhèxiē tānwū fǔhuà de guānyuán dōu shòudào le yīngyǒu de zhìcái。
These government officials led a dissipated life and have all been subjected to the punishment they deserve.
偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。
Tōuyùn wéijìn wùpǐn de xíngwéi，yào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
对异性进行性侵犯会受到法律制裁。
Duì yìxìng jìnxíng xìng qīnfàn huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
Those who sexually harrass the opposite sex will be punished by the law.
有些政治犯为躲避本国的法律制裁，到别国寻求政治避难。
Yǒuxiē zhèngzhìfàn wèi duǒbì běnguó de fǎlǜ zhìcái，dào biéguó xúnqiú zhèngzhì bìnàn。
Some political criminals went to other countries as political refuges to escape from their own countries\' legal punishments.

sanctions against
对…的制裁
to impose sanctions (on {or} against)
（对…）实施制裁
People evading taxes will be disciplined by the law.
逃税的人会受到法律的制裁。
The committee placed economic sanctions on the country.
委员会对这个国家实行了经济制裁。
The government stated its willingness to abide by the UN sanctions policy.

政府声明愿意接受该项联合国制裁政策。
She evaded many of the usual controls and sanctions that governed the lives of women.
Tā bù lǐhuì xǔduō píngcháng shùfù fùnǚ shēnghuó de kòngzhì hé zhìcái。
她不理会许多平常束缚妇女生活的控制和制裁。
Not everything that falls under this heading is a sanctioned prohibition.

并非归入这个标题下的每一条都要受制裁受处罚。
Nearly always they have protectors in high places to help them escape the arm of the law.
Jīhū měicì，tāmen dōu néng zài gèng gāo dìwèi bǎohùzhě de bāngzhù xià táotuō fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
几乎每次，他们都能在更高地位保护者的帮助下逃脱法律的制裁。

裁员减薪
cáiyuán jiǎnxīn 
cut down the number of employees and reduce the salary
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
据说公司要裁员了，大家全都人心惶惶。
Jùshuō gōngsī yào cáiyuán le，dàjiā quándōu rénxīn huánghuáng。
It is said that the company is going to downsize staff, everyone is feeling anxious.
公司要裁员，我们都是要养家糊口的。
Gōngsī yào cáiyuán，wǒmen dōushì yào yǎngjiā húkǒu de。
The company is going to reduce staff, we all have a family to raise.
裁员
cáiyuán
cut staff
信息产业内刮起了一阵裁员风暴。
Xìnxīchǎnyènèi guāqǐle yízhèn cáiyuánfēngbào。
There have been a wave of redundancies in the IT industry.
公司决定裁员，从而削减成本。
gōngsī juédìng cáiyuán，cóng\'ér xuējiǎnchéngběn。
The company decided to lay people off, and thus reduce their costs.
公司准备大量裁员。
Gōngsī zhǔnbèi dàliàng cáiyuán。
The company is preparing to lay off a large number of people.
企业经过裁员缩减了经费开支。
Qǐyè jīngguò cáiyuán suōjiǎnle jīngfèikāizhī.
Business expenditure was reduced through staff cutbacks.
经济合同仲裁委员会
jīngjì hétongzhòngcái wěiyuánhuì
economic contract arbitration committee
球已出线，但裁判员并没看见。
Qiú yǐ chūxiàn，dàn cáipànyuán bìng méi kànjiàn。
The ball was out of bounds, but the umpire didn\'t see it.
随着裁判员的哨声响起，整场比赛结束了。
Suí zhe cáipànyuán de shàoshēng xiǎngqǐ，zhěng chǎng bǐsài jiéshù le。
The whole game ended when the referee blew his whistle.
作为主裁判员，他向来公平公正。
Zuòwéi zhǔ cáipànyuán，tā xiàng lái gōngpíng gōngzhèng。
As the main referee, he is always very fair.
裁减冗员
cáijiǎn rǒngyuán
reduce redundant personnel
主裁和第四官员商量着什么，然后掏出了红牌。
Zhǔcái hé dìsì guānyuán shāngliang zhe shénme，ránhòu tāo chū le hóngpái。
裁减机关工作人员
cáijiǎn jīguān gōngzuò rényuán 
reduce (or cut down) the staff of an organization
新老板刚上任，就对公司员工进行了裁汰。
Xīn lǎobǎn gāng shàngrèn，jiù duì gōngsī yuángōng jìnxíng le cáitài。
The boss reduced the size of the staff when he first took the post.
足球场上的裁判要不停地跟着球员们跑动。
Zúqiúchǎng shàng de cáipàn yào bùtíng de gēn zhe qiúyuánmen pǎodòng。
The umpire has to move continually in the field to follow the players.
裁判的发令枪一响，运动员们像箭一样冲了出去。
Cáipàn de fālìngqiāng yì xiǎng，yùndòngyuánmen xiàng jiàn yíyàng chōng le chūqù。
The athletes darted off as soon as they heard the shot from the starting pistol.
这些贪污腐化的官员都受到了应有的制裁。
Zhèxiē tānwū fǔhuà de guānyuán dōu shòudào le yīngyǒu de zhìcái。
These government officials led a dissipated life and have all been subjected to the punishment they deserve.
王员外在自家的外院里裁种了很多花草。
Wáng yuánwài zài zì jiā de wàiyuàn lǐ zāizhòng le hěnduō huācǎo。
Lord Wang has planted many flowers and grass in his outer court.
裁判判进球无效，因为有个球员处在越位位置。
Cáipàn pàn jìnqiú wúxiào，yīnwèi yǒu gè qiúyuán chǔzài yuèwèi wèizhi。
The referee disallowed the goal because one of the players was offside.
裁判鸣枪后，参加长跑的运动员们都跑了出去。
Cáipàn míngqiāng hòu，cānjiā chángpǎo de yùndòngyuánmen dōu pǎo le chūqù。
After the referee fired his gun, the long-distance running athletes began running.
裁员
这位裁判员掌握尺度较好
裁减冗员

The arbiter will have the last say.

我要发起一场罢工来抗议公司的裁员。

彼特据理反对公司新一轮的裁员。

compulsory redundancy
强行裁员
to be made redundant
[worker+] 被裁员
to shed jobs
裁员
Many industrial companies laid off employees during the depression.
经济大萧条期间，许多工业企业都进行了裁员。
The workers went on strike in response to the company\'s downsizing.
工人们罢工抗议公司裁员。

由于一次裁员行动和一次重大的银行合并，他一贯有条不紊的生活变得充满了变化。
When workers think a periodic purge is imminent, everyone feels equally threatened.
Dāng yuángōng tīngshuō yào dìngqī cáiyuán shí，rénrén dōu tóngyàng de gǎndào shòu wēixié。
当员工听说要定期裁员时，人人都同样地感到受威胁。
The legal contract specifies my status in terms of tenure, salary, pension, dismissal, redundancy, discipline, etc.

qǔxiāo cáipànquán

cái jiàn xīnyīfu

这块料子可以裁两套衣服。
Zhèkuài liàozi kěyǐ cái liǎngtào yīfu。
Two suits can be cut out of this piece of material.
这家公司去年裁了十个人。
Zhèjiā gōngsī qùnián cái le shí gè rén。
This company dismissed ten people last year.
这个科已裁并到总务处。
Zhège kē yǐ cáibìngdào zǒngwùchù。
This section has been merged into the general affairs department.
这个机构应该裁撤。
Zhège jīgòu yīnggāi cáichè。
This organization should be dissolved.
我们已经裁撤了两个科室。
Wǒmen yǐjing cáichè le liǎnggè kēshì。
We have dissolved two offices already.
这件事由你裁处。
Zhèjiànshì yóu nǐ cáichǔ。
This matter will be left in your hands.
这事太复杂，一时很难裁处。
Zhè shì tài fùzá，yìshí hěn nán cáichǔ。
This is too complicated a matter to be settled right away.
法官裁定他的证词有效。
Fǎguān cáidìngtā de zhèngcí yǒuxiào。
The judge ruled that his testimony was valid.
此事如何处理，请您裁断。
Cǐ shì rúhé chǔlǐ，qǐngnín cáiduàn。
Please consider the problem and decide how to handle it.
我这件大衣请你照这个式样裁剪。
Wǒ zhèjiàn dàyī qǐngnǐ zhào zhège shìyàngcáijiǎn。
Please cut out my overcoat according to (or after) this pattern.
裁减机关工作人员
cáijiǎn jīguān gōngzuò rényuán 
reduce (or cut down) the staff of an organization
裁减军备
cáijiǎn jūnbèi 
reduce armaments
依法裁决
yīfǎ cáijué 
adjudicate according to law
会议主席作出了裁决。
Huìyì zhǔxí zuòchū le cáijué。
A ruling was given by the chairman.
裁军谈判
cáijūn tánpàn 
disarmament talks
他应邀为这场排球赛担任裁判。
Tā yìngyāo wèi zhèchǎng páiqiúsài dānrèn cáipàn。
He is asked to referee this volleyball match.
有裁判权
yǒu cáipànquán 
have jurisdiction
取消裁判权
qǔxiāo cáipànquán 
deprive sb. of his jurisdiction
这家饭店已裁员二十人。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn yǐ cáiyuán èrshí rén。
The hotel has dismissed twenty people from its staff.
独裁者
dúcáizhě
autocrat; dictator
独裁政治
dúcái zhèngzhì
autocracy
法律制裁
fǎlǜ zhìcái
legal sanction
有个裁判不公正。
Yǒu gè cáipàn bùgōngzhèng。
One of the judges was partial.
利用独裁权力横征暴敛
lìyòngdúcái quánlì héngzhēngbàoliǎn
use one\'s dictatorial powers to extort taxes and levies
剪裁服装
jiǎncái fúzhuāng
cut out dresses
写文章要下一番剪裁的工夫。
Xiě wénzhāngyào xià yì fān jiǎncái de gōngfu。
In writing an essay one must do a lot of pruning.
裁员减薪
cáiyuán jiǎnxīn 
cut down the number of employees and reduce the salary
经济合同仲裁委员会
jīngjì hétongzhòngcái wěiyuánhuì
economic contract arbitration committee
那个裁缝的手工很精。
Nàge cáifeng de shǒugōng hěn jīng。
That tailor does skilful work.
俗话说：“看菜吃饭，量体裁衣”。我们无论做什么事都要看情形办理。
Súhuà shuō:“Kàncàichīfàn，liàngtǐcáiyī”。Wǒmen wúlùn zuò shénme shì dōuyào kàn qíngxíngbànlǐ。
There is a proverb: &quot;Fit the appetite to the dishes and the dress to the figure&quot;. Whatever we do must be done according to actual circumstances.
名义上裁军，实际上扩军
míngyì shàngcáijūn，shíjì shàngkuòjūn
disarmament in name, armament in reality
裁判给他评多少分？
Cáipàn gěi tā píng duōshaofēn?
What score did the judges give him?
用经济制裁来卡别国的脖子
yòngjīngjì zhìcái lái qiǎ bié guó de bózi
apply economic sanctions against another country in an attempt to force it into submission
先把两张纸取齐了再裁。
Xiān bǎ liǎng zhāng zhǐ qǔqí le zài cái。
Even up the edges of the two sheets of paper before you cut them.
裁减冗员
cáijiǎn rǒngyuán
reduce redundant personnel
根据事情本身的是非曲直进行裁断
gēnjù shìqing běnshēn de shìfēi qūzhí jìnxíng cáiduàn
decide the case on its merits
受法律制裁
shòu fǎlǜ zhìcái
be dealt with according to law
不法分子逃脱不了法律的制裁。
Bùfǎ fènzǐ táotuō bùliǎo fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
The lawbreakers will never escape punishment according to law.
观众对裁判的执法多有微词。
Guānzhònɡ duì cáipàn de zhífǎ duōyǒuwēicí。 
The spectators muttered their disapproval of the judge\'s performance.
裁判判进球无效，因为有个球员处在越位位置。
Cáipàn pàn jìnqiú wúxiào，yīnwèi yǒu gè qiúyuán chǔzài yuèwèi wèizhi。
The referee disallowed the goal because one of the players was offside.
予以制裁
yǔyǐ zhìcái 
mete out punishment to sb.; apply sanctions against sb.
仲裁法庭
zhònɡcái fǎtínɡ 
arbitration tribunal; court of arbitration
仲裁人
zhònɡcáirén 
arbitrator
仲裁书
zhònɡcáishū 
arbitration award
裁决
cáijué
adjudicate; rule
制裁
zhìcái
sanction; punish
别出心裁
biéchūxīncái
adopt an original approach; try to be different
独出心裁
dúchūxīncái
show originality; be original
仲裁
zhòngcái
arbitrate
今天的比赛裁判掏了两张红牌。
Jīntiān de bǐsài cáipàn tāo le liǎng zhāng hóngpái。
The referee showed two red cards in the game today.
案发后，他东躲西藏，可还是没有逃过法律的治裁。
Ànfā hòu，tā dōngduǒxīcáng，kě háishi méiyǒu táoguò fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
After commiting the crime he tried hard to hide from the reach of justice, but he couldn\'t.
在这场比赛中，球迷对边裁的判罚表示不满。
Zài zhèchǎng bǐsài zhōng，qiúmí duì biāncái de pànfá biǎoshì bùmǎn。
The football fans were not satisfied with the side umpire.
《论语别裁》这本书在网上很畅销。
《Lúnyǔbiécái》zhèběnshū zài wǎngshàng hěnchàngxiāo。
A Selection of the Analects sells many copies on the internet.
名设计师裁编的衣服果然与众不同。
Míng shèjìshī cáibiān de yīfu guǒrán yǔzhòngbùtóng。
The clothes designed and made by a famous designer are indeed extraordinary.
为了减少开支，他们不得不裁兵。
Wèile jiǎnshǎo kāizhī，tāmen bùdébùcáibīng。
They had to reduce troops to save money.
这个项目我们接不接，完全由他来裁度。
Zhège xiàng mù wǒmen jiē bùjiē，wánquán yóu tā lái cáidù。
It is up to him whether we take this project or not.
爷爷告诉我，这间裁缝铺在他小的时候就有了。
Yéye gàosù wǒ，zhè jiān cáiféngpù zài tā xiǎo de shíhou jiù yǒu le。
My grandfather told me that this tailor’s shop had been there since I was young.
由于公司不景气，老板不得不通过裁人来减少支出。
Yóuyú gōngsī bùjǐngqì，lǎobǎn bùdébùtōngguò cáirén lái jiǎnshǎo zhīchū。
Due to the companies poor performance, the boss had to reduce the size of staff in order to reduce costs.
新老板刚上任，就对公司员工进行了裁汰。
Xīn lǎobǎn gāng shàngrèn，jiù duì gōngsī yuángōng jìnxíng le cáitài。
The boss reduced the size of the staff when he first took the post.
对于他的裁制控制，大家都很不满。
Duìyú tā de cáizhì kòngzhì，dàjiā dōu hěnbùmǎn。
Discontent was common because the use of punishment to control.
这项计划还要等到领导裁酌之后才可实施。
Zhè xiàng jìhuà háiyào děngdào lǐngdǎo cáizhuó zhīhòu cái kě shíshī。
This project can be put into practice when the leaders make their decision.
球已出线，但裁判员并没看见。
Qiú yǐ chūxiàn，dàn cáipànyuán bìng méi kànjiàn。
The ball was out of bounds, but the umpire didn\'t see it.
无论你有什么理由，触法就要受到法律的制裁。
Wúlùn nǐ yǒu shénme lǐyóu，chùfǎ jiùyào shòudào fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
Regardless of your excuse, you have violated the war and will be judged accordingly.
经过武装起义，独裁者终于被推翻了。
Jīngguò wǔzhuāng qǐyì，dúcáizhě zhōng yú bèi tuīfān le。
The dictator was overthrown by the armed uprising.
他最终一定会受到法律制裁。
Tā zuì zhōng yídìng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
He is certain to be punished by the law.
执法这场比赛的是国家裁判。
Zhífǎ zhèchǎng bǐsài de shì guójiā cáipàn。
It was a national judge who refereed the game.

经法院裁决，即日起甲方给付乙方50万元。

The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
这个雕塑真是一个镂月裁云的杰世之作。

裁判鸣枪后，参加长跑的运动员们都跑了出去。

After the referee fired his gun, the long-distance running athletes began running.
足球场上的裁判要不停地跟着球员们跑动。

既然提倡民主，就不能以独裁手段压制清议。

据说公司要裁员了，大家全都人心惶惶。

法律早晚会制裁你们这些人渣的。

他如此贪贿无厌，终会受到法律制裁的。

这些贪污腐化的官员都受到了应有的制裁。

主裁判又一次误判，只听场外传来一阵唏嘘声。

The company is going to reduce staff, we all have a family to raise.

Yīxiù tài dà le，wǒ ràng cáifeng gǎi zhǎi diǎn。

这种机器箱体是纯不锈钢的，很结实。

箱体最好比要装的物品的体积稍大一点。

如果有意见，可以写在纸上放进意见箱。

Wǒ bèi lājīxiāng bàndǎo le。

电脑包装箱里有好多用于防震隔潮的泡沫塑料。

我要搬家了，需要几个瓦楞纸箱子。

Bīngxiāngde shìchǎng yǐjīng chǔyú bǎohézhuàngtài。
The market for refrigerators is already saturated.
国王赐给他一箱黄金。

养鱼设备例如灯、潜水泵等会使水箱中产生微弱的电磁反应。

布朗宁夫人放下茶杯，清了清嗓子。
The girl\'s body had been identified by her aunt, Mrs. Browne.
Zhège nǚhái de shītǐ bèi tā de āyí，Bùlǎng tàitai shíbié chūlái le。
这个女孩的尸体被她的阿姨，布朗太太识别出来了。
Mr Browning drew up a chair for her，as nice as could be，and sat down himself.
Bùlǎngníng xiānsheng jíqí tǐtiē de lāle yìbǎ yǐzi gěi tā，ránhòu zìjǐ yě zuòxià le。
布朗宁先生极其体贴地拉了一把椅子给她，然后自己也坐下了。
Miss Brown had remained behind with the frightened housekeeper.
Bùlǎng xiǎojiě hé shòujīng de nǚ guǎnjiā yìqǐ dāi zài hòumiàn。
布朗小姐和受惊的女管家一起呆在后面。
Johnson may yet gamble everything and run against Brown.
Yuēhànxùn kěnéng dǔ shàng yíqiè，yǔ Bùlǎng jìngxuǎn。
约翰逊可能赌上一切，与布朗竞选。
All eyes are on Mr Brown，watching for his reaction.
Suǒyǒu de mùguāng dōu jízhōngzài Bùlǎng shēnshàng，qīdàizhe tā de fǎnyìng。
所有的目光都集中在布朗身上，期待着他的反应。
&quot;Mr. Powell finds it easier to take it out of mothers, children and sick people than to take on this vast industry,&quot; Mr. Brown commented icily.
“Bàowēi\'ěr xiānsheng fāxiàn，cóng mǔqīn、 háizi hé bìngrén shēnshàng dédào tā yào bǐ cóng zhège pángdà de gōngyè chǎnyè nàlǐ dédào tā róngyì de duō，”Bùlǎng xiānsheng lěngbīngbīng de píngjià shuō。
“鲍威尔先生发现，从母亲、孩子和病人身上得到它要比从这个庞大的工业产业那里得到它容易得多，”布朗先生冷冰冰地评价说。
&amp;ldquo;We have to move faster,&amp;rdquo; said Mr Brown.
bùlǎng biǎoshì ：&amp;ldquo; wǒmen bìxū gèng kuài de xíngdòng。
布朗表示：;我们必须更快地行动。
这位智者的训诫使我豁然开朗，明白了很多道理
Zhèwèi zhìzhě de xùnjiè shǐ wǒ huōrán kāilǎng，míngbai le hěnduō dàolǐ
The sage\'s sermon suddenly cleared my view and made me understand many theories.
Where the silver light starts, at the foot of whitely blue Mont Blanc, were five riders.
在银光照耀之处，苍白的勃朗峰脚处，有五位骑马的旅人刚好出现。
Much of the beluga caviar existing in the world is found in the Soviet Union and Iran.
Shìjiè shàng xiàncún de duōshù bái jīng yúzǐjiàng zài sūlián hé yīlǎng。
世界上现存的多数白鲸鱼子酱在苏联和伊朗。
我向他努努嘴，让他先说。
Wǒ xiàng tā nǔnǔ zuǐ，ràng tā xiān shuō。
I pouted my lips at him, hinting that he should speak first.
他努了下嘴，摆出不在乎的样子。
Tā nǔlexià zuǐ，bǎichū búzàihū de yàngzi.
He pouted, making a big show of not caring.
小姑娘把嘴一努，不高兴了。
Xiǎo gūniangbǎ zuǐ yì nǔ，bùgāoxìng le。
The little girl pursed her lips to show her dislike.
光嘴上说努力，可你怎么就不动窝呢？
Guāng zuǐshàng shuō nǔlì，kě nǐ zěnme jiù búdòngwō ne?
You said you would work hard, but why don’t you put it into practice.
朝他直努嘴
他努努嘴暗示我该发言了。
你没见她在那里直向你努嘴？
泡的黄豆已经努嘴了。
小明总是放空炮，每年他都说要努力学习，可每年又都不努力。
Xiǎo Míng zǒngshì fàng kōngpào，měinián tā dōu shuō yào nǔlì xuéxí，kě měinián yòu dōu bùnǔlì。
Xiaoming always makes empty promises. Every year he says that he\'ll work hard, but he doesn\'t.
百折不挠的努力
bǎizhébùnáo de nǔlì 
unrelenting effort
你只要努力，保管能学好汉语。
Nǐ zhǐyào nǔlì，bǎoguǎn néng xuéhǎo hànyǔ。
I assure you that you can learn Chinese if you make the effort.
作不懈的努力
zuò búxiè de nǔlì 
make unremitting efforts; make a sustained effort
努力工作
nǔlì gōngzuò
work hard
共同努力
gòngtóng nǔlì
make joint efforts
从坏处着想，往好处努力。
Cóng huàichù zhuóxiǎng，wǎng hǎochu nǔlì。
Prepare for the worst; strive for the best.
焕发精神，努力工作
Huànfā jīngshén，nǔlì gōngzuò。
call forth all one\'s vigour and work with redoubled efforts
他的成功是靠他的努力和一定的机遇。
Tā de chénggōngshì kào tā de nǔlì hé yídìng de jīyù。
His success was brought about by hard work and a certain amount of good luck.
即使条件再好，也还要靠自己努力。
Jíshǐ tiáojiàn zài hǎo，yě háiyào kào zìjǐ nǔlì。
No matter how favourable the conditions are, we\'ll still rely on our own efforts.
作坚持不懈的努力
zuò jiānchíbúxiè de nǔlì 
make unremitting efforts
工作较前更为努力
gōngzuò jiào qián gèngwéi nǔlì 
work even harder than before
尽最大努力
jìn zuì dà nǔlì
do one\'s best; exert one\'s utmost effort
劳力可能紧张一些，但我们一定努力完成任务。
Láolì kěnéngjǐnzhāngyìxiē，dàn wǒmen yídìngnǔlì wánchéngrènwu。
We may be a little short of labour, but we\'ll do our best to fulfil the task.
他勉励学生努力学习。
Tā miǎnlì xuéshēnɡ nǔlì xuéxí。
He urged his students to work hard.
学好一门外语要作出极大的努力。
Xuéhǎo yìmén wàiyǔ yào zuòchū jídà de nǔlì。
It takes great effort to master a foreign language.
经过大家的努力，困难的局面终于让位于顺利的局面。
Jīngguò dàjiā de nǔlì，kùnnan de júmiàn zhōng yú ràng wèi yú shùnlì de júmiàn。
As a result of collective effort, the difficult situation changed into a favourable one.
仍须努力
réng xū nǔlì
must continue to make efforts
工作特别努力
gōngzuò tèbié nǔlì 
be especially hardworking
往后我们要加倍努力。
Wǎnghòu wǒmen yào jiābèi nǔlì。
From now on we\'ll redouble our efforts.
为此而作出种种努力
wèi cǐ ér zuòchū zhǒng zhǒng nǔlì
make every effort to that end
我们须作出很大努力。
Wǒmen xū zuòchū hěndà nǔlì。
We\'ll have to make a great effort.
一齐努力
yìqí nǔ lì 
make a concerted effort
我只要一息尚存，就要努力为祖国工作。
Wǒ zhǐyào yìxī shàngcún，jiùyào nǔlì wèi zǔguó gōngzuò。
I\'ll work hard for my country as long as I live.
要实现这项革新，有赖于大家共同努力。
Yào shíxiàn zhè xiàng géxīn，yǒulài yú dàjiā gòngtóngnǔlì。
The success of the innovation depends on our concerted efforts.
努力镇静下来
nǔlì zhènjìnɡ xiàlái 
compose oneself with an effort
主观努力
zhǔguān nǔlì 
subjective efforts
进行了卓有成效的努力
jìnxíng le zhuóyǒuchéngxiào de nǔlì 
have made fruitful efforts
自当努力
zìdāngnǔlì 
will certainly do one\'s best
只要努力，自然会取得好成绩。
Zhǐyào nǔlì，zìrán huì qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
If you work hard, you\'re bound to get good results.
因为方法不对，你的努力都是白费蜡。
Yīnwéi fāngfǎ búduì，nǐ de nǔlì dōushì báifèi la。
Your efforts turned out futile due to incorrect methods.
这次考试难度较大，我们需要倍加努力。
Zhècì kǎoshì nándù jiàodà，wǒmen xūyào bèijiā nǔlì。
We need to work much harder to prepare for this difficult test.
你只要付出努力，必将有所收获。
Nǐ zhǐyào fùchū nǔlì，bì jiāng yǒusuǒ shōuhuò。
As long as you work hard, you will surely be rewarded.
光嘴上说努力，可你怎么就不动窝呢？
Guāng zuǐshàng shuō nǔlì，kě nǐ zěnme jiù búdòngwō ne?
You said you would work hard, but why don’t you put it into practice.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
他虽然很努力了，但成绩还是那么不尽如人意。
Tā suīrán hěnnǔlì le，dàn chéngjì háishi nàme bújìnrú rényì。
Although he tried very hard, the results were not very satisfactory.
她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。
Tā zìjué cáisī bùmǐn，suǒyǐ xuéqǐxílái gèngjiā nǔlì。
She knows that she is not that smart, so she studies a lot harder.
您不消费心，我会努力做好。
Nín bùxiāo fèixīn，wǒ huì nǔlì zuòhǎo。
Don’t worry, I will try my best.
我们正在努力实现产供销一条龙。
Wǒmen zhèngzài nǔlì shíxiàn chǎngòngxiāo yìtiáo lóng。
We are trying to integrate production, supply, and sale.
经过近十年的努力，这座荒山现在已经绿树成林了。
Jīngguò jìn shínián de nǔlì，zhè zuò huāngshān xiànzài yǐjing lǜshù chénglín le。
After ten years of hard work, the barren hill is now covered with green tress.
经过多年的努力，基本上完成了城乡一体化。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，jīběn shàng wánchéng le chéngxiāng yìtǐhuà。
After years of hard work, we\'ve basically accomplished the unification of town and country.
经过多年的努力，该品牌已经驰誉全国了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，gāi pǐnpái yǐjing chíyù quánguó le。
After years of hard work, the brand earned a good reputation all over the country.
他已经获得了初级职称，正在努力争取中级职称。
Tā yǐjing huòdé le chūjí zhíchēng，zhèngzài nǔlì zhēngqǔ zhōng jí zhíchēng。
He has already gained the primary title for the post, now he is striving for the intermediate one.
经过努力，他们公司创益大增。
Jīngguò nǔlì，tāmen gōngsī chuàngyì dàzēng。
Through great efforts, the profits of their company grew by a large amount.
他们付出了很大的努力，但终因方法欠妥功败垂成。
Tāmen fùchū le hěndà de nǔlì，dàn zhōng yīn fāngfǎ qiàntuǒ gōngbài chuíchéng。
Although they tried very hard, they failed on the verge of success because of improper approach.
想成大器，从现在开始就要努力。
Xiǎng chéng dàqì，cóng xiànzài kāishǐ jiùyào nǔlì。
You must work hard if you want to be successful.
只有坚强和努力才是疗救苦难的诺亚方舟。
Zhǐyǒu jiānqiáng hé nǔlì cáishì liáo jiù kǔnàn de nuòyà fāngzhōu。
Strong will and hard work are like a Noah\'s Ark which saves people from their sufferings.
她不希望自己的理想都成为肥皂泡，所以加倍努力。
Tā bùxīwàng zìjǐ de lǐxiǎng dōu chéngwéi féizàopào，suǒyǐ jiābèi nǔlì。
She works hard to make her dreams come true.
我们只有更加努力的工作才能告慰已经牺牲的同志。
Wǒmen zhǐyǒu gèngjiā nǔlì de gōngzuò cáinéng gàowèi yǐjing xīshēng de tóngzhì。
Only by working harder can we comfort our sacrificed comrades.
对于适合自己的工作机会就要努力争取，拱让只能说明懦弱。
Duìyú shìhé zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīhuì jiùyào nǔlì zhēngqǔ，gǒng ràng zhǐnéng shuōmíng nuòruò。
One should fight for suitable job opportunities. Handing it over to others on a silver platter is a sign of weakness.
我们要努力实现规模化的生产，不断提高经济效益。
Wǒmen yào nǔlì shíxiàn guīmóhuà de shēngchǎn，búduàn tígāo jīngjì xiàoyì。
We should work hard to realize large-scale production so as to constantly increase economic benefits.
不管结果如何，横直我得付出努力。
Bùguǎn jiéguǒ rúhé，héngzhí wǒ děi fùchū nǔlì。
Whatever the result is, I must make great efforts anyway.
想要看到环境效益，不是靠一时半刻的努力就能实现的。
Xiǎngyào kàndào huánjìng xiàoyì，búshì kào yìshí bànkè de nǔlì jiùnéng shíxiàn de。
The benefits from environmental protection can\'t be realized through short term efforts.
经过我们的共同努力，终于使这间旧房换容了。
Jīngguò wǒmen de gòngtóng nǔlì，zhōng yú shǐ zhè jiān jiùfáng huànróng le。
Through our common efforts, the appearance of the old room have finally changed.
做事一定要鸡口牛后，努力向前。
Zuòshì yídìng yào jīkǒu niúhòu，nǔlì xiàng qián。
It\'s better be a dog\'s head than a lion\'s tail. We must continuously improve ourselves.
经过作家两年的努力，这本纪事终于出版了。
Jīngguò zuòjiāliǎng nián de nǔlì，zhèběn jìshì zhōng yú chūbǎn le。
This chronicle was finally published after two years of effort by the writer.
他做了这么多的努力只冀求她的嫣然一笑。
Tā zuò le zhèmeduō de nǔlì zhǐ jìqiú tā de yānrán yíxiào。
He did so much only because of her smile.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
想要改善现在的苦境，我们只有更加努力的工作！
Xiǎngyào gǎishàn xiànzài de kǔjìng，wǒmen zhǐyǒu gèngjiā nǔlì de gōngzuò！
We can change our miserable plight only by working harder.
我们要摆脱现在的困局就要努力工作！
Wǒmen yào bǎituō xiànzài de kùnjú jiùyào nǔlì gōngzuò！
Only through hard work can we solve our current predicament.
他总是对别人的努力泼冷水说冷话，让他自己去干他又不干。
Tā zǒngshì duì biérén de nǔlì pō lěngshuǐ shuō lěnghuà，ràng tā zìjǐ qù gàn tā yòu búgàn。
He always throws a wet blanket on the efforts of others, but when asked he won\'t do it on his own.
经过多年的努力，他终于在这个城市成家立业了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú zài zhège chéngshì chéngjiā lìyè le。
After years of effort, he finally bought a house and settled in this city.
他经常找一些励志故事来激励我们继续努力。
Tā jīngcháng zhǎo yìxiē lìzhì gùshì lái jīlì wǒmen jìxù nǔlì。
He often found some inspiring stories to encourage us to continue making great efforts.
利他的精神是我们应该努力学习的。
Lì tā de jīngshén shì wǒmen yīnggāi nǔlì xuéxí de。
Altruistic spirit should studied by us vigorously.
这次获得的三连冠是我们全体队员不懈努力的结果。
Zhècì huòdé de sānliánguàn shì wǒmen quántǐ duìyuán búxiè nǔlì de jiéguǒ。
The third consecutive championship obtained this time is the result of persistent efforts by all our team members.
经过寒暑不辍的努力，他终于练就了一手的好字。
Jīngguò hánshǔ bùchuò de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú liànjiù le yì shǒu de hǎozì。
Through years of constant effort, he finally became skilled in calligraphy.
医生已经尽了最大的努力对他进行疗救。
Yīshēng yǐjing jìn le zuìdàde nǔlì duì tā jìnxíng liáojiù。
The doctor had tried his best to cure him.
经过多年的努力，我们已经种植了大面积的林网。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，wǒmen yǐjing zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de línwǎng。
After years of efforts, we have already planted a large area of forest network.
要想成为人中龙凤，就要付出多倍的努力。
Yào xiǎng chéngwéi rén zhōng lóngfèng，jiùyào fùchū duōbèi de nǔlì。
If you want to be a virtuous and talented person, you have to redouble your efforts.
我们正当妙年，一定要努力学习文化知识。
Wǒmen zhèngdāng miàonián，yídìng yào nǔlì xuéxí wénhuà zhīshi。
We are in the bloom of youth, so we should try our best to acquire education.
经过努力，落入犯罪份子魔手的人质终于获救。
Jīngguò nǔlì，luòrù fànzuìfènzǐ móshǒu de rénzhì zhōng yú huòjiù。
After great effort, the hostages caught by criminals have been rescued.
回想起小时候自己学习不是太努力，他深感内愧。
Huíxiǎng qǐ xiǎoshíhòu zìjǐ xuéxí búshì tài nǔlì,tā shēngǎn nèikuì.
He feels ashamed of himself because he didn\'t study hard when he was young.
工厂得以扭亏创收，离不开全体干部职工的共同努力。
Gōngchǎng děi yǐ niǔkuī chuàngshōu，líbùkāi quántǐ gànbùzhígōng de gòngtóng nǔlì。
The factory turned loss into profit,  it would never have happened without the efforts of all the cadres and employees.
身为裨将，必须努力配合主将的工作。
Shēnwéi píjiàng，bìxū nǔlì pèihé zhǔjiàng de gōngzuò。
As a subordinate general, you have to cooperate fully with the commanding general.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
他如此青眼看待你，你该更加努力才是。
Tā rúcǐ qīngyǎn kàndài nǐ，nǐ gāi gèngjiā nǔlì cáishì。
He looks on you with such favor, you really ought to work harder.
你应该努力拓宽自己的社交圈。
Nǐ yīnggāi nǔlì tuòkuān zìjǐ de shèjiāoquān。
You should try to expand your social relationships.
他生财有道，这些年通过自己的努力做生意赚了不少钱。
Tā shēngcái yǒu dào，zhèxiē nián tōngguò zìjǐ de nǔlì zuò shēngyì zhuàn le bùshǎo qián。
He has many ways to become rich and has accumulated a lot of money through his business efforts.
你不要总埋怨时乖运蹇，不努力是你不能成功的根本原因。
Nǐ búyào zǒng mányuàn shíguāi yùnjiǎn，bùnǔlì shì nǐ bùnéng chénggōng de gēnběn yuányīn。
Don\'t always complain about bad luck. The fundamental reason for your failure is that you haven\'t tried hard enough.
承蒙抬爱，我将继续努力，争取取得更大的成绩。
Chéngméng tái\'ài，wǒ jiāng jìxù nǔlì，zhēngqǔ qǔdé gèngdà de chéngjì。
With your care and support, I will continue to work hard so as to achieve more.
你交待的任务我一定会努力完成，万死不辞！
Nǐ jiāodài de rènwù wǒ yídìng huì nǔlì wánchéng，wànsǐ bùcí！
I\'m willing to risk any danger to finish the task you gave me!
经过几个月的努力，考古队终于发现了文化层。
Jīngguò jǐgè yuè de nǔlì，kǎogǔduì zhōng yú fāxiàn le wénhuà céng。
After several months, the archeologists finally found the cultural stratum.
经过几年的努力，他终于成了一名舞星。
Jīngguò jǐnián de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú chéng le yìmíng wǔxīng。
After several years of hard work, he finally become a star dancer.
通过自己的努力，他让那些小看他的人对他刮目相看！

He made those who looked down upon him look at him with new eyes with his hard work.
几经努力，他终于考中了孝廉。

After many years\' efforts, Xiao Zhang finally won the first prize in the game.

After years of endeavor, he finally learned this unique set of martial arts.

There is no end in learning. A lot of efforts are needed for final achievement.
经过几年的努力，收集逸诗的工作终于结束。

After years of hard work, the collection of outstanding poems has finally been completed.
他不断的努力，始终相信自己有展翅高飞的那一天。

He works hard continuously, believing that he can soar to great heights one day.

Thanks to the efforts made by all the parties, the relationship between the two countries has finally normalized.

We should work hard when we are in the prime of life.
一个人只要走上正途，经过努力就一定会成功。
Yígè rén zhǐyào zǒushàng zhèngtú，jīngguò nǔlì jiù yídìng huì chénggōng。
As long as one goes on the right path, he will definitely achieve great success through his own efforts.

One must make great effort before upgrading his skills to an outstanding level.

Hard work is eventually rewarded.
他一直想考上军事科学院，所以他一直努力学习。

他是个有事业心的人，每天都以努力工作为乐事。

My average is not high, but I put in my best effort that\'s all there is to it.
我们的努力没有白费。
Wǒmende nǔlì méiyǒubáifèi。
Our efforts have not been wasted.

Some students are lazy most of the time, and then try to cram just before the exams.

Wǒmen dàjiā bìxū jìxùnǔlì。
We must all keep on trying.

Tā bùhěncōngmíng，dàn hěnnǔlì。
She wasn\'t very clever, but she was very hardworking.

nǔlìde gōngzuò

我向他努努嘴，让他先说。

I pouted my lips at him, hinting that he should speak first.
小明总是放空炮，每年他都说要努力学习，可每年又都不努力。
Xiǎo Míng zǒngshì fàng kōngpào，měinián tā dōu shuō yào nǔlì xuéxí，kě měinián yòu dōu bùnǔlì。
Xiaoming always makes empty promises. Every year he says that he\'ll work hard, but he doesn\'t.
百折不挠的努力
bǎizhébùnáo de nǔlì 
unrelenting effort
你只要努力，保管能学好汉语。
Nǐ zhǐyào nǔlì，bǎoguǎn néng xuéhǎo hànyǔ。
I assure you that you can learn Chinese if you make the effort.
作不懈的努力
zuò búxiè de nǔlì 
make unremitting efforts; make a sustained effort
努力工作
nǔlì gōngzuò
work hard
共同努力
gòngtóng nǔlì
make joint efforts
从坏处着想，往好处努力。
Cóng huàichù zhuóxiǎng，wǎng hǎochu nǔlì。
Prepare for the worst; strive for the best.
焕发精神，努力工作
Huànfā jīngshén，nǔlì gōngzuò。
call forth all one\'s vigour and work with redoubled efforts
他的成功是靠他的努力和一定的机遇。
Tā de chénggōngshì kào tā de nǔlì hé yídìng de jīyù。
His success was brought about by hard work and a certain amount of good luck.
即使条件再好，也还要靠自己努力。
Jíshǐ tiáojiàn zài hǎo，yě háiyào kào zìjǐ nǔlì。
No matter how favourable the conditions are, we\'ll still rely on our own efforts.
作坚持不懈的努力
zuò jiānchíbúxiè de nǔlì 
make unremitting efforts
工作较前更为努力
gōngzuò jiào qián gèngwéi nǔlì 
work even harder than before
尽最大努力
jìn zuì dà nǔlì
do one\'s best; exert one\'s utmost effort
劳力可能紧张一些，但我们一定努力完成任务。
Láolì kěnéngjǐnzhāngyìxiē，dàn wǒmen yídìngnǔlì wánchéngrènwu。
We may be a little short of labour, but we\'ll do our best to fulfil the task.
他勉励学生努力学习。
Tā miǎnlì xuéshēnɡ nǔlì xuéxí。
He urged his students to work hard.
努劲儿
nǔjìnr
put forth all one\'s strength
箱子太沉，你别扛，看努着。
Xiāngzi tàichén，nǐ bié káng，kàn nǔ zhe。
Don\'t carry that heavy trunk, or you\'ll strain yourself.
努着眼睛
nǔ zhe yǎnjīng
with bulging eyes
小姑娘把嘴一努，不高兴了。
Xiǎo gūniangbǎ zuǐ yì nǔ，bùgāoxìng le。
The little girl pursed her lips to show her dislike.
大家再努一把力。
Dàjiā zài nǔ yìbǎ lì。
Let\'s make still greater efforts.
学好一门外语要作出极大的努力。
Xuéhǎo yìmén wàiyǔ yào zuòchū jídà de nǔlì。
It takes great effort to master a foreign language.
经过大家的努力，困难的局面终于让位于顺利的局面。
Jīngguò dàjiā de nǔlì，kùnnan de júmiàn zhōng yú ràng wèi yú shùnlì de júmiàn。
As a result of collective effort, the difficult situation changed into a favourable one.
仍须努力
réng xū nǔlì
must continue to make efforts
工作特别努力
gōngzuò tèbié nǔlì 
be especially hardworking
往后我们要加倍努力。
Wǎnghòu wǒmen yào jiābèi nǔlì。
From now on we\'ll redouble our efforts.
为此而作出种种努力
wèi cǐ ér zuòchū zhǒng zhǒng nǔlì
make every effort to that end
我们须作出很大努力。
Wǒmen xū zuòchū hěndà nǔlì。
We\'ll have to make a great effort.
一齐努力
yìqí nǔ lì 
make a concerted effort
我只要一息尚存，就要努力为祖国工作。
Wǒ zhǐyào yìxī shàngcún，jiùyào nǔlì wèi zǔguó gōngzuò。
I\'ll work hard for my country as long as I live.
要实现这项革新，有赖于大家共同努力。
Yào shíxiàn zhè xiàng géxīn，yǒulài yú dàjiā gòngtóngnǔlì。
The success of the innovation depends on our concerted efforts.
努力镇静下来
nǔlì zhènjìnɡ xiàlái 
compose oneself with an effort
主观努力
zhǔguān nǔlì 
subjective efforts
进行了卓有成效的努力
jìnxíng le zhuóyǒuchéngxiào de nǔlì 
have made fruitful efforts
自当努力
zìdāngnǔlì 
will certainly do one\'s best
只要努力，自然会取得好成绩。
Zhǐyào nǔlì，zìrán huì qǔdé hǎo chéngjì。
If you work hard, you\'re bound to get good results.
因为方法不对，你的努力都是白费蜡。
Yīnwéi fāngfǎ búduì，nǐ de nǔlì dōushì báifèi la。
Your efforts turned out futile due to incorrect methods.
这次考试难度较大，我们需要倍加努力。
Zhècì kǎoshì nándù jiàodà，wǒmen xūyào bèijiā nǔlì。
We need to work much harder to prepare for this difficult test.
你只要付出努力，必将有所收获。
Nǐ zhǐyào fùchū nǔlì，bì jiāng yǒusuǒ shōuhuò。
As long as you work hard, you will surely be rewarded.
光嘴上说努力，可你怎么就不动窝呢？
Guāng zuǐshàng shuō nǔlì，kě nǐ zěnme jiù búdòngwō ne?
You said you would work hard, but why don’t you put it into practice.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
他虽然很努力了，但成绩还是那么不尽如人意。
Tā suīrán hěnnǔlì le，dàn chéngjì háishi nàme bújìnrú rényì。
Although he tried very hard, the results were not very satisfactory.
她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。
Tā zìjué cáisī bùmǐn，suǒyǐ xuéqǐxílái gèngjiā nǔlì。
She knows that she is not that smart, so she studies a lot harder.
您不消费心，我会努力做好。
Nín bùxiāo fèixīn，wǒ huì nǔlì zuòhǎo。
Don’t worry, I will try my best.
我们正在努力实现产供销一条龙。
Wǒmen zhèngzài nǔlì shíxiàn chǎngòngxiāo yìtiáo lóng。
We are trying to integrate production, supply, and sale.
经过近十年的努力，这座荒山现在已经绿树成林了。
Jīngguò jìn shínián de nǔlì，zhè zuò huāngshān xiànzài yǐjing lǜshù chénglín le。
After ten years of hard work, the barren hill is now covered with green tress.
经过多年的努力，基本上完成了城乡一体化。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，jīběn shàng wánchéng le chéngxiāng yìtǐhuà。
After years of hard work, we\'ve basically accomplished the unification of town and country.
经过多年的努力，该品牌已经驰誉全国了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，gāi pǐnpái yǐjing chíyù quánguó le。
After years of hard work, the brand earned a good reputation all over the country.
他已经获得了初级职称，正在努力争取中级职称。
Tā yǐjing huòdé le chūjí zhíchēng，zhèngzài nǔlì zhēngqǔ zhōng jí zhíchēng。
He has already gained the primary title for the post, now he is striving for the intermediate one.
经过努力，他们公司创益大增。
Jīngguò nǔlì，tāmen gōngsī chuàngyì dàzēng。
Through great efforts, the profits of their company grew by a large amount.
他们付出了很大的努力，但终因方法欠妥功败垂成。
Tāmen fùchū le hěndà de nǔlì，dàn zhōng yīn fāngfǎ qiàntuǒ gōngbài chuíchéng。
Although they tried very hard, they failed on the verge of success because of improper approach.
想成大器，从现在开始就要努力。
Xiǎng chéng dàqì，cóng xiànzài kāishǐ jiùyào nǔlì。
You must work hard if you want to be successful.
只有坚强和努力才是疗救苦难的诺亚方舟。
Zhǐyǒu jiānqiáng hé nǔlì cáishì liáo jiù kǔnàn de nuòyà fāngzhōu。
Strong will and hard work are like a Noah\'s Ark which saves people from their sufferings.
她不希望自己的理想都成为肥皂泡，所以加倍努力。
Tā bùxīwàng zìjǐ de lǐxiǎng dōu chéngwéi féizàopào，suǒyǐ jiābèi nǔlì。
She works hard to make her dreams come true.
我们只有更加努力的工作才能告慰已经牺牲的同志。
Wǒmen zhǐyǒu gèngjiā nǔlì de gōngzuò cáinéng gàowèi yǐjing xīshēng de tóngzhì。
Only by working harder can we comfort our sacrificed comrades.
对于适合自己的工作机会就要努力争取，拱让只能说明懦弱。
Duìyú shìhé zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīhuì jiùyào nǔlì zhēngqǔ，gǒng ràng zhǐnéng shuōmíng nuòruò。
One should fight for suitable job opportunities. Handing it over to others on a silver platter is a sign of weakness.
我们要努力实现规模化的生产，不断提高经济效益。
Wǒmen yào nǔlì shíxiàn guīmóhuà de shēngchǎn，búduàn tígāo jīngjì xiàoyì。
We should work hard to realize large-scale production so as to constantly increase economic benefits.
不管结果如何，横直我得付出努力。
Bùguǎn jiéguǒ rúhé，héngzhí wǒ děi fùchū nǔlì。
Whatever the result is, I must make great efforts anyway.
想要看到环境效益，不是靠一时半刻的努力就能实现的。
Xiǎngyào kàndào huánjìng xiàoyì，búshì kào yìshí bànkè de nǔlì jiùnéng shíxiàn de。
The benefits from environmental protection can\'t be realized through short term efforts.
经过我们的共同努力，终于使这间旧房换容了。
Jīngguò wǒmen de gòngtóng nǔlì，zhōng yú shǐ zhè jiān jiùfáng huànróng le。
Through our common efforts, the appearance of the old room have finally changed.
做事一定要鸡口牛后，努力向前。
Zuòshì yídìng yào jīkǒu niúhòu，nǔlì xiàng qián。
It\'s better be a dog\'s head than a lion\'s tail. We must continuously improve ourselves.
经过作家两年的努力，这本纪事终于出版了。
Jīngguò zuòjiāliǎng nián de nǔlì，zhèběn jìshì zhōng yú chūbǎn le。
This chronicle was finally published after two years of effort by the writer.
他做了这么多的努力只冀求她的嫣然一笑。
Tā zuò le zhèmeduō de nǔlì zhǐ jìqiú tā de yānrán yíxiào。
He did so much only because of her smile.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
想要改善现在的苦境，我们只有更加努力的工作！
Xiǎngyào gǎishàn xiànzài de kǔjìng，wǒmen zhǐyǒu gèngjiā nǔlì de gōngzuò！
We can change our miserable plight only by working harder.
我们要摆脱现在的困局就要努力工作！
Wǒmen yào bǎituō xiànzài de kùnjú jiùyào nǔlì gōngzuò！
Only through hard work can we solve our current predicament.
他总是对别人的努力泼冷水说冷话，让他自己去干他又不干。
Tā zǒngshì duì biérén de nǔlì pō lěngshuǐ shuō lěnghuà，ràng tā zìjǐ qù gàn tā yòu búgàn。
He always throws a wet blanket on the efforts of others, but when asked he won\'t do it on his own.
经过多年的努力，他终于在这个城市成家立业了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú zài zhège chéngshì chéngjiā lìyè le。
After years of effort, he finally bought a house and settled in this city.
他经常找一些励志故事来激励我们继续努力。
Tā jīngcháng zhǎo yìxiē lìzhì gùshì lái jīlì wǒmen jìxù nǔlì。
He often found some inspiring stories to encourage us to continue making great efforts.
利他的精神是我们应该努力学习的。
Lì tā de jīngshén shì wǒmen yīnggāi nǔlì xuéxí de。
Altruistic spirit should studied by us vigorously.
这次获得的三连冠是我们全体队员不懈努力的结果。
Zhècì huòdé de sānliánguàn shì wǒmen quántǐ duìyuán búxiè nǔlì de jiéguǒ。
The third consecutive championship obtained this time is the result of persistent efforts by all our team members.
经过寒暑不辍的努力，他终于练就了一手的好字。
Jīngguò hánshǔ bùchuò de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú liànjiù le yì shǒu de hǎozì。
Through years of constant effort, he finally became skilled in calligraphy.
医生已经尽了最大的努力对他进行疗救。
Yīshēng yǐjing jìn le zuìdàde nǔlì duì tā jìnxíng liáojiù。
The doctor had tried his best to cure him.
经过多年的努力，我们已经种植了大面积的林网。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，wǒmen yǐjing zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de línwǎng。
After years of efforts, we have already planted a large area of forest network.
要想成为人中龙凤，就要付出多倍的努力。
Yào xiǎng chéngwéi rén zhōng lóngfèng，jiùyào fùchū duōbèi de nǔlì。
If you want to be a virtuous and talented person, you have to redouble your efforts.
我们正当妙年，一定要努力学习文化知识。
Wǒmen zhèngdāng miàonián，yídìng yào nǔlì xuéxí wénhuà zhīshi。
We are in the bloom of youth, so we should try our best to acquire education.
经过努力，落入犯罪份子魔手的人质终于获救。
Jīngguò nǔlì，luòrù fànzuìfènzǐ móshǒu de rénzhì zhōng yú huòjiù。
After great effort, the hostages caught by criminals have been rescued.
回想起小时候自己学习不是太努力，他深感内愧。
Huíxiǎng qǐ xiǎoshíhòu zìjǐ xuéxí búshì tài nǔlì,tā shēngǎn nèikuì.
He feels ashamed of himself because he didn\'t study hard when he was young.
工厂得以扭亏创收，离不开全体干部职工的共同努力。
Gōngchǎng děi yǐ niǔkuī chuàngshōu，líbùkāi quántǐ gànbùzhígōng de gòngtóng nǔlì。
The factory turned loss into profit,  it would never have happened without the efforts of all the cadres and employees.
时间紧任务重，大家必须努劲儿干啊！
Shíjiān jǐn rènwù zhòng，dàjiā bìxū nǔjìnr gàn a！
Since time is running out and the matter is pressing, you should all exert yourselves
身为裨将，必须努力配合主将的工作。
Shēnwéi píjiàng，bìxū nǔlì pèihé zhǔjiàng de gōngzuò。
As a subordinate general, you have to cooperate fully with the commanding general.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
他如此青眼看待你，你该更加努力才是。
Tā rúcǐ qīngyǎn kàndài nǐ，nǐ gāi gèngjiā nǔlì cáishì。
He looks on you with such favor, you really ought to work harder.
你应该努力拓宽自己的社交圈。
Nǐ yīnggāi nǔlì tuòkuān zìjǐ de shèjiāoquān。
You should try to expand your social relationships.
他生财有道，这些年通过自己的努力做生意赚了不少钱。
Tā shēngcái yǒu dào，zhèxiē nián tōngguò zìjǐ de nǔlì zuò shēngyì zhuàn le bùshǎo qián。
He has many ways to become rich and has accumulated a lot of money through his business efforts.
你不要总埋怨时乖运蹇，不努力是你不能成功的根本原因。
Nǐ búyào zǒng mányuàn shíguāi yùnjiǎn，bùnǔlì shì nǐ bùnéng chénggōng de gēnběn yuányīn。
Don\'t always complain about bad luck. The fundamental reason for your failure is that you haven\'t tried hard enough.
承蒙抬爱，我将继续努力，争取取得更大的成绩。
Chéngméng tái\'ài，wǒ jiāng jìxù nǔlì，zhēngqǔ qǔdé gèngdà de chéngjì。
With your care and support, I will continue to work hard so as to achieve more.
你交待的任务我一定会努力完成，万死不辞！
Nǐ jiāodài de rènwù wǒ yídìng huì nǔlì wánchéng，wànsǐ bùcí！
I\'m willing to risk any danger to finish the task you gave me!
经过几个月的努力，考古队终于发现了文化层。
Jīngguò jǐgè yuè de nǔlì，kǎogǔduì zhōng yú fāxiàn le wénhuà céng。
After several months, the archeologists finally found the cultural stratum.
经过几年的努力，他终于成了一名舞星。
Jīngguò jǐnián de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú chéng le yìmíng wǔxīng。
After several years of hard work, he finally become a star dancer.
通过自己的努力，他让那些小看他的人对他刮目相看！
Tōngguò zìjǐ de nǔlì，tā ràng nàxiē xiǎokàn tā de rén duì tā guāmù xiāngkàn！
He made those who looked down upon him look at him with new eyes with his hard work.
几经努力，他终于考中了孝廉。
Jǐjīng nǔlì，tā zhōng yú kǎozhòng le xiàolián。
With hard work, he finally became the second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
经过多年努力，小张终于撷取了大奖赛的桂冠。
Jīngguò duōnián nǔlì，Xiǎo Zhāng zhōng yú xiéqǔ le dàjiǎngsài de guìguàn。
After many years\' efforts, Xiao Zhang finally won the first prize in the game.
经过多年的努力，他终于修练成了这独门武艺。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú xiūliàn chéng le zhè dúmén wǔyì。
After years of endeavor, he finally learned this unique set of martial arts.
学海无涯苦作舟，想要学业有成必须经过一番努力。
Xuéhǎi wúyá kǔzuòzhōu，xiǎngyào xuéyè yǒuchéng bìxū jīngguò yì fān nǔlì。
There is no end in learning. A lot of efforts are needed for final achievement.
经过几年的努力，收集逸诗的工作终于结束。
Jīngguò jǐnián de nǔlì，shōují yìshī de gōngzuò zhōng yú jiéshù。
After years of hard work, the collection of outstanding poems has finally been completed.
他不断的努力，始终相信自己有展翅高飞的那一天。
Tā búduàn de nǔlì，shǐ zhōng xiāngxìn zìjǐ yǒu zhǎnchì gāofēi de nàyìtiān。
He works hard continuously, believing that he can soar to great heights one day.
经过多方努力，两国关系终于正常化了。
Jīngguò duōfāng nǔlì，liǎng guó guānxì zhōng yú zhèngchánghuà le。
Thanks to the efforts made by all the parties, the relationship between the two countries has finally normalized.
我们在正当年时要努力工作。
Wǒmen zài zhèng dāngnián shí yào nǔlì gōngzuò。
We should work hard when we are in the prime of life.
一个人只要走上正途，经过努力就一定会成功。
Yígè rén zhǐyào zǒushàng zhèngtú，jīngguò nǔlì jiù yídìng huì chénggōng。
As long as one goes on the right path, he will definitely achieve great success through his own efforts.
想要让自己的技术达到匠石斫鼻的地步，是需要一番努力的。
Xiǎngyào ràng zìjǐ de jìshù dádào jiàngshí zhuóbí de dìbù，shì xūyào yì fān nǔlì de。
One must make great effort before upgrading his skills to an outstanding level.
努力耕耘总是会有收获的。
Nǔlì gēngyún zǒngshì huì yǒu shōuhuò de。
Hard work is eventually rewarded.
他一直想考上军事科学院，所以他一直努力学习。
Tā yìzhí xiǎng kǎoshàng jūnshì kēxuéyuàn，suǒyǐ tā yìzhí nǔlì xuéxí。
He has been dreaming of entering the military science academy, so he is studying hard all the time.
他是个有事业心的人，每天都以努力工作为乐事。

He is a man with career ambitions, and considers working hard every day to be a pleasure.

After many years\' efforts, the social security system in our country is becoming more and more complete.
经过一天的努力，嫌疑犯的拼图已经做出来了。

After a day\'s hard work, the profile of the suspect is worked out.
我的水平并不高，只是尽自己的努力罢了。
Wǒde shuǐpíng bìngbùgāo，zhǐshì jìn zìjǐde nǔlì bàle。
My average is not high, but I put in my best effort that\'s all there is to it.
我们的努力没有白费。
Wǒmende nǔlì méiyǒubáifèi。
Our efforts have not been wasted.
老师拿不努力的学生没办法。
Lǎoshī ná bùnǔlìde xuésheng méibànfǎ。
Teachers can do nothing about lazy students.

Some students are lazy most of the time, and then try to cram just before the exams.
没考好没什么大不了，再努力点就是了。

If you don\'t do well in your exams it\'s not serious – you\'ll just have to work a bit harder.

Wǒmen dàjiā bìxū jìxùnǔlì。
We must all keep on trying.
她不很聪明，但很努力。
Tā bùhěncōngmíng，dàn hěnnǔlì。
She wasn\'t very clever, but she was very hardworking.

We have no alternative but to expel you from the factory.
这家书店陈售的书籍种类齐全。
Zhèjiā shūdiàn chénshòu de shūjí zhǒng lèi qíquán。
The book store sells all kinds of books.
古籍书的重刊对后人做研究很有帮助。
Gǔjíshū de chóngkān duì hòurén zuò yánjiū hěnyǒu bāngzhù。
Reprinted editions of ancient books are very helpful for research.
重名太多，给户籍管理带来了很大的困难。
Chóngmíng tài duō，gěi hùjí guǎnlǐ dàilái le hěndà de kùnnan。
There are too many namesakes, causing great difficulty to administration of residential registration.
重修古籍是一件难在当今功在千古的事情。
Chóngxiū gǔjí shì yíjiàn nánzàidāngjīn gōngzàiqiāngǔ de shìqing。
Recomposing and editing ancient books is a difficult task, but future generations will be rewarded by our effort.
中国各大足球俱乐部纷纷聘请外籍教练出掌球队的帅印。
Zhōngguó gè dà zúqiú jùlèbùfēnfēn pìnqǐng wàijí jiàoliàn chūzhǎng qiúduì de shuàiyìn。
Big football clubs in China employed foreign coaches to take charge of their football teams.
这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de gǔjí dōu bǎocúnzài sìmiào de dìgōng lǐmian。
These precious ancient books were preserved in the temple\'s basement.
这个村子的地籍管理得很混乱。
Zhège cūnzi de dìjí guǎnlǐ de hěnhùnluàn。
The land registry management in this village is very confusing.
这个电子书库收录了大量的中国古代典籍。
Zhège diànzǐ shūkù shōulù le dàliàng de Zhōngguó gǔdài diǎnjí。
This electronic library contains a great number of ancient Chinese books.
他是定向生，毕业后要回到原籍工作。
Tā shì dìng xiàng shēng，bìyè hòu yào huí dào yuánjí gōngzuò。
He is a student taking leave from work for special training, so he will go back to his post after graduation.
古代数学书籍中有很多关于勾股形的记载。
Gǔdài shùxué shūjí zhōng yǒu hěnduō guānyú gōugǔxíng de jìzǎi。
There are many records on right-angle triangles in ancient mathematics books.
对古籍史料的勾稽工作要严谨、科学地进行，以免误导后人。

We should proceed in the compilation of ancient books and files carefully and scientifically so as not to mislead later generations.
他已经带着母亲的棺柩回原籍守孝去了。
Tā yǐjing dài zhe mǔqīn de guānjiù huí yuánjí shǒuxiào qù le。
He has returned to his ancestral home with his mother\'s coffin to observe mourning for his mother.
他母亲临终时嘱咐儿女把她归葬原籍。

He left his hometown and has lived in Beijing for thirty years.
书籍里的评论，常以原作正文中夹批、书页上端眉批、章节前后总批等形式出现。
Shūjí lǐ de pínglùn，cháng yǐ yuánzuò zhèngwén zhōng jiápī、shūyè shàngduān méipī、zhāngjié qiánhòu zǒngpī děng xíngshì chūxiàn。
The comments on the book are written between lines, in the top margin and between chapters.
这本经籍是用梵文写的，很难读懂。
Zhèběn jīngjí shì yòng fànwén xiě de，hěnnán dúdǒng。

这些书籍都是毛装的，没有进行切边处理。

This difficult idea seems to evade her.
Tā sìhū zài duǒbì zhège kùnnan de guāndiǎn。
她似乎在躲避这个困难的观点。
她让女儿到树荫下面去玩，躲开日光的直接炙晒。
Tā ràng nǚ\'ér dào shùyīn xiàmiàn qù wán，duǒkāi rìguāng de zhíjiē zhìshài。
She told her daughter to play in the shade, out of the hot sun.
躲开！
Duǒkāi!
Get out of the way!

Wèile duǒkāi shāngxīndì，tā liúyù Shànghǎi zhèzuò fánhuá de chéngshì。
In order to leave the painful place, he went to Shanghai and lived in that prosperous city.
战争刚一开始，他就躲进一处庇护所。
Zhànzhēng gāng yì kāishǐ，tā jiù duǒjìn yíchù bìhùsuǒ。
He hid himself in a shelter center when the war started.

Tā shìtú tuì dào zìjǐ zuòwèi shàng，duǒkāi tāmen de dǎdòu。
她试图退到自己座位上，躲开他们的打斗。

Bàofēngyǔ kuàiyào lái le，niǎor dōu duǒcáng qǐlái。
As the storm approached, the birds were seeking shelter.
尽管逃犯再三躲藏，最终还是被警察擒获。
Jìnguǎn táofàn zàisān duǒcáng，zuìzhōng háishi bèi jǐngchá qínhuò。
Though hiding again and again, the escaped criminal was eventually arrested by the police.
看到前方发生警匪枪战，他赶快走避躲藏。
Kàndào qiánfāng fāshēng jǐngfěi qiāngzhàn，tā gǎnkuài zǒubì duǒcáng。
Seeing the gun fight between the police and the bandits, he immediately ran away and hid.
案发后，他东躲西藏，可还是没有逃过法律的治裁。
Ànfā hòu，tā dōngduǒxīcáng，kě háishi méiyǒu táoguò fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
After commiting the crime he tried hard to hide from the reach of justice, but he couldn\'t.
四处躲藏
无处躲藏
to stay low
在躲藏着
to come out of hiding
从躲藏处出来
These animals are all crafty and   clever at hiding.
Zhè xiē dòngwù dōu hěn jiǎohuá ，tāmen shàncháng duǒcáng。
这些动物都很狡猾，它们擅长躲藏。
I\'m gonna hole up with him.
Wǒ yào hé tā duǒcáng qǐlái。
我要和他躲藏起来。
He pitched the bag out the window so he could hide.
Tā bǎ bāo rēng dào chuānghu wàimiàn，yǐbiàn duǒcáng。
他把包扔到窗户外面，以便躲藏。
He hid in the separation between walls.
Tā duǒcáng zài liǎng dǔ qiáng zhījiān。
他躲藏在两堵墙之间。
孩子们扒着窗台看游行队伍。
Háizimen bā zhe chuāngtái kàn yóuxíng duìwu。
Holding on to the windowsill, the children watched the parade.
刚才有一拨子队伍从这里过去了。
Gāngcái yǒu yì bōzi duìwu cóng zhèlǐ guòqù le。
A group of soldiers passed by just now.
队伍的步子走得很整齐。
Duìwǔ de bùzi zǒu de hěn zhěngqí。
The soldiers marched in step.
游行队伍让马队给冲散了。
Yóuxíngduìwu ràng mǎduì gěi chōngsàn le。
The demonstrators were scattered by the mounted police.
处心积虑地破坏革命队伍的团结
chǔxīnjīlǜ de pòhuài gémìngduìwu de tuánjié
be bent on undermining the unity of the revolutionary ranks
队伍就要出发了。
Duìwǔ jiùyào chūfā le。
The troops are about to set out.

Duìwu jiāsù qiánjìn。

Jīnnián tā zhōng yú shíxiàn le mèngxiǎng cóngzhēng rùwǔ le。
He finally realized his dream of being recruited by the armed forces this year.
他在入伍期间一直是一个通讯兵。
Tā zài rùwǔ qījiān yìzhí shì yígè tōngxùnbīng。
He was a communication soldier during his period in the army.
由于边关战事连连，每家的男劳力都被征入伍。
Yóuyú biānguān zhànshì liánlián，měi jiā de nánláolì dōu bèizhēng rùwǔ。
Owing to frequent wars on the border, all male laborers have been enlisted into the army.
应征入伍
yìngzhēngrùwǔ 
enlist
他毫不犹豫地加入了支援西部的大学生队伍。
Tā háobùyóuyù de jiārù le zhīyuán xībù de dàxuésheng duìwu。
He joined in the undergraduates in assisting the western region without second thought.
入伍
从征入伍。
他入伍五年，其间多次得到连队嘉奖。
应召入伍。
The new men were eager to fight.
Zhèxiē xīn rùwǔ de rén jíqiè xiǎng tóurù zhàndòu。
这些新入伍的人急切想投入战斗。
The Army refused to draft him.
军队拒绝让他入伍。
All the men were drafted in time of war.
Zhànshí，suǒyǒu de nánrén bèi zhēngzhào rùwǔ。
战时，所有的男人被征召入伍。
He is waiting to be drafted.
Tā zhèng děngdài zhēngbīng rùwǔ。
他正等待征兵入伍。
His mother looked at him dolefully when he told her he had joined the army.
Dāng tā gàosu zìjǐ de mǔqīn zìjǐ yǐjīng cānjūnrùwǔ shí，tā de mǔqīn shāngxīn de kànzhe tā。
当他告诉自己的母亲自己已经参军入伍时，他的母亲伤心地看着他。
The men were conscripted.
Zhège rén yīngzhāo rùwǔ le。
这个人应招入伍了。
She is a strong contender for the team.
她是入选队伍强有力的竞争者。
He negotiated his way into the performance, by talking to the director.
Tā tōngguò gēn dǎoyǎn tánhuà jìnrùle biǎoyǎn duìwu。
他通过跟导演谈话进入了表演队伍。
The top two teams will progress to the quarter finals.
Qián liǎng míng de duìwu huì jìnrù sìfēnzhīyī juésài。
前两名的队伍会进入四分之一决赛。
The two companies have joined forces in car production.
Liǎng jiā gōngsī dōu jiārù dào shēngchǎn qìchē de duìwu zhōng lái。
两家公司都加入到生产汽车的队伍中来。
They joined the long silent line of monks filing into the church.
Tāmen jiārù chángcháng de chénmò de sēnglǚ duìwu，páichéng zòngduì xiàngzhe jiàotáng qiánjìn。
他们加入长长的沉默的僧侣队伍，排成纵队向着教堂前进。
The team\'s continued success is attributable to a steady infusion of new talent.
Nà zhī duìwu de chíxù chénggōng guīyīn yú xīn réncái de wěndìng shūrù。
那支队伍的持续成功归因于新人才的稳定输入。
Everyone in the sales team was laid off in a clean sweep of that department.
Zài chèdǐ qīnglǐ nàgè bùmén shí，xiāoshòu duìwǔ de suǒyǒu rén dōu bèi jiěgù le。
在彻底清理那个部门时，销售队伍的所有人都被解雇了。
他的思维方式落伍了。
Tā de sīwéi fāngshì luòwǔ le。

落伍
luòwǔ

落伍。

That music is so lame.

He\'s been out of the swim for a long time!
Tā zǎojiù luòwǔ le！
他早就落伍了！

She watched amazed as the broken ranks filed past in utter silence.

I have been a champion of the team since I was little.
Cóng wǒ hěn xiǎo de shíhou qǐ，wǒ jiùshì zhè zhī duìwu de yōnghù zhě。
从我很小的时候起，我就是这支队伍的拥护者。
He charged through to score and give his team the lead.
Tā chōngpò fángshǒu xiǎng défēn shǐ tā de duìwu lǐngxiān。
他冲破防守想得分使他的队伍领先。
The streets were full of cheering crowds as the parade went past.

当游行队伍经过的时候，街道上满是欢呼雀跃的人群。
The team choked in the final minutes of the game.

They are a cohesive team fighting to achieve the same objective.

他们是一支有凝聚力的队伍，为了共同的目标而奋斗。

忠于职守
zhōnɡyú zhíshǒu 
be faithful in the discharge of one\'s duties; be devoted to one\'s duty
忠实于原文
zhōnɡshí yú yuánwén 
true (or faithful) to the original
译文必须忠实于原文的主旨。
Yìwén bìxū zhōngshíyú yuánwén de zhǔzhǐ。
A translated text should be true to the purpose of the original.
良药苦口利于病，忠言逆耳利于行。
Liángyào kǔkǒu lìyú bìng，zhōng yán nì\'ěr lìyú xíng。
Just as bitter medicine cures sickness, unpalatable advice benefits conduct.
他对我的忠告无动于衷。
Tā duì wǒ de zhōng gào wúdòngyú zhōng。
He turned a deaf ear to my advice.
俗话说得好，忠言逆耳利于行。
Súhuà shuō de hǎo，zhōng yán nìěr lìyú xíng。
As thea saying goes, honest advice, though unpleasant to the ear, benefits conduct.
岳飞以他的精忠报国精神显扬于世。
Yuè Fēi yǐ tā de jīng zhōng bàoguó jīngshén xiǎnyáng yú shì。
Yue Fei is famous for his loyalty to his country.
忠于祖国。
效忠于人民。
忠于信仰，坚守贞操。

忠言逆耳利于行。

你做好忠于婚姻的准备了吗？
He suspected her of not being fully loyal to him.
Tā huáiyí tā bìng bù wánquán zhōngyú tā。
他怀疑她并不完全忠于他。
to be faithful to
[+book，film] 忠实于
I plight that I will always be faithful to my work.
Wǒ fāshì wǒ huì yìzhí zhōngchéngyú wǒ de gōngzuò。
我发誓我会一直忠诚于我的工作。
He remained faithful to his wife.
Tā yīrán zhōngshíyú tā qīzǐ。
他依然忠实于他妻子。
He kept his emotionless objectivity and faith in the cause he served.
Tā bǎochí bú lù qínggǎn de kèguānxìng，bìng zhōngshí yú tā suǒ cóngshì de shìyè。
他保持不露情感的客观性，并忠实于他所从事的事业。
She was true to her significant other.
Tā zhōngshí yú tā zhàngfu。
她忠实于她丈夫。
He reaffirmed his faith in the church.
Tā chóngshēn，tā zhōngshí yú jiàohuì。
他重申，他忠实于教会。
What can be said for sure is that Mr Bolton is staying true to his own principles.
kěyǐ kěndìng de shì，bō dùn jiāng zhōngshíyú zìjǐ de yuánzé。
可以肯定的是，波顿将忠实于自己的原则。
The engaged couple broke up because of infidelity.
Yóuyú bù zhōngshí，zhè duì wèihūn fūfù fēnshǒule。
由于不忠实，这对未婚夫妇分手了。
out of loyalty to sb
出于对某人的忠诚
忠勇之心
zhōnɡyǒnɡ zhī xīn 
loyalty and courage
杨家将忠心保国，骁勇善战，垂名千载。
Yángjiājiàng zhōng xīn bǎoguó，xiāoyǒng shànzhàn，chuímíng qiānzǎi。
The Yang family were not only devoted to safeguarding the country but also brave and skillful in warfare, so they have an everlasting fame in history.
他对自己的主子很忠心，哪怕前面是火海刀山也会勇往向前。
Tā duì zìjǐ de zhǔzi hěn zhōng xīn，nǎpà qiánmiàn shì huǒhǎi dāoshān yě huì yǒngwǎng xiàng qián。
He is very loyal to his master, willing to charge ahead even into the most dangerous places.
招募忠勇之士，杀敌报国。
《义胆忠魂》是他最喜欢看的影片。
《Yìdǎnzhōnghún》shì tā zuìxǐhuankàn de yǐngpiàn。
&quot;A Brave Heart and a Loyal Soul&quot; is his favorite film.
忠义。
忠义节烈。
忠肝义胆令人钦羡。
重礼义，倡忠恕。
良药苦口利于病，忠言逆耳利于行。

忠言逆耳
zhōngyánnì\'ěr
the truth hurts
古代，忠臣往往因为直言规谏君王而遭受处罚。
Gǔdài，zhōng chén wǎngwǎng yīnwèi zhíyán guījiàn jūnwáng ér zāoshòu chǔfá。
In ancient times, loyal officials were always punished after directly speaking out against the emperor.
忠言逆耳
忠言进谏。
忠言逆耳利于行。
忠言相告。
《论语》忠实地记录了孔子的言行。
You have to be cruel to be kind.
Nǐ bùdébù xiān zhōngyánnì\'ěr。

忠实的信徒
zhōngshí de xìntú 
a faithful disciple
他为人忠厚朴实，大家都信任他。
Tā wéirén zhōnghòu-pǔshí，dàjiā dōu xìnrèn tā。
He\'s loyal and honest – everybody trusts him.
忠于信仰，坚守贞操。
信而见疑，忠而被谤
an ardent disciple
虔诚的信徒，忠实的追随者
Trust and fidelity are essential for a lasting, successful relationship.
Xìnrèn hé zhōngchéng shì chíjiǔ ér chénggōng de guānxi de zhēndì。
信任和忠诚是持久而成功的关系的真谛。

Tā de xíngwéi shì duì yí gè zhèngzhì xìnyǎng mángmù zhōngchéng dǎozhì de。
他的行为是对一个政治信仰盲目忠诚导致的。

他坚信年轻人从一开始就该得到性知识方面的一些忠告。

chìdǎnzhōngxīn wèi rénmín
serve the people with utter devotion
忠心耿耿为革命
zhōngxīngěnggěng wèi gémìng

表忠心
biǎo zhōnɡxīn 
express one\'s loyalty

I wish grandpa a peaceful life in his late years, and a good fortune.

忠贞不渝
zhōngzhēnbùyú
unswervingly loyal
他性情忠厚，但绝不是大笨伯。
Tā xìngqíng zhōng hòu，dàn jué búshì dàbènbó。
He is honest and kind-hearted, but he is by no means stupid.
黜退忠良，社稷危矣。
Chùtuì zhōngliáng,shèjì wēi yǐ.
We will endanger our country if we demote our most noble and talented citizens.
杨家将忠心保国，骁勇善战，垂名千载。
Yángjiājiàng zhōng xīn bǎoguó，xiāoyǒng shànzhàn，chuímíng qiānzǎi。
The Yang family were not only devoted to safeguarding the country but also brave and skillful in warfare, so they have an everlasting fame in history.
古代，忠臣往往因为直言规谏君王而遭受处罚。
Gǔdài，zhōng chén wǎngwǎng yīnwèi zhíyán guījiàn jūnwáng ér zāoshòu chǔfá。
In ancient times, loyal officials were always punished after directly speaking out against the emperor.
我忠心祝愿爷爷安享晚年，洪福齐天。
Wǒ zhōng xīn zhùyuàn yéye ānxiǎng wǎnnián，hóngfú qítiān。
I wish grandpa a peaceful life in his late years, and a good fortune.
他对自己的主子很忠心，哪怕前面是火海刀山也会勇往向前。
Tā duì zìjǐ de zhǔzi hěn zhōng xīn，nǎpà qiánmiàn shì huǒhǎi dāoshān yě huì yǒngwǎng xiàng qián。
He is very loyal to his master, willing to charge ahead even into the most dangerous places.
精忠报国是他的座右铭。
Jīng zhōng bàoguó shì tā de zuòyòumíng。
His motto is to dedicate himself to the service of his country.
他是一位屡建功勋的屏藩忠臣。
Tā shì yíwèi lǚjiàn gōngxūn de píngfān zhōng chén。
He is a loyal official who has made some great contributions.
白玉堂是宋朝一个侠胆忠肝的英雄。
Bái Yùtáng shì Sòngcháo yígè xiádǎnzhōnggān de yīngxióng。
Bai Yutang is a chivalrous, and fearless hero.
岳飞以他的精忠报国精神显扬于世。
Yuè Fēi yǐ tā de jīng zhōng bàoguó jīngshén xiǎnyáng yú shì。
Yue Fei is famous for his loyalty to his country.
他们对国家效死尽忠，发誓决不当叛徒。
Tāmen duì guójiā xiàosǐ jìn zhōng，fāshì jué bùdāng pàntú。
They devote their lives to the motherland and vow to die rather than become a traitor.
按照丈夫的遗愿，烈士夫人将忠骨抛洒到海中。
Ànzhào zhàngfū de yíyuàn，lièshì fūrén jiāng zhōnggǔ pāosǎ dào hǎizhōng。
According to her dead husband\'s wishes, the martyr\'s wife threw his remains into the sea.
《义胆忠魂》是他最喜欢看的影片。
《Yìdǎnzhōnghún》shì tā zuìxǐhuankàn de yǐngpiàn。
&quot;A Brave Heart and a Loyal Soul&quot; is his favorite film.
她一直是个忠良的好姑娘。
Tā yìzhí shì gè zhōng liáng de hǎo gūniang。
She is a faithful and upright girl.
他拥有忠良的优秀品格。
Tā yōngyǒu zhōng liáng de yōuxiù pǐngé。
He has a loyal and honest character.
他们都是我们崇拜的新时期的忠烈人士。
Tāmen dōushì wǒmen chóngbài de xīn shíqī de zhōng liè rénshì。
They are the martyrs of the new time who we respect very much.
清明节的时候，我们去为忠烈扫墓。
Qīngmíngjié de shíhou，wǒmen qù wèi zhōng liè sǎomù。
During the Tomb Sweeping Festival, we went to clean the graves of martyrs.
儒家思想提倡忠恕。
Rújiā sīxiǎng tíchàng zhōng shù。
Confucianists advocate the idea of loyalty and consideration.
俗话说得好，忠言逆耳利于行。
Súhuà shuō de hǎo，zhōng yán nìěr lìyú xíng。
As thea saying goes, honest advice, though unpleasant to the ear, benefits conduct.
在下对您忠贞不二。
Zàixià duì nín zhōngzhēn búèr.
I am completely devoted to you.
他向来忠直，不会做出这种事。
Tā xiàng lái zhōng zhí，búhuì zuòchū zhèzhǒng shì。
He is always loyal and honest and would never have done something like this.
疾风知劲草，板荡识忠良。
Jífēng zhī jìncǎo，bǎndàng shí zhōng liáng。
Gales test grass, turbulence tests officials.
这些大臣对国君都是忠心耿耿的。
Zhèxiē dàchén duì guójūn dōushì zhōngxīngěnggěng de。
These officials are very faithful to the emperor.
他们的爱情忠贞不渝。
Tāmen de àiqíng zhōngzhēnbùyú。
The love between them is unswervingly loyal.
忠诚
zhōngchéng
loyal
人们经常把狗当作最忠实的朋友。
Rénmen jīngcháng bǎ gǒu dàngzuò zuìzhōngshíde péngyou。
People often regard dogs as their most loyal friends.
忠言逆耳
zhōngyánnì\'ěr
the truth hurts
一片忠心
yípiàn zhōngxīn
in all sincerity
他为人忠厚朴实，大家都信任他。
Tā wéirén zhōnghòu-pǔshí，dàjiā dōu xìnrèn tā。
He\'s loyal and honest – everybody trusts him.
忠贞不渝
Zhōngzhēnbùyú
unswervingly loyal
译文必须忠实于原文的主旨。
Yìwén bìxū zhōngshíyú yuánwén de zhǔzhǐ。
A translated text should be true to the purpose of the original.
