In the circumstances it was expedient to express loyalty.
Zài zhè zhǒng qíngkuàng xià zuìhǎo háishì biǎoshì zhōngxīn。
在这种情况下最好还是表示忠心。
It is impossible to be allegiant to two opposing forces.
Duì liǎng zhǒng díduì shìlì dōu zhōngxīn xiàolì shì bù kěnéng de。
对两种敌对势力都忠心效力是不可能的。
He followed his leader unquestioningly.
Tā zhōngshí de zhuīsuízhe tā de lǐngdǎo。
他忠实地追随着他的领导。
His wife played him false.
Tā de qīzǐ duì tā bù zhōng。
他的妻子对他不忠。
Her husband was unfaithful.
Tā zhàngfu bù zhōngchéng。
她丈夫不忠诚。
His men acted disloyally and betrayed him in the end.
Tā de shǔxià duì tā bù zhōngchéng，bìng zuìzhōng chūmàile tā。
他的属下对他不忠诚，并最终出卖了他。
He kept his emotionless objectivity and faith in the cause he served.
Tā bǎochí bú lù qínggǎn de kèguānxìng，bìng zhōngshí yú tā suǒ cóngshì de shìyè。
他保持不露情感的客观性，并忠实于他所从事的事业。
She was true to her significant other.
Tā zhōngshí yú tā zhàngfu。
她忠实于她丈夫。
He was baronetized for his loyalty to the country.
Tā yīn duì guójiā de zhōngchéng ér shòufēng nánjué。
他因对国家的忠诚而受封男爵。
His cogitations were dutifully recorded in his daybook.
Tā bǎ zìjǐ de sīxiǎng zhōngshí de jìlù zài le zìjǐ de rìjì zhōng。
他把自己的思想忠实地记录在了自己的日记中。
She condoned her husband\'s occasional infidelities.
Tā kuānshùle tā zhàngfu ǒu\'ěr de bù zhōng。
她宽恕了他丈夫偶尔的不忠。
He reaffirmed his faith in the church.
Tā chóngshēn，tā zhōngshí yú jiàohuì。
他重申，他忠实于教会。
The solidness of her faith gave her enduring hope.
Tā duì zhōngchéng de jiānzhēn-búèr gěile tā chángjiǔ de xīwàng。
她对忠诚的坚贞不二给了她长久的希望。

Tā shuō de měi jù huà wǒ dōuhuì fèngchéng。
他说的每句话我都会奉承。
She always sucks up to her brother.
Tā zǒngshì fèngchéng tā gēge。
她总是奉承她哥哥。
The only reason they sucked up to them was for business.
Tāmen zhīsuǒyǐ fèngchéng tāmen shì wèile zuòchéng mǎimai。
他们之所以奉承他们是为了做成买卖。
His ego was tickled by the implicit flattery of the journalist\'s attention.
Nàgè jìzhě de xùyì fèngchéng shǐ tā de zìfù dédàole mǎnzú。
那个记者的蓄意奉承使他的自负得到了满足。
She has become submissive and subservient.
Tā biàn de shùncóng、fèngchéng。
她变得顺从、奉承。
She behaves ingratiatingly toward her boss.
Tā duì tā de lǎobǎn qǔyìfèngchéng。
她对她的老板曲意奉承。
She acts obsequiously toward her boss.
Tā duì tā de lǎobǎn qǔyìfèngchéng。
她对她的老板曲意奉承。

他遵从她意志的行为非常具有奉承性。

挡雨
dǎngyǔ 
keep off the rain; shelter one from the rain
挡风
dǎngfēng 
shelter sth. from (or keep out) the wind
挡路
dǎnglù 
be (or get) in the way
挡光
dǎngguāng 
be (or get) in the light
炉挡儿
lúdǎngr 
(fire) fender; fire screen
窗挡子
chuāngdǎngzi
window blind (or shade)
前进(倒) 挡
qiánjìn（dào）dǎng 
forward (reverse) gear
高速(低速) 挡
gāosù（dīsù）dǎng 
top (bottom) gear
抵挡风寒
dǐdǎng fēnghán 
keep out the wind and the cold
抵挡洪水
dǐdǎng hóngshuǐ 
keep the flood in check
抵挡突然袭击
dǐdǎng tūrán xíjī 
withstand a sudden attack
调挡
diàodàng 
shift gears
挂高速挡
guà gāosùdǎng
change to (or put into) high gear
挂头挡
guà tóudǎng
engage the first gear

关心人民的疾苦
guānxīn rénmín de jíkǔ 
be concerned about the weal and woe of the people
痛陈民间疾苦
tòngchén mínjiān jíkǔ 
give an accusing account of the people\'s sufferings
疾苦
jíkǔ
sufferings; hardships
他过着轻裘肥马的生活，怎么能知道民间的疾苦？
Tā guò zhe qīngqiú féimǎ de shēnghuó，zěnme néng zhīdào mínjiān de jíkǔ？
They lead a luxurious life, how can they know the hardships of the people?
疾苦。
体念灾区人民的疾苦。
时刻把群众的疾苦放在心上。
他对群众的疾苦无动于衷，真是个冷血动物。
深知田间疾苦。
对群众的疾苦绝不能视而不见，听而不闻。
恶疾缠身，苦不堪言
Government reaches out to the people.
Zhèngfǔ yīngdāng liǎojiě rénmín de jíkǔ。
政府应当了解人民的疾苦。
疾风知劲草，板荡识忠良。
Jífēng zhī jìncǎo，bǎndàng shí zhōng liáng。
Gales test grass, turbulence tests officials.
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，板荡识诚臣。
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，路遥知马力
疾风劲草，越是危难时刻，我们越需要坚强。
Jífēng jìncǎo，yuè shì wēinàn shíkè，wǒmen yuè xūyào jiānqiáng。
The strength of character is tested in a crisis. The more difficult the situation is, the more brave we should be.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
疾风知劲草，板荡识忠良。
Jífēng zhī jìncǎo，bǎndàng shí zhōng liáng。
Gales test grass, turbulence tests officials.
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，板荡识诚臣。
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，路遥知马力
疾风劲吹，草木披靡。
疾风
jífēng
strong wind; gale
疾风劲草，越是危难时刻，我们越需要坚强。
Jífēng jìncǎo，yuè shì wēinàn shíkè，wǒmen yuè xūyào jiānqiáng。
The strength of character is tested in a crisis. The more difficult the situation is, the more brave we should be.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。

Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
疾风知劲草，板荡识忠良。
Jífēng zhī jìncǎo，bǎndàng shí zhōng liáng。
Gales test grass, turbulence tests officials.
妈妈由于长年的操劳，积劳成疾，患上了类风湿。
Māma yóuyú chángnián de cāoláo，jīláo chéngjí，huànshàng le lèifēngshī。
Due to years of toil, my mother broke down from constant overwork and suffered from rheumatism.
大概又发生火灾了，消防车像风一样疾驰而过。
Dàgài yòu fāshēng huǒzāi le，xiāofángchē xiàng fēng yíyàng jíchí érguò。
A fire has broken out somewhere, a fire engine rushes by.
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，板荡识诚臣。
疾风知劲草。
疾风知劲草，路遥知马力
疾风暴雨。
一阵疾风夹带着沙粒扑面而来。
疾风劲吹，草木披靡。
迎风疾进。
Ships with square sails sail fairly efficiently with the wind abaft.
Zhuāngzhe héng fān de chuánzhī suífēng jíchí。
装着横帆的船只随风疾驰。
A spanking breeze is a boon to sailors.
Jíchí de fēng shì gěi shuǐshǒumen de yì zhǒng ēncì。
疾驰的风是给水手们的一种恩赐。
The rise of AIDS and other deadly diseases along with armed conflicts and social tension make treating leprosy in Africa difficult.
在非洲，武装冲突、社会动荡外加上艾滋病和其它致命疾病的激增使得治愈麻风病变得非常困难。
听到儿子出车祸的消息，他疾步向医院奔去。
Tīngdào érzi chū chēhuò de xiāoxi，tā jíbù xiàng yīyuàn bēnqù。
He ran to the hospital rapidly on hearing the news of his son\'s car accident.
疾步追赶。
My knowledge of mental illness was very basic to say the least.
Tuì yí bù jiǎng，guānyú jīngshen jíbìng，wǒ zhǐyǒu xiāngdāng jīběn de liǎojiě。
退一步讲，关于精神疾病，我只有相当基本的了解。
制止疾病的传播
zhìzhǐ jíbìng de chuánbō 
check the spread of the disease
增强对疾病的抵抗力
zēngqiáng duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì 
build up one\'s resistance to disease
这个地方过去流行的一些疾病已经基本消除。
Zhège dìfāngguòqù liúxíng de yìxiē jíbìng yǐjing jīběn xiāochú。
Diseases formerly prevalent here have been mostly eradicated.
防治疾病
fánɡzhì jíbìnɡ 
prevention and treatment of disease
传染疾病的媒介
chuánrǎn jíbìng de méijiè 
vehicle of disease; vector
潜伏的疾病
qiánfú de jíbìng
an insidious disease
各人的体质不同，对疾病的抵抗力也不同。
Gè rén de tǐzhì bùtóng，duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì yě bùtóng。
People\'s constitutions differ; so does their resistance to disease.
心血管系统疾病和功能障碍
xīnxuèguǎn xìtǒngjíbìnghé gōngnéngzhàng\'ài
cardiovascular system diseases and disorders
受疾病的折磨
shòu jíbìng de zhémó 
suffer severely from a lingering illness
吃不干净的食品会带来疾病。
Chī bùgānjìng de shípǐn huì dàilái jíbìng。
Unhygienic food will cause illness.
临床中，这是个多发性常见疾病。
Línchuáng zhōng，zhè shì gè duōfāxìng chángjiàn jíbìng。
Clinically, it is a frequently-occurring disease.
谷芽入药可治疗消化系统疾病。
Gǔyá rùyào kě zhìliáo xiāohuà xìtǒng jíbìng。
Rice sprouts can be used in medicines that treat illness of the digestive system.
排尿不畅可能是由泌尿系统疾病引起的。
Páiniào búchàng kěnéng shì yóu mìniào xìtǒng jíbìng yǐnqǐ de。
Urination difficulty may be caused by urinary system diseases.
器质性疾病不太好治疗。
Qìzhìxìng jíbìng bú tài hǎo zhìliáo。
Organic diseases are not easily cured.
这位医生对治疗生殖腺疾病非常有经验。
Zhèwèi yīshēng duì zhìliáo shēngzhíxiàn jíbìng fēicháng yǒu jīngyàn。
This doctor is experienced in treating gonad diseases.
经常头晕憋气是心血管疾病的险兆。
Jīngcháng tóuyūn biēqì shì xīnxuèguǎn jíbìng de xiǎnzhào。
Feeling suffocated and dizzy from time to time is a sign of  angiocardiopathy.
小水困难也是一种疾病，可千万不要不当一回事。
Xiǎoshuǐ kùnnan yěshì yìzhǒng jíbìng，kě qiānwàn búyào bùdāng yìhuíshì。
Emiction difficulty is also a kind of disease which cannot be neglected.
丽丽的言行举止异于常人，是不是得了心理疾病？
Lìlì de yánxíng jǔzhǐ yìyú chángrén，shìbushì dé le xīnlǐ jíbìng？
Lili is acting strangely, has she got a mental disease?
疾病一定要及早治疗，到了中晚期就不好了。
Jíbìng yídìng yào jízǎo zhìliáo，dào le zhōng wǎnqī jiù bùhǎo le。
Ilness must be treated as early as possible. When it gets to the middle stage or the advanced stage, it will be hard to treat.
病人应该相信他的主治医师对他疾病的诊断。
Bìngrén yīnggāi xiāngxìn tā de zhǔzhìyīshī duì tā jíbìng de zhěnduàn。
The patient should trust the diagnosis given by his physician-in-charge.
忧郁症是一种很难治愈的心理疾病。
Yōuyùzhèng shì yìzhǒng hěnnán zhìyù de xīnlǐ jíbìng。
Melancholia is a kind of psychological disease which is hard to cure.
医生说我可能患有神经末梢疾病。
Yīshēng shuō wǒ kěnéng huànyǒu shénjīngmòshāo jíbìng。
The doctor said that there might be something wrong with my nerve endings.
据说这种疾病会破环人体的血液循环系统。
Jùshuō zhèzhǒng jíbìng huì pòhuài réntǐ de xuèyèxúnhuán xìtǒng。
It is said that this disease can destroy the human blood circulatory system.
我们对这些疾病不可不防。
Wǒmen duì zhèxiējíbìng bùkěbùfáng。
We mustn\'t fail to take steps against such diseases.
苍蝇是许多疾病的传媒。
Cāngyíng shì xǔduōjíbìngde chuánméi。
Flies are the medium of many infections.
我们应该坚持锻炼以增强对疾病的抵抗力。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jiānchíduànliàn yǐ zēngqiáng duì jíbìngde dǐkànglì。
We should take exercise to build up resistance to disease.
防止疾病扩散
fángzhǐ jíbìng kuòsàn
prevent disease from spreading
泌尿系统疾病
mìniào xìtǒng jíbìng
disease of the urinary system
有些疾病可能会遗传。
Yǒuxiē jíbìng kěnéng huì yíchuán。
Some diseases can be hereditary.
她身体虚弱，经常遭受疾病的折磨。
Tā shēntǐ xūruò，jīngcháng zāoshòu jíbìng de zhémó。
She\'s in poor health and often tormented by illness.
有病就应该去看医生，不能讳疾忌医。
Yǒubìng jiù yīnggāi qù kàn yīshēng，bùnéng huìjí jìyī。
If one is sick, he should go to see the doctor rather than concealing the malady for fear of taking medicine.

这是一种传染性很强的疾病

营养不良引致疾病发生
提高抵抗疾病的能力
同疾病作斗争。
对关节类疾病，理疗有一定疗效。

医治疾病。
她自幼生活在疾病的阴影里。
营养不良会导致各种疾病。
战胜疾病。
疾病折服不了这位英雄。
对疾病，既要治标，又要治本。
这次痢疾流行的病源是饮用了被污染的河水。
Catarrhal fever is any of several respiratory or oral diseases of livestock such as bluetongue in horses and sheep.
Kǎtārè shì jǐ lèi jiāqín hūxīxìng huò kǒuqiāngxìng jíbìng zhōng de rènhé yì zhǒng jíbìng，rú mǎ hé yáng de lánshébìng。
卡他热是几类家禽呼吸性或口腔性疾病中的任何一种疾病，如马和羊的蓝舌病。
According to doctors, some diseases fall into the category of stress-related illnesses.
医生认为，一些疾病应归入压力造成的疾病范畴。
This information will help identify disease agents responsible for future disease outbreaks.
Gāi xìnxī jiāng bāngzhù shíbié nàxiē zàochéng wèilái jíbìng fāzuò de jíbìng yuán。
该信息将帮助识别那些造成未来疾病发作的疾病源。
He was invalided by an illness that first afflicted his joints.
Tā yīn yì zhǒng jíbìng ér zhìcán，zhèzhǒng jíbìng zuì chū zhémó zhe tā de guānjié。
他因一种疾病而致残，这种疾病最初折磨着他的关节。
The rise of AIDS and other deadly diseases along with armed conflicts and social tension make treating leprosy in Africa difficult.
在非洲，武装冲突、社会动荡外加上艾滋病和其它致命疾病的激增使得治愈麻风病变得非常困难。
an illness amenable to treatment
易于治疗的疾病
The disease attacked him suddenly.
疾病突然侵袭了他。

那种疾病造成数以千计的人死亡。
Disease often follows malnutrition.
疾病的发生常是营养不良的结果。
the initial stage of a disease
疾病的早期阶段
Medical experts will train health care workers to identify and treat patients with the disease.
医学专家们将训练医护人员，让他们能够够辨别这种疾病，并对患者进行治疗。
Public health officials now say the disease is under control and is not a public health threat.
公共卫生官员日前宣布，这种疾病已经得到控制并且不会对大众健康造成威胁。
Biological factors play a major role in the development of mental illness.
生物因素在精神疾病的发展过程中起着很重要作用。
The dirty water introduced a new disease in that region.
污水给那个地区带来了一种新疾病。
They will prevent sickness, help you feel better, and may even save your life.
他们可以帮你预防疾病，使你病情好转，甚至可能挽救你的生命。
Meningitis is a disease contagious during childbirth.
脑膜炎是一种在分娩过程中传染的疾病。
Histoplasmosis is a disease carried by bats and birds.
组织胞浆菌病是由蝙蝠和鸟类传播的疾病。
Dengue, filariasis, leishmaniasis, onchocerciasis, and American trypanosomiasis (Chagas disease) are other diseases carried by insects.
登革热病、丝虫病、黑热病、盘尾丝虫病及美洲锥虫病（查格斯病）也是由昆虫传播的疾病。
Rats carry nasty diseases.
老鼠传染严重的疾病。
Hypothermia is an extremely complex condition.
体温过低是种非常复杂的疾病。
Exercise has a major part to play in preventing disease.
锻炼对于预防疾病有重要作用。
to succumb to illness
被疾病压垮
mentally ill people in need of support
患心理疾病的人士需要帮助
If a vitamin is absent from the diet, a specific deficiency may develop.
如果饮食中缺乏维生素，可能会导致某种缺乏疾病。
Dengue hemorrhagic fever is a crucial infection disease.
登革热是一种交叉感染的疾病。
A susceptible population is a group of people who are more likely than others to experience a certain disease.
易感人群是指较他人更易得某种疾病的人群。
Obesity is related to many diseases such as high blood pressure and heart disease.
肥胖与许多疾病有关，如高血压和心脏病。
This detection technique is intended to prevent mothers from passing on diseases to their unborn babies.
这个探测方法可防止母亲将疾病传给还未出生的孩子。
He died from this new and untreatable disease.
他死于这种新兴的、无法医治的疾病。
Vitiligo is a chronic skin disease that causes loss of pigment resulting in irregular pale patches of skin.
白斑是一种慢性疾病，致使缺少色素，使皮肤产生不规则的白色斑块。
They are at risk of getting ill and dying from waterborne diseases.
他们正处于水上传播疾病的威胁之中。
Fungi, viruses, and bacteria can cause plant diseases.
真菌、细菌和病毒都可以引起植物疾病。
Early signs of illness can be found in liver cells.
疾病的早期迹象可以从肝细胞中发现。
The doctor prescribed some medicine for my brother\'s mental disorder.
医生为我弟弟的精神紊乱疾病开了些药。
Bulimia is an eating disorder.
暴食症是一种饮食紊乱疾病。
A man\'s spirit sustains him in sickness, but with a crushed spirit who can endure?
人有疾病，心能忍耐；心灵忧伤，谁能承受呢?
She suffered a kind of nervous disease for long and committed suicide in the end.
她长期被一种神经系统的疾病所折磨，最终选择了自杀。
His resistance to the illness was enhanced by the medicine.
这种药物增强了他对疾病的抵抗力。
The disease is spreading, and all children under 5 are at risk.
疾病正在蔓延,所有五岁以下的小孩都有被传染的危险。
A fever can be a symptom for more serious diseases.
发烧可能是一些更严重疾病的症状。
More than half of the original wetlands in the continent of the United States have disappeared in the name of reclamation, disease prevention, and flood control.
在美国大陆，已经有超过一半以上的原始湿地由于废料回收、疾病预防、以及防洪措施而消失了。
The program has effectively prevented the transmission of diseases from dirty water.
这项工作有效抑制了因污水引起的疾病传播。
He felt faint from sickness and hunger.
Yīnwèi jíbìng hé jī\'è，tā gǎndào ruǎnruòwúlì。
因为疾病和饥饿，他感到软弱无力。
The disease is prevalent in temperate areas with high rainfall.
Zhè zhǒng jíbìng zài qìhòuwēnhé jiàngyǔliàng dà de dìqū jiàowéi liúxíng。
这种疾病在气候温和降雨量大的地区较为流行。
We were bitten by ticks, some of which carry dangerous diseases.
Wǒmen bèi shīzi yǎole，qízhōng yǒuxiē shīzi huì chuánrǎn èxìng jíbìng。
我们被虱子咬了，其中有些虱子会传染恶性疾病。
Female mosquitoes have been found to transit diseases.
Rénmen fāxiàn cíwén huì chuánbō jíbìng。
人们发现雌蚊会传播疾病。
Treatments for various illnesses are readily available.
Zhìliáo gè zhǒng jíbìng de fāngfǎ dōushì xiànchéng de。
治疗各种疾病的方法都是现成的。
He could be infected by having sex with an infected woman.
Tā kěnéng yīn yǔ shòu gǎnrǎn de nǚrén xìngjiāo ér bèi chuánrǎn shàng jíbìng。
他可能因与受感染的女人性交而被传染上疾病。
All of us will eventually die from disease, natural disaster, accidents or whatever.
Wǒmen zuìzhōng dūhuì sǐyú jíbìng、 zìrán zāihài、 shìgù děngděng。
我们最终都会死于疾病、自然灾害、事故等等。
In some patients, psychological disorders may be even more important.
Duìyú yìxiē bìngrén éryán，xīnlǐ zhàng\'ài yěxǔ dǎozhì jíbìng gèngjiā zhòngyào yuányīn。
对于一些病人而言，心理障碍也许导致疾病更加重要原因。
Such adventures are associated with mental disturbance.
Zhè cì màoxiǎn yǔ shénjīng zhàng\'ài jíbìng yǒuguān。
这次冒险与神经障碍疾病有关。
Most mental illness is recognizable only from the patient\'s abnormal behaviour.
Dàduōshù jīngshen jíbìng zhǐnéng tōngguò bìngrén de fǎncháng xíngwéi lái fāxiàn。
大多数精神疾病只能通过病人的反常行为来发现。
Being healthy is increasingly viewed as something more than absence of disease.
Shēntǐ jiànkāng yuèláiyuè bèi rénmen shìwéi yì zhǒng bùzhǐ shì wú jíbìng de zhuàngkuàng。
身体健康越来越被人们视为一种不止是无疾病的状况。
This disease has acquired a more deadly attribute than previously seen before.

这种疾病所呈现的危害性比先前看到的更致命。

Dé le lìjí jìhuì chī shēnglěngyóunì。

chuánrǎn jíbìng de méijiè 
vehicle of disease; vector
恶性疟疾
èxìng nüèjí
pernicious malaria

Wǒ cóngzhège cánjírén qǔdé de chéngjiù zhōng dédào qǐdí。
The achievement of the disabled person was an inspiration to me.

Zuǒbiānfēngjí shè rùwǎng，qià zài cǐ shí míngdí zhōng chǎng。
The outside-left sent the ball into the net with a fast shot just before the whistle blew for full time.

qiánfú de jíbìng

jíqū érguò

rǎnshàng le lìji

jíshǐ ér guò

Nà cánjí háizi jiànjiàn hé wǒ sīshóu qǐlái le。

tòngchén mínjiān jíkǔ

yōuláochénɡjí

办交涉
bàn jiāoshè 
carry on negotiations with; take up a matter with
口头交涉
kǒutóu jiāoshè 
verbal representations
经过交涉，问题解决了。
Jīngguò jiāoshè，wèntí jiějué le。
The problem was solved through negotiations.
关于人质问题，双方已经过多次交涉。
Guānyú rénzhì wèntí，shuāngfāng yǐ jīngguò duōcì jiāoshè.
The two sides have negotiated several times over the hostage.
这次交涉以你为主，我帮你敲边鼓。
事情正在交涉的当口儿，还没有结果
经过交涉，他们答应退赔。

我得和房东交涉，让他找人修理浴室的管子。

不容外国干涉
bùróngwàiguó gānshè 
tolerate no foreign interference
外来干涉
wàilái gānshè
external interference
武装干涉
wǔzhuāng gānshè
armed intervention
互不干涉内政
hù bùgānshè nèizhèng
noninterference in each other\'s internal affairs
二者了无干涉。
Èr zhě liǎo wú gānshè。
There is no relation whatsoever between the two.
相长(相消)干涉
xiāngcháng（xiāngxiāo）gānshè
constructive (destructive) interference
横加干涉
héngjiā gānshè
flagrantly interfere
露骨地干涉别国内政
lùgǔ de gānshè bié guó nèizhèng
flagrantly interfere in the internal affairs of another country
明目张胆地进行武装干涉
míngmùzhāngdǎn de jìnxíngwǔzhuānggānshè
brazenly commit armed intervention
一国的内政岂容别国干涉？
Yì guó de nèizhèngqǐ róngbiéguó gānshè?
How can a country tolerate external interference in its internal affairs?
我们无权干涉她的婚姻自由。
Wǒmen wú quán gānshè tā de hūnyīn zìyóu。
We don\'t have the right to interfere with her freedom of choice in marriage.
蓄意干涉别国内政
xùyì gānshè bié guó nèizhèng
be bent on interfering in other countries\' internal affairs
这是我国内政，不允许任何外来干涉。
Zhè shì wǒguó nèizhèng，bùyǔnxǔ rènhé wàilái gānshè。
This is our internal affair which brooks no outside interference.
你走你的阳关大道，我走我的独木桥，我们互不干涉。
Nǐ zǒu nǐ de yángguān dàdào，wǒ zǒu wǒ de dúmùqiáo，wǒmen hùbùgānshè。
You take the wide easy road, and I\'ll cross the narrow log bridge, we won\'t bother with each other.
干涉别人私事
gānshè biérén sīshì
meddle in other people\'s affairs
横加干涉
结婚必须男女双方自愿，不允许第三者强迫或干涉
家长不要过多干涉子女的婚恋
他与此事并无干涉
老人很开通，不干涉子女的婚事。
不干涉别国内政。
任从他去做，不要乱干涉。
无权干涉。
I will brook no interference.
我决不容许任何干涉行径。
Does the situation call for military intervention?
当前的形势是否需要军事干涉？
it would be inappropriate for me to interfere
我干涉将是不恰当的
Don\'t interfere in my private affairs,mom, I\'m eighteen years old.
不要干涉我的私事了，妈妈，我十八岁了。
The president\' power can not go across into judiciary territory.
总统无权干涉司法领域。
The Iranian supreme leader accused western countries in interference in internal affairs of Iran.
Yīlǎng zuìgāo lǐngdǎorén zhǐzé xīfāng guójiā gānshè yīlǎng nèizhèng。
伊朗最高领导人指责西方国家干涉伊朗内政。
He was constantly interfering in her life, lecturing her, ordering her about.
Tā zǒngshì gānshè tā de shēnghuó，duì tā zhǐshǒuhuàjiǎo，zhǐhuī de tuántuánzhuàn。
他总是干涉她的生活，对她指手画脚，指挥得团团转。
He had no intention of interfering with the case.
Tā wúyì gānshè cǐshì。
他无意干涉此事。
Why doesn\'t he just shut up and stop poking his nose in other\'s business?
Wèishénme tā bú bìzuǐ，bú qù gānshè qítā rén de shì？
为什么他不闭嘴，不去干涉其他人的事？
Shareholders were precluded from intervening in the ordinary business of the company.
Gǔdōngmen bùnéng gānshè gōngsī de rìcháng yèwù。
股东们不能干涉公司的日常业务。
Unlike champerty, criminal maintenance does not necessarily involve personal profit.
Yǔ bāngsùzuì bùtóng，fēifǎ gānshè sùsòng bìng bú bìrán shèjí gèrén lìyì。
与帮诉罪不同，非法干涉诉讼并不必然涉及个人利益。
They had an agreement that they would not interfere in each other\'s business.
Tāmen dáchéngle yí xiàng xiéyì，bǎozhèng shuāngfāng zhījiān bù gānshè duìfāng de shēngyi。
他们达成了一项协议，保证双方之间不干涉对方的生意。

hù bùgānshè nèizhèng
noninterference in each other\'s internal affairs

这位蒙医的医术非常高超，治愈了很多病人。

目前并没有特效药能够治愈这种慢性病。

Till now, there is no specific drugs for this kind of chronic disease.
病治愈后要防止复发。
Bìngzhìyùhòu yào fángzhǐfùfā。

他的病情每况愈下，治不好了。

经过三个月的治疗，这个运动员终于伤愈复出了。

After three month’s treatment, the sportsman finally recovered and can reappear.
治愈许多疑难病症。
Mental illnesses can be cured, and almost always are.
Jīngshen jíbìng kěyǐ zhìyù，érqiě jīhū dōu kěyǐ zhìyù。
精神疾病可以治愈，而且几乎都可以治愈。
The rise of AIDS and other deadly diseases along with armed conflicts and social tension make treating leprosy in Africa difficult.
在非洲，武装冲突、社会动荡外加上艾滋病和其它致命疾病的激增使得治愈麻风病变得非常困难。
This modern treatment will cure leprosy in six to twelve months.
这种先进的治疗手段能在六至十二个月内治愈麻风病。
Alzheimer disease is no longer untreatable.
阿耳茨海默氏病不再是无法治愈的了。
Most skin cancers are completely curable, especially if detected in the early stages.
Dàbùfèn pífū\'ái shì wánquán kěyǐ zhìyù de，yóuqíshì zǎoqī fāxiàn。
大部分皮肤癌是完全可以治愈的，尤其是早期发现。
Most skin cancers are completely curable, especially if detected in the early stages.
Dàbùfèn pífū\'ái shì kěyǐ wánquán zhìyù de，yóuqí rúguǒ zài zǎoqī fāxiàn。
大部分皮肤癌是可以完全治愈的，尤其如果在早期发现。
The problems of curing cancer have not yet been solved.
Zhìyù áizhèng de nántí mùqián hái méiyǒu jiějué。
治愈癌症的难题目前还没有解决。
Her sister faces a race against time to find a cure.
Wèile zhǎodào zhìyù de fāngfǎ，tā de jiějie miànlínzhe yì chǎng yǔ shíjiān de sàipǎo。
为了找到治愈的方法，她的姐姐面临着一场与时间的赛跑。
His acne problem has cleared up.
Tā de cuóchuāng yǐjīng zhìyù le。
他的痤疮已经治愈了。
This principle might cure for chronic underemployment.
Zhège yuánzé kěnéng zhìyù mànxìng bùzú。
这个原则可能治愈慢性不足。
Seventy-nine percent were completely cured of their symptoms.
Tāmen de bǎifēnzhī qīshíjiǔ zhèngzhuàng bèi chèdǐ zhìyù le。
他们的79%症状被彻底治愈了。
Early detection can often lead to a cure.
Jí zǎo fāxiàn wǎngwǎng kěyǐ zhìyù。
及早发现往往可以治愈。
The incision is healed.
Dāokǒu yǐjīng zhìyù。
刀口已经治愈。
The patient appears cured.
Bìngrén kàn shàngqù yǐjīng bèi zhìyù le。
病人看上去已经被治愈了。
a stubborn cold
慢伤风(指久治不愈者)
This treatment repaired my health.
Zhè zhǒng zhìliáo fāngfǎ shǐ wǒ quányù le。
这种治疗方法使我痊愈了。
两国之间的争夺愈演愈烈。
Liǎng guó zhījiān de zhēngduó yùyǎnyùliè。
The rivalry between the two countries is becoming increasingly acute.
The policy failed to stay the spread of smuggled alcohol.
警方没能遏止愈演愈烈的酒类走私。
局势愈来愈恶化。
Júshì yù lái yù èhuà。
The situation is getting worse and worse.
因河口急骤缩小，洪水流势愈来愈大。

变得愈加模糊
biàn de yùjiā móhu 
become even more indistinct
几个月不见，她愈加消瘦了。
Jǐgè yuè bújiàn，tā yùjiā xiāoshòu le。
In the several months since I last saw her she\'s become even thinner.
年轻时他就我行我素，上了年纪愈加固执。
Niánqīng shí tā jiù wǒxíngwǒsù，shàngle niánjì yùjiā gùzhí。
He was set in his ways when he was young, and as he got older he became increasingly stubborn.
对故土的恋情愈加深厚。
脸色愈加严肃。
雨下得愈加大了。
When you project an image, you project an intensified version of the original.
Dāng nǐ shèxiǎng yí fù tú shí，nǐ jiù huì yùjiā gòuxiǎng chū yuánshǐ zhuàngtài。
当你设想一副图时，你就会愈加构想出原始状态。
Hard working puts years on him.
Fánzhòng de gōngzuò shǐ tā biàn de yùjiā cānglǎo le。
繁重的工作使他变得愈加苍老了。
When he recovered, the athlete had decided to stop fencing.
Zhè míng yùndòngyuán quányù zhīhòu，tā juédìng búzài cānjiā jījiàn yùndòng。
这名运动员痊愈之后，他决定不再参加击剑运动。

伤口很快愈合了。
Shāngkǒu hěn kuài yùhé le。
The wound healed quickly.
你的伤口快愈合时会有刺痒的感觉，千万不要抓。
Nǐ de shāngkǒu kuài yùhé shí huì yǒu cìyǎng de gǎnjué，qiānwàn búyào zhuā。
While the wound is getting better, it will feel a little itchy but you must not scratch it.
这是一种可吸收式缝合线，术后愈合快，不易留疤痕。

The wound will heal by itself.
伤口会自己愈合的。
Only a clean wound can heal rapidly and without infection.
Zhǐyǒu méi shòu gǎnrǎn de shāngkǒu cáinéng xùnsù de yùhé。

My nose piercing is closing up.

The wounds were skinning over now.

The wound is healing slowly.
Shāngkǒu zhèngzài mànmàn yùhé。

He checked whether the wound had healed improperly.

The wounds were coapted.

伤口愈合了。

Jīngguò sāngè yuè de zhìliáo，zhège yùndòngyuán zhōng yú shāngyù fùchū le。
After three month’s treatment, the sportsman finally recovered and can reappear.
病治愈后要防止复发。
Bìngzhìyùhòu yào fángzhǐfùfā。
After an illness is cured, you must prevent it from recurring.
母已痊愈，惟体力尚未恢复。
Mǔ yǐ quányù，wéi tǐlì shàngwèi huīfù。
Mother\'s well now, but she hasn\'t fully recovered her strength yet.
真理愈辩愈明。
Zhēnlǐ yù biàn yù mínɡ。
The more truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.
他们愈是捣乱，就失败得愈惨。
Tāmen yù shì dǎoluàn，jiù shībài de yù cǎn。

局势愈来愈恶化。
Júshì yù lái yù èhuà。
The situation is getting worse and worse.
愈多愈好
yù duō yù hǎo

Shānlù yù zǒu yù dǒu。 
The mountain path becomes steeper and steeper as you go up.

Shìbīngmen yùzhànyùyǒng。
The more the soldiers fought the braver they became.

Chī zhège fāngzi，bāoguǎn nǐ sāntiān quányù。

病愈出院
bìnɡyù chūyuàn 
be discharged from hospital after recovery
他的病情每况愈下，治不好了。

她还没有痊愈。
Tā hái méiyǒu quányù。

痊愈
quányù
fully recover from an illness; be fully recovered

In ancient times, smallpox was hard to cure.
他脸色蜡白，像是大病初愈。
Tā liǎnsè làbái，xiàng shì dàbìng chūyù。
He looks ashen. It looks like he just recovered from a severe illness.
这位蒙医的医术非常高超，治愈了很多病人。
Zhèwèi méngyī de yīshù fēicháng gāochāo，zhìyù le hěnduō bìngrén。
This doctor of traditional Mongolian medicine is highly skillful, and has cured many patients.
这个医生曾经治愈了很多病人，真是妙手回春呀！
Zhège yīshēng céngjīng zhìyù le hěnduō bìngrén，zhēnshì miàoshǒuhuíchūn ya！
This doctor has cured lots of patients. He really effects a miraculous cure, and brings the dying back to life.
经过三个月的治疗，这个运动员终于伤愈复出了。
Jīngguò sāngè yuè de zhìliáo，zhège yùndòngyuán zhōng yú shāngyù fùchū le。
After three month’s treatment, the sportsman finally recovered and can reappear.
一场车祸使他五中俱伤，足足休养了半年才痊愈。
Yìcháng chēhuò shǐ tā wǔ zhōng jùshāng，zúzú xiūyǎng le bànnián cái quányù。
He injured his viscera in a car accident, and it took him half a year to recover.
听说下疳是一种特别难以治愈的性病。
Tīngshuō xiàgān shì yìzhǒng tèbié nányǐ zhìyù de xìngbìng。
It is said that hard chancres are a kind of syphilis that is hard to cure.
遗传性心脏病很难治愈。
Yíchuánxìng xīnzàngbìng hěn nán zhìyù。
It is hard to treat genetic heart disease.
昨天去求了药王菩萨，希望他的病早点痊愈。
Zuótiān qù qiú le yàowáng púsà，xīwàng tā de bìng zǎo diǎn quányù。
I prayed to the medicine king bodhisattva that he can recover soon.
这个老中医能治愈各种疑难杂症。
Zhège lǎo zhōng yī néng zhìyù gèzhǒng yínán zázhèng。
The old doctor of traditional Chinese medicine is able to cure all kinds of difficult and complicated diseases.
现在世界各国之间的竞争愈益白热化。
Xiànzài shìjiègèguó zhījiān de jìngzhēng yùyì báirèhuà。
Nowadays, competition between every country has become increasingly white-hot.
3个月的疗程过后，他的病终于得以治愈。
Sāngèyuè de liáochéng guòhòu，tā de bìng zhōngyú déyǐ zhìyù。
After three months of treatment, his illness is finally cured.
这是一种可吸收式缝合线，术后愈合快，不易留疤痕。

他说自己的中耳炎很难痊愈。

He said his otitis media is hard to cure.
目前并没有特效药能够治愈这种慢性病。
mùqián bìng méiyǒu tèxiàoyào nénggòu zhìyù zhèzhǒng mànxìngbìng。

After he recovered he went back to work.
她大病初愈，身子还有些软弱。
Tā dà bìng chū yù，shēnzi hái yǒuxiē ruǎnruò。
She\'s just getting over a serious illness, and she\'s still quite weak.
几个月不见，她愈加消瘦了。
Jǐgè yuè bújiàn，tā yùjiā xiāoshòu le。
In the several months since I last saw her she\'s become even thinner.
大病初愈，你要好好营养一下身体。
Dà bìng chūyù，nǐ yào hǎohǎo yíngyǎng yíxià shēntǐ。
When recovering from a serious illness, you have to nourish your body well.
年轻时他就我行我素，上了年纪愈加固执。

to go from bad to worse
每况愈下

病愈出院
bìnɡyù chūyuàn 
be discharged from hospital after recovery
他脸色蜡白，像是大病初愈。
Tā liǎnsè làbái，xiàng shì dàbìng chūyù。
He looks ashen. It looks like he just recovered from a severe illness.
病治愈后要防止复发。
Bìngzhìyùhòu yào fángzhǐfùfā。

她大病初愈，身子还有些软弱。

大病初愈，你要好好营养一下身体。

有人把乌鸦的叫声当作凶兆。

乌云低垂。
Wūyún dīchuí。
Black clouds hang low.
乌云满天。
Wūyún mǎntiān。
The sky is overcast with dark clouds.
凝重的乌云
níngzhòng de wūyún
heavy (or thick) black clouds
乌云散了。
Wūyún sàn le。
Dark clouds dispersed.
月落乌啼。
Yuèluò wūtí。
The crows caw when the moon goes down.
乌亮的头发
wūliàng de tóufà 
dark, glossy hair; raven locks
一双乌溜溜的眼睛
yìshuāng wūliūliū de yǎnjing
sparkling, black eyes
那本小说里全是些乌七八糟的东西。
Nà běn xiǎoshuō lǐ quán shì xiē wūqībāzāo de dōngxi。

diū wūshāmào

gǎo de wūyānzhàngqì

wūyǒuxiāng

乌云遮天。
Wūyún zhētiān。
Black clouds blotted out the sky. or The sky was covered with dark clouds.
随着乌云的消散，月亮逐渐显露出来了。
Suí zhe wūyún de xiāosàn，yuèliangzhújiàn xiǎnlù chūlái le。
As the dark clouds dispersed, the moon gradually came into view.
乌云压顶。
Wūyún yādǐng。
Dark clouds hung overhead.

wūguī

乌云
wūyún
black clouds; dark clouds
乌鸦报丧是一种迷信的说法。
Wūyā bàosàng shì yìzhǒng míxìn de shuōfǎ。
It is superstition that crows can predict death.
天空中布满了乌云，恐怕要下雨了。
Tiānkōng zhōng bùmǎn le wūyún，kǒngpà yào xiàyǔ le。
With all the dark clouds in the sky, it looks like it will rain.
老奶奶正在向孩子们讲踆乌的传说。
Lǎonǎinai zhèngzài xiàng háizimen jiǎng cūnwū de chuánshuō。
The old grandma is telling the children a legend of an imaginary golden bird that has three feet and lives in the sun.
天空乌云翻搅奔腾，眼看着就要下雨了。
Tiānkōng wūyún fānjiǎo bēnténg，yǎn kàn zhe jiùyào xiàyǔ le。
With dark clouds whirling in the sky, it looks like it\'s going to rain.
天边乌云翻卷，好像快要下雨了。
Tiānbiān wūyún fānjuǎn，hǎo xiàng kuàiyào xiàyǔ le。
With dark clouds whirling in the sky, it looks like it\'s going to rain.
狐狸的眼睛骨碌碌地转着，想着怎么得到乌鸦嘴里的那块肉。
Húli de yǎnjīng gǔlùlù de zhuàn zhe，xiǎng zhe zěnme dédào wūyā zuǐ lǐ de nà kuài ròu。
With eyeballs rolling, the fox is thinking about how to get the piece of meat from the crow\'s mouth.
天空刚才还是乌云密布，霎时就下起雨来了。
Tiānkōng gāngcái hái shi wūyúnmìbù，shàshí jiù xià qǐ yǔ lái le。
Black clouds are blotting out the sky, and it will soon pour.
大同这个地方由于盛产乌金而闻名。
Dàtóng zhège dìfāng yóuyú shèngchǎn wūjīn ér wénmíng。
Da tong is famous for its rich coal reserves.
老中医在他的脸上涂上乌金，说是可以治腮炎。
Lǎo zhōng yī zài tā de liǎnshàng túshàng wūjīn，shuō shì kěyǐ zhì sāiyán。
The old herbalist doctor applied ink to his face, saying that it could treat parotitis.
这个村子大约80%的村民都姓乌喇。
Zhège cūnzi dàyuē bǎifēnzhī bāshí de cūnmín dōu xìng wūlǎ。
&quot;Wula&quot; is the surname of over 80% of the villagers.
环城河里稀稀落落地停着几只乌篷船。
Huánchénghé lǐ xīxīluòluò de tíng zhe jǐ zhī wūpéngchuán。
Several dark mat boats were scattered on the moat.
他摔了一跤，脸摔得乌青。
Tā shuāi le yì jiāo，liǎn shuāi de wūqīng。
He fell, and bruised his face.
神话中妖怪出现的时候总是风云变色，乌兔无光。
Shénhuà zhōng yāoguài chūxiàn de shíhou zǒngshì fēngyún biànsè，wūtù wúguāng。
In legendary stories the moon loses its light, and the sky changes color.
乌鱼蛋含有大量蛋白质，一向被视为海味珍品。
Wūyúdàn hányǒu dàliàng dànbáizhì，yí xiàng bèi shìwéi hǎiwèi zhēnpǐn。
The cuttlefish\'s egg gland contains a lot of protein, and is regarded as a choice seafood.
乌鲗遇到危险的时候会喷出黑色液体。
Wūzéi yùdào wēixiǎn de shíhou huì pēnchū hēisè yètǐ。
The cuttlefish spurts out dark ink when it is in danger.
你怎么在人家墙上留下这么多乌痕？
Nǐ zěnme zài rénjia qiáng shàng liúxià zhèmeduō wūhén？
How can you leave so many stains on other people\'s wall.
面对子虚乌有的诽谤，我感到很苦恼。
Miànduì zǐxū wūyǒu de fěibàng，wǒ gǎndào hěn kǔnǎo。
I felt quite distressed at being untruthfully slandered.
朋友送我一支巴乌。
Péngyou sòng wǒ yìzhī bāwū。
A friend gave me a bawu.
金乌坠，不知不觉已是黄昏时分了。
Jīnwūzhuì，bùzhībùjué yǐ shì huánghūnshífēn le。
The sun is setting and it is dusk now.
他真是爱屋及乌，竟然喜欢上了女友听的音乐。
Tā zhēnshì àiwūjíwū，jìngrán xǐhuanshàngle nǚyǒu tīngde yīnyuè。
This really is a case of love me, love my dog. Now he\'s suddenly started to like his girlfriend\'s music.

Wūyún sàn le。
The dark clouds scattered.
别抽烟了，弄得房间里乌烟瘴气的。

我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？
Wǒmen qiànxià de huánjìng de wūrǎn nièzhài，nándào yào děng xià yídài lái chánghuán ma?
Should the next generation pay for what we have done to the environment?
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.
环境污染是个全球性的问题。
Huánjìng wūrǎn shì gè quánqiúxìng de wèntí。
Environmental pollution is a world wide problem.
由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.
最近河水的色度有些偏黄，是不是附近存在污染源啊？
Zuìjìn héshuǐ de sèdù yǒuxiē piānhuáng，shì bùshì fùjìn cúnzài wūrǎnyuán a ？
Recently the chroma of the river water is a little yellowish. Does there exist any polluting sources nearby?
空气中有大量的有害微生物，造成了很严重的生物污染。
Kōngqì zhōng yǒu dàliàng de yǒuhài wēishēngwù，zàochéng le hěnyánzhòng de shēngwù wūrǎn。
There are a lot of harmful microorganisms in the air, causing serious biological pollution.
这个海域的水色是红的，肯定是被污染了。
Zhège hǎiyù de shuǐsè shì hóng de，kěndìng shì bèi wūrǎn le。
The color of water in this sea is red, so it must have been polluted.

We\'ve collected several water samples from this river, and analysis shows that there are different pollutants in different reaches.
这个地区的土壤污染非常严重，我们应尽早治理。
Zhège dìqū de tǔrǎng wūrǎn fēicháng yánzhòng，wǒmen yīng jìnzǎo zhìlǐ。

这些淫秽录像是你思想颓废的污染源！

The government has made great efforts to control water pollution.
政府作出很大努力来控制水污染。
The zoned area for public park was polluted by waste water.
这块划出来建公园的区域被废水污染了。
Dispose of that nulear waste properly or it will contaminate the groundwater.
必须妥善处理那些核废料，不然就会造成地下水污染。
The industrial wastes polluted the lake.
Gōngyè fèishuǐ wūrǎnle zhè zuò húpō。
工业废水污染了这座湖泊。
He believes that sewage is contaminating the water and driving them away.
Tā xiāngxìn wūshuǐ zhèngzài wūrǎn shuǐyuán，yě zài bǎ tāmen gǎnzǒu。
他相信污水正在污染水源，也在把它们赶走。
Air and water pollution are still serious problems in many developing countries.
在很多发展中国家，空气和水源污染仍是很严重的问题。
They make regular checks on the surrounding area for pollution levels.
Tāmen duì zhōuwéi dìqū de wūrǎn shuǐpíng jìnxíng dìngqī jiǎncè。
他们对周围地区的污染水平进行定期检测。
Farmers are reducing their use of chemical fertilisers to improve pollution levels.
Nóngmínmen zhèngzài jiǎnshǎo huàféi de shǐyòngliàng yǐ jiàngdī wūrǎn shuǐpíng。
农民们正在减少化肥的使用量以降低污染水平。
Don\'t drink the water--it\'s contaminated.
Bú yào yǐnyòng zhèli de shuǐ，tāmen bèi wūrǎn le。
不要饮用这里的水，它们被污染了。
Groundwater may become contaminated without our knowledge.
Wǒmen bù zhīdào dìxiàshuǐ kěnéng yǐ bèi wūrǎn。
我们不知道地下水可能已被污染。
This paper mill directly expires sewage to the river, causing a serious pollution.
这个造纸厂直接把污水排到河里，造成了严重污染。
This book is about carbon, nitrogen and sulphur pollutants and their determination in air and water.
Zhèběnshū jiǎng de shì tàn、dàn hé liú wūrǎnwù，yǐjí zài kōngqì hé shuǐzhōng duì qí de jiǎncè。
这本书讲的是碳、氮和硫污染物，以及在空气和水中对其的检测。
Lakes and reservoirs may have to be shut during the summer as increasing pollution.
Zài xiàjì wūrǎn zēngjiā shí，yìxiē húpō hé xùshuǐchí bèipò guānbì。
在夏季污染增加时，一些湖泊和蓄水池被迫关闭。
染指别国资源
rǎnzhǐ bié guó zīyuán
encroach on the resources of other countries
国家神圣领土不容他人染指。
Guójiā shénshèng lǐngtǔ bùróng tārén rǎnzhǐ。
Our territory is sacred and inviolable.
染了红指甲
rǎn le hóng zhǐjia
paint the fingernails red
&quot;染指&quot;这个词不能用成褒义。
集体财产不允许外人染指
拒绝超级大国染指本国事务。
A specific stain is one having a specific affinity for particular structural elements.
Tèyìrǎnsè shìzhǐ duì tèdìng jiégòu de yuánsù jùyǒu tèdìng qīnhélì de rǎnsè。
特异染色是指对特定结构的元素具有特定亲和力的染色。
He inked his finger.
Mòshuǐ rǎn hēi le tā de zhǐjia。
墨水染黑了他的指甲。
It is the most useful indicator of the presence of one of the TORCH virus infections.
Zhè shì duìyú yì zhǒng TORCH bìngdúgǎnrǎn cúnzài xìng zuì yǒuxiào de zhǐshìqì。
这是对于一种TORCH病毒感染存在性最有效的指示器。
A court has heard details of a former call girl\'s alleged sexual relationship with the accused.
法庭听取了那个女孩指控的细节，曾是应召女郎的她与被告有染。
这块布是我自己染织的。
Zhèkuài bùshì wǒ zìjǐ rǎnzhī de。
The piece of cloth was spun, printed and dyed by me.
她织染的布料相当精美。
Tā zhīrǎn de bùliào xiāngdāng jīngměi。
The clothes she weaves, and dyes are very exquisite.
To make a batik, you impress a design with wax.
Yào xiǎng zuò làrǎn zhīwù，nǐ bìxū yòng là yāyìn chū yì zhāng shèjìtú。
要想做蜡染织物，你必须用腊压印出一张设计图。
Madder lake is a textile dye extracted from the root of the madder plant.
茜草红素是从茜草根里提取的纺织染料。
Basic dyes have an affinity for wool and silk.
Jiǎnxìng rǎnliào duì máozhīpǐn hé sīzhīpǐn jùyǒu nínghé zuòyòng。
碱性染料对毛织品和丝织品具有凝合作用。
Trichromatic staining is the staining of tissue samples differentially in three colors.
Sānsèrǎnsè fǎ shì yòng sān zhǒng yánsè yǒu chāyì de duì zǔzhīyàngpǐn jìnxíng rǎnsè。
三色染色法是用三种颜色有差异地对组织样品进行染色。
This fabric is hand-dyed.
Zhè zhǒng zhīwù shì shǒurǎn de。
这种织物是手染的。
Indonesian fabrics are often batiked.
Yìndùníxīyà de zhīwù jīngcháng yòng làrǎn fāngshì chǔlǐ。
印度尼西亚的织物经常用蜡染方式处理。
Hair dyes contain a group of alcohols which are colorless, non-toxic and chemically indifferent to the dye and the hair.
Rǎnfàjì zhōng hányǒu yì zǔ wú sè wú dú de chún lèi wùzhì，tāmen duì rǎnliào hé tóufa de huàxuéfǎnyìng shì duòxìng de。
染发剂中含有一组无色无毒的醇类物质，它们对染料和头发的化学反应是惰性的。
This type of dyeing assistant can improve the color quality of the fabric.
这种染料助剂可以改善布料的颜色质量。
The smooth fabric of the underskirt took the dark green dye easily.
光滑的质地使得衬裙很容易染上深绿色染料。
染色体畸变。
Humans have 22 chromosome pairs plus two sex chromosomes.
Chúle liǎng gè xìngrǎnsètǐ zhīwài，réntǐ yǒu èrshíèr duì rǎnsètǐ。
除了两个性染色体之外，人体有22对染色体。
Double chromosomes can be found in every human being.
Zài měi gè rén shēnshàng dōu kěyǐ zhǎodào shuāngrǎnsètǐ。
在每个人身上都可以找到双染色体。
There have been recent advances in methods aimed at mapping chromosomal regions.
Zhēnduì rǎnsètǐ cèxù lǐngyù de fāngfǎ yǒule yìxiē xīn de jìnzhǎn。
针对染色体测序领域的方法有了一些新的进展。
The cell begins reduction by first separating its DNA chromosomes.
Xìbāo tōngguò shǒucì DNA rǎnsètǐ fēnlí kāishǐ jiǎnshù fēnliè。
细胞通过首次DNA染色体分离开始减数分裂。
Horse and donkey chromosomes are unable to pair up.
Mǎ hé lǘ de rǎnsètǐ bùnéng pèiduì。
马和驴的染色体不能配对。
Chromosomes exhibit characteristic bands.
Rǎnsètǐ chéngxiàn chū tèyǒu de duìbǐ tiáowén。
染色体呈现出特有的对比条纹。
The chemists could not nail the identity of the chromosome.
Huàxuéjiā wúfǎ quèdìng gāi rǎnsètǐ de shēnfèn。
化学家无法确定该染色体的身份。
Chromosomes are distributed by spindles in mitosis and meiosis.
Rǎnsètǐ shì tōngguò fǎngchuítǐ de yǒu sī fēnliè hé jiǎnshù fēnliè ér fēnpèi de。
染色体是通过纺锤体的有丝分裂和减数分裂而分配的。
The presence or absence of sex chromatin in cells obtained by amniocentesis makes it possible to determine the sex of a fetus.
Tōngguò jiǎnchá yóu yángmó qiāng chuāncìshù huòdé de xìbāo zhōngxìng rǎnsètǐ de yǒuwú kěyǐ quèdìng tāier de xìngbié。
通过检查由羊膜腔穿刺术获得的细胞中性染色体的有无可以确定胎儿的性别。
Mammals normally have two sex chromosomes.
Bǔrǔdòngwù zhèngcháng qíngkuàng xià yǒu liǎngzhǒng xìng rǎnsètǐ。
哺乳动物正常情况下有两种性染色体。
Translocations can result in serious congenital disorders.
Rǎnsètǐyìwèi kě dǎozhì yánzhòng de xiāntiānquēxiàn。
染色体易位可导致严重的先天缺陷。
Telomeres act as caps to keep the sticky ends of chromosomes from randomly clumping together.
Duānlì xiàng gè dǐng mào yíyàng zǔzhǐ rǎnsètǐ de niánxìng mòduān suíjī jùjí zài yìqǐ。
端粒像个顶帽一样阻止染色体的粘性末端随机聚集在一起。

This type of dyeing assistant can improve the color quality of the fabric.
这种染料助剂可以改善布料的颜色质量。
Indelible ink often consists entirely of synthetic dyes.
不褪色墨水一般均由合成染料构成。
Madder lake is a textile dye extracted from the root of the madder plant.
茜草红素是从茜草根里提取的纺织染料。
A blue dyestuff can be obtained from the woad plant.
菘蓝属植物可以造蓝色染料。
The smooth fabric of the underskirt took the dark green dye easily.
光滑的质地使得衬裙很容易染上深绿色染料。
The eggs were dipped in colored dye for the hunt.
Jīdàn pàozài cǎisè rǎnliào lǐ，yònglái wán zhǎo dàn yóuxì。
鸡蛋泡在彩色染料里，用来玩找蛋游戏。
You can create a dramatic effect when wood is colored with a wood dye.

给木头染上植物染料，你就可以创造出引人注目的效果。
Hair dyes contain a group of alcohols which are colorless, non-toxic and chemically indifferent to the dye and the hair.

A red dye was added to the solution.
Yì zhǒng hóngsè rǎnliào bèi jiārù róngyè zhōng。
一种红色染料被加入溶液中。
It is to be expected that quite a lot of dye will come out during the rinse.
Zài chōngxǐ de guòchéng zhōng xǔduō rǎnliào huì bèi xǐdiào，zhè shì xiāngdāng zhèngcháng de。
在冲洗的过程中许多染料会被洗掉，这是相当正常的。
These dyes and colors are guaranteed not to run.
Zhèxiē rǎnliào hé yánsè bǎozhèng búhuì shèn kāi。
这些染料和颜色保证不会渗开。
Basic dyes have an affinity for wool and silk.
Jiǎnxìng rǎnliào duì máozhīpǐn hé sīzhīpǐn jùyǒu nínghé zuòyòng。
碱性染料对毛织品和丝织品具有凝合作用。
The river was polluted with chemical waste from the factory.
Zhè tiáo hé bèi gōngchǎng de huàxué fèiliào wūrǎn le。
这条河被工厂的化学废料污染了。

The hairstylists will use a dye to color your hair.

这些发型设计师将使用一种颜料为你的头发染色。

必须妥善处理那些核废料，不然就会造成地下水污染。

The commencement speaker presented a forceful speech that impressed the students.

The fundamental measure for controlling infectious diseases is to cut the source of infection.
医院里的各种传染病人一定要隔离好，防止交叉感染。

Patients suffering from infectious diseases should be quarantined in case of cross-infection.

各种传染病的传播途径都不同。

The Ministry of Public Health denied the rumor, saying that there are no people affected by the Ebola virus in the mainland.

医学专家讲解了这一传染病的特点以及防治方法。

传染疾病的媒介

很多人到医院看病不敢用手去开门，生怕沾染到各种病的病原体。

Many people dare not to touch the doorknob when they enter a hospital for fear that they might be exposed to the protozoon of various disease.
很怕艾滋病传染
hěn pà àizībìngchuánrǎn
be in great fear of AIDS infection
鼻疽病传染严重，养家畜的家庭一定要做好防范。
Bíjūbìng chuánrǎn yánzhòng，yǎngjiāchù de jiātíng yídìng yào zuòhǎo fángfàn。
Farcinia is spreading seriously and those families which raise cattles must take measures against it.
这病不传染。
Zhè bìngbùchuánrǎn。
This disease is not contagious (or infectious).
并非所有的肝病都传染。
Bìngfēi suǒyǒu de gānbìng dōu chuánrǎn。

你的呼吸道感染是由冠状病毒引起的。

The infection in your respiratory tract is caused by a coronary virus.
果树的叶子卷缩了，是不是染上了什么病虫害？
Guǒshù de yèzi juǎnsuō le，shìbushì rǎnshàng le shénme bìngchónghài？

医生说他上呼吸道被病毒感染了，需要治疗。
Yīshēng shuō tā shànghūxīdào bèi bìngdú gǎnrǎn le，xūyào zhìliáo。
The doctor said his upper respiratory tract was infected, and needed treatment.
她家的小狗染上了囊尾虫病，只好带它去看兽医。
Tā jiā de xiǎogǒu rǎnshàng le nángwěichóngbìng，zhǐhǎo dài tā qù kàn shòuyī。

这病是通过飞沫传染的。

This kind of disease is transmitted by water droplets.
这个病症恐怕是由肠道感染引起的。

The infection spreads.

contract an infectious disease

这个病症恐怕是由肠道感染引起的。

他的伤口创面所在的位置是关节转弯处，容易感染，一定要小心处理。

His wound is at the moving point of the joint, so it can easily get infected and requires careful treatment.

In the Hall of Sakyamuni, smoke of incense curls up. It is unstained by an evil environment.

Tā huànyǒu jíxìng dǎndào gǎnrǎn。
He contracted an acute biliary duct infection.
他的咳嗽是由上呼吸道感染导发的。
Tā de késòu shì yóu shàng hūxīdào gǎnrǎn dǎofā de。
His cough was caused by an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
由于电子污染，我的手机信号不是很稳定。
Yóuyú diànzǐ wūrǎn，wǒ de shǒujī xìnhào búshì hěnwěndìng。
My cell phone can\'t receive stable electronic signals because of  electronic pollution.
二恶英污染奶粉肉类等食品的事件令人心惊。
Èr\'èyīng wūrǎn nǎifěn ròulèi děng shípǐn de shìjiàn lìngrén xīnjīng。
The reports on the contaminated milk powder and meat are really appalling.
这病是通过飞沫传染的。
Zhè bìng shì tōngguò fēimò chuánrǎn de。
This kind of disease is transmitted by water droplets.
这个工厂在治理粉尘污染方面下了不少功夫。
Zhège gōngchǎng zài zhìlǐ fěnchén wūrǎn fāngmiàn xià le bùshǎo gōngfu。
This plant paid great attention to dealing with dust pollution.
鸡鸭的浮尸把这条小河污染了。
Jīyā de fúshī bǎ zhètiáo xiǎohé wūrǎn le。
The river has been polluted by floating corpses of chickens and ducks.
并非所有的肝病都传染。
Bìngfēi suǒyǒu de gānbìng dōu chuánrǎn。
Not all kinds of liver disease are infectious.
你的呼吸道感染是由冠状病毒引起的。
Nǐ de hūxīdào gǎnrǎn shì yóu guānzhuàng bìngdú yǐnqǐ de。
The infection in your respiratory tract is caused by a coronary virus.
他把头发染成了褐色。
Tā bǎ tóufà rǎnchéng le hèsè。
He dyed his hair brown.
这个角色的身世在剧情的烘染下更加催人泪下了。
Zhège juésè de shēnshì zài jùqíng de hōngrǎn xià gèngjiā cuīrén lèixià le。
Ignited by instinct, the characters experiences were all the more moving.
这片湖沼很靠近森林，因此没有受到很大的污染。
Zhè piàn húzhǎo hěnkàojìn sēnlín，yīncǐ méiyǒu shòudào hěndà de wūrǎn。
The lake is very close to the forest, thus it hasn\'t been polluted much.
客家人火炽的热情感染了每一位游客。

Hakka people\'s ardent enthusiasm influenced every visitor.
他激昂慷慨的演讲，感染了许多人。
Tā jīáng kāngkǎi de yǎnjiǎng，gǎnrǎn le xǔduō rén。
His passionate speech influenced many people.
他和这帮流氓在一起的时间长了，渐染了一些坏的习气。
Tā hé zhè bāng liúmáng zài yìqǐ de shíjiān cháng le，jiànrǎn le yìxiē huài de xíqì。
Having been together with this group of hooligans, he has developed some bad habits.
果树的叶子卷缩了，是不是染上了什么病虫害？
Guǒshù de yèzi juǎnsuō le，shìbushì rǎnshàng le shénme bìngchónghài？
The leaves of the fruit trees are folding and shrinking, is it because of some plant diseases or insect pests?
这个城市的空气污染情况，经过治理已经好多了。
Zhège chéngshì de kōngqì wūrǎn qíngkuàng，jīngguò zhìlǐ yǐjing hǎo duō le。
The air pollution in this city has been reduced and controlled, and now the environment is much better.
农民赖以生存的土地就这样被污染毁掉了！
Nóngmín làiyǐ shēngcún de tǔdì jiù zhèyàng bèi wūrǎn huǐdiào le！
The land on which farmers rely for existence has been destroyed by pollution.
医生的检查报告显示他的皮肤已经感染了螨虫。

The examination report of the doctor reveals that his skin is infected with mites.
她家的小狗染上了囊尾虫病，只好带它去看兽医。

Her dog was infested cysticercus. She has to take it to see a veterinarian.
油漆没干呢，黏糊糊的，小心别染到衣服上！

The paint is wet, it\'s sticky, be careful not to get your clothes stained.

Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？

The Ministry of Public Health denied the rumor, saying that there are no people affected by the Ebola virus in the mainland.

Cànlàn de qiūguāng rǎnhóng le fēngyè。
The maple leaves are aflame with brilliant autumnal sunshine.

染色染得好。

Tā yě ǒurán jiān rǎn shàng le fēnghán hé ěrduo gǎnrǎn。

他说得直截了当。

你不用客气，有什么事情就直截了当地说吧。

你就把事情的经过直截了当地告诉我吧！

Shāowēi zài ròu shàng sǎ diǎn rénzào huángyóu。
稍微在肉上洒点人造黄油。
Our bodies jumped nervously away at the slightest touch.
Shāowēi yǒu yìdiǎndiǎn jiēchù，wǒmen de shēntǐ jiù huì běnnéng de bìkāi。
稍微有一点点接触，我们的身体就会本能地避开。
Some gentle arm-twisting produced the desired result.

We recommenced his reading after a short nap.

粗心大意是他的老毛病。
Cūxīndàyì shì tā de lǎomáobìng。
Carelessness is an old weakness of his.
麻痹粗心是产生事故的原因。
Mábì cūxīn shì chǎnshēngshìgù de yuányīn。
Carelessness is the cause of accidents.
由粗心大意造成的错误
yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù 
mistakes due to carelessness
与其说是粗心大意，不如说是不负责任。
Yǔqí shuō shì cūxīndàyì，bùrú shuō shì bú fù zérèn。
It\'s not so much carelessness as irresponsibility.
粗心
cūxīn
careless; thoughtless
你不能把事情都归罪于客观原因，你的粗心大意才是主要原因。
Nǐ bùnéng bǎ shìqing dōu guīzuì yú kèguān yuányīn，nǐ de cūxīn dàyì cáishì zhǔyào yuányīn。
You can\'t find objective reasons to blame for everything. Your carelessness was the main cause of this incident.
他做什么事情都这么忙叨，总是粗心大意的。
Tā zuò shénme shìqing dōu zhème mángdāo，zǒngshì cūxīn dàyì de。
He\'s always preoccupied when doing everything, and is always careless.
你这样粗心，会把文件皱折坏的！
Nǐ zhèyàng cūxīn，huì bǎ wénjiàn zhòuzhé huài de！
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
粗心导致她没考好。
Cūxīn dǎozhì tā méikǎohǎo。
Because of her carelessness she failed the exam.
他责怪孩子太粗心。
Tā zéguài háizǐ tài cūxīn。
He accused the child of being thoughtless.
他太粗心，把信上的地址写错了
他不但埋怨别人，也埋怨自己太粗心。
心太粗
a case of carelessness
粗心大意的一例
to be taxed with negligence
因粗心大意而受到责备
Don\'t be so careless in your work next time.
下次工作时不要那么粗心。
Must you be so careless?
你偏要这么粗心吗？
Mom is too uncareful to bring the money.
妈妈太粗心大意以至于忘了带钱。
His carelessness is demonstrated by his messy house.
他凌乱的家表明他是个粗心的人。
It is careless of you to neglect your son of his medicine-taking.
你太粗心了，竟然忘记给你儿子吃药。
Carelessness is a vice in his characteristics.
粗心是他的一个缺点。
No mother will hire a careless babysitter.
Méiyǒu mǔqīn huì pìnqǐng cūxīn de bǎomǔ。
没有母亲会聘请粗心的保姆。
I have been known to make a careless error every now and then.
Dàjiā dōu zhīdào wǒ zǒngshì shíbùshí fàn xiē cūxīn de cuòwù。
大家都知道我总是时不时犯些粗心的错误。
The negligent mother was demanded to court by the Department of Family Services.
Nàgè cūxīn de māma bèi jiātíng fúwùbù yāoqiú gào shàng fǎtíng。
那个粗心的妈妈被家庭服务部要求告上法庭。
Many cats have been exposed by careless owners.
Xǔduō māo bèi cūxīn de zhǔrén qì yú hùwài。
许多猫被粗心的主人弃于户外。
Ownership and occupation of property hold many pitfalls for the unwary.
Duìyú cūxīnzhě láishuō，cáichǎn suǒyǒuquán hé jūzhùquán yǒu hěn duō xiànjǐng。
对于粗心者来说，财产所有权和居住权有很多陷阱。
Mistakes are being issued from carelessness.
Cuòwù yīn cūxīn ér shēng。
错误因粗心而生。
His carelessness could have caused an ecological upset.
Tā de cūxīn-dàyì kěnéng zàochéngle yí cì shēngtài pòhuài。
他的粗心大意可能造成了一次生态破坏。
It was a careless mistake.
Zhè shì yí cì cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù。
这是一次粗心大意造成的错误。
He did his work negligently.
Tā gōngzuò shí cūxīndàyì。
他工作时粗心大意。
He\'s the most unaware person I\'ve known.
Tā shì wǒ suǒ zhīdào de zuì cūxīndàyì de rén。
他是我所知道的最粗心大意的人。
His disorientation was the result of inattention.
Tā de míshīfāngxiàng shì cūxīn de jiéguǒ。
他的迷失方向是粗心的结果。

wǎnkǒu cūxì de gāngguǎn 
steel tubes as big as the mouth of a bowl
这样粗细的沙子最合适。
Zhèyàng cūxì de shāzi zuì héshì。
Sand this fine will be just right.
庄稼长得好坏，也要看活儿的粗细。
Zhuāngjia zhǎng de hǎohuài，yě yào kàn huór de cūxì。
Whether the crops grow well or not depends also on how the work is done.
粗粮细粮搀和着吃
cūliáng xìliáng chānhuo zhe chī

粗粮细粮一样吃，别那么娇气。

cūliángxì zuò
make delicacies out of coarse food grain

Yàomiàn tài cū le，zài mó xì diǎn。
The medicine powder is too coarse, keep grinding it.
我们整日吃得太精细了，吃点粗砺的也不错。

The girl sitting next me talks rough.
坐在我旁边的女孩说话很粗鲁。
a broad joke
粗俗(或下流)的笑话

cūfàng de bǐchù

cūfàng gēngzuò

绝不可粗心大意
jué bùkě cūxīndàyì
must on no account be negligent
粗心大意是他的老毛病。
Cūxīndàyì shì tā de lǎomáobìng。
Carelessness is an old weakness of his.
由粗心大意造成的错误
yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù 
mistakes due to carelessness
与其说是粗心大意，不如说是不负责任。
Yǔqí shuō shì cūxīndàyì，bùrú shuō shì bú fù zérèn。
It\'s not so much carelessness as irresponsibility.
你不能把事情都归罪于客观原因，你的粗心大意才是主要原因。
Nǐ bùnéng bǎ shìqing dōu guīzuì yú kèguān yuányīn，nǐ de cūxīn dàyì cáishì zhǔyào yuányīn。
You can\'t find objective reasons to blame for everything. Your carelessness was the main cause of this incident.
他做什么事情都这么忙叨，总是粗心大意的。
Tā zuò shénme shìqing dōu zhème mángdāo，zǒngshì cūxīn dàyì de。
He\'s always preoccupied when doing everything, and is always careless.
他粗黑的大手紧紧地握着车把。
Tā cūhēi de dàshǒu jǐnjǐn de wò zhe chēbǎ。
His rough and dark hands are grasping the handlebar firmly.
咱们是个大老粗，说话只会直来直去。
Zánmen shì gè dàlǎocū，shuōhuà zhǐhuì zhíláizhíqù。
As I\'m an uneducated person, I can only put this bluntly.
他的样子傻大黑粗，看着不像个文化人。
Tā de yàngzi shǎdàhēicū，kàn zhe bú xiàng gè wénhuàrén。
He looks clumzy and hulky, not like a well-educated man.

由粗心大意造成的错误
yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù 
mistakes due to carelessness
与其说是粗心大意，不如说是不负责任。
Yǔqí shuō shì cūxīndàyì，bùrú shuō shì bú fù zérèn。
It\'s not so much carelessness as irresponsibility.
咱们是个大老粗，说话只会直来直去。
Zánmen shì gè dàlǎocū，shuōhuà zhǐhuì zhíláizhíqù。
As I\'m an uneducated person, I can only put this bluntly.
粗鄙
cūbǐ
vulgar; coarse
粗心
cūxīn
careless; thoughtless
粗犷
cūguǎng
rough; rude; boorish
粗鲁
cūlǔ
rough; rude; boorish
粗梳毛纺
cūshūmáofǎng
woollen spinning
他吃相太难看了，给人感觉很粗鲁。
Tā chī xiàng tài nánkàn le，gěi rén gǎnjué hěncūlǔ。
He has bad table manners.
成天吃粗菜，今天改个样吧。
Chéngtiān chī cūcài，jīntiān gǎi gè yàng ba。
We eat common vegetables all the time, let\'s have something else for a change today.
粗泛的研究得不出什么有价值的成果。
Cūfàn de yánjiū débùchū shénme yǒu jiàzhí de chéngguǒ。
Nothing valuable can be obtained through cursory research.
他是粗纺毛料的工人。
Tā shì cūfǎng máoliào de gōngrén。
He is a textile worker whose job is to spin woolen yarn.
我这件粗纺花呢，既结实又暖和。
Wǒ zhèjiàn cūfǎng huāní，jì jiēshi yòu nuǎnhé。
My woolen clothes are not only durable, but also very warm.
粗放经营越来越不适应现在的科技时代了。
Cūfàng jīngyíng yuèláiyuè bú shìyìng xiànzài de kējì shídài le。
Extensive farming is becoming more and more unsuitable for the present technological era.
我们现在都不用粗肥了。
Wǒmen xiànzài dōu búyòng cūféi le。
We have all stopped using coarse fertilizer now.
你俩粗估出来的数字怎么差距这么大。
Nǐ liǎ cūgū chūlái de shùzì zěnme chājù zhème dà。
There is a huge disparity between the numbers you two roughly estimated.
他的性格粗憨，不会拐弯抹角。
Tā de xìnggé cūhān，búhuì guǎiwānmòjiǎo。
He is rough and straight-forward, and never beats about the bush.
他粗黑的大手紧紧地握着车把。
Tā cūhēi de dàshǒu jǐnjǐn de wò zhe chēbǎ。
His rough and dark hands are grasping the handlebar firmly.
他声音粗厚，说起话来像吼一样。
Tā shēngyīn cūhòu，shuōqǐhuàlái xiàng hǒu yíyàng。
His gruff and deep voice makes him sound like he\'s roaring.
他粗狂的行事作风得罪了不少人。
Tā cūkuáng de xíngshì zuòfēng dézuì le bùshǎo rén。
His undisciplined and wild style of behavior has offended a lot of people.
他好赌成性，把家产都卖光了，有粗砺充饥已经不错了。
Tā hàodǔ chéngxìng，bǎ jiāchǎn dōu màiguāng le，yǒu cūlì chōngjī yǐjing búcuò le。
After gambling became second nature, he sold out all the family property. Having only unpolished rice to allay hunger is pretty good for him.
我们整日吃得太精细了，吃点粗砺的也不错。
Wǒmen zhěngrì chī de tài jīngxì le，chī diǎn cūlì de yě búcuò。
As the grains we always eat are too fine, it is not bad to have some unpolished rice.
他性格粗莽，经常给家里惹祸。
Tā xìnggé cūmǎng，jīngcháng gěi jiā lǐ rěhuò。
He is boorish and rash, so he always brings trouble to his family.
他已经习惯了这种粗朴的生活。
Tā yǐjing xíguàn le zhèzhǒng cūpǔ de shēnghuó。
He is used to this kind of simple and plain life.
这幅画中的人物粗朴健壮。
Zhèfúhuà zhōng de rénwù cūpǔ jiànzhuàng。
The figure in this painting is simple and sturdy.
只听一个粗涩的声音突然响起，“是谁在那儿呢？”
Zhǐ tīng yígè cūsè de shēngyīn tūrán xiǎngqǐ，“shì shéi zài nàr ne？”
Suddenly came a gruff and hoarse voice, &quot;Who is over there?&quot;
你们要做的就是把这些沙子中的粗沙筛出来。
Nǐmen yào zuò de jiùshì bǎ zhèxiē shāzi zhōng de cūshā shāi chūlái。
What you have to do is to remove the gravel from this sand.
装修的时候要选一些粗实的木头。
Zhuāngxiū de shíhou yào xuǎn yìxiē cūshí de mùtou。
When decorating, people should choose thick and solid wood.
看你粗手笨脚的，好好的杯子让你给打碎了。
Kàn nǐ cūshǒu bènjiǎo de，hǎohǎo de bēizi ràng nǐ gěi dǎsuì le。
You are so clumsy, you\'ve broken a cup.
经过粗选，有十名选手入围了决赛。
Jīngguò cūxuǎn，yǒu shí míng xuǎnshǒu rùwéi le juésài。
After the preliminary round, ten candidates remain for the final.
他用粗哑的声音唱起了那首老歌。
Tā yòng cūyǎ de shēngyīn chàngqǐ le nà shǒu lǎogē。
He began to sing that old song with his hoarse voice.
学生们在做粗盐提纯实验。
Xuéshēngmen zài zuò cūyán tíchún shíyàn。
Students are doing an experiment on crude salt purification.
她头发粗硬，很难打理。
Tā tóufa cūyìng，hěnnán dǎlǐ。
Her hair is too thick and stiff to tidy up.
对方的态度过于粗硬，我们只好暂时结束会谈。
Duìfāng de tàidu guòyú cūyìng，wǒmen zhǐhǎo zànshí jiéshù huìtán。
Due to the course manner of the other party, we have to temporarily stop the meeting.
这件家具的做工太粗拙了。
Zhèjiàn jiājù de zuògōng tài cūzhuō le。
The workmanship of this furniture is very poor.
小明的爸爸经常动粗打他。
Xiǎo Míng de bàba jīngcháng dòngcū dǎ tā。
Xiaoming often gets beaten by his father.
他是一个身材短粗的男人，但是穿着却非常讲究。
Tā shì yígè shēncái duǎncū de nánrén，dànshì chuānzhuó què fēicháng jiǎngjiu。
He is a man of stout figure but is very fastidious about his clothing.
你不能把事情都归罪于客观原因，你的粗心大意才是主要原因。
Nǐ bùnéng bǎ shìqing dōu guīzuì yú kèguān yuányīn，nǐ de cūxīn dàyì cáishì zhǔyào yuányīn。
You can\'t find objective reasons to blame for everything. Your carelessness was the main cause of this incident.
荞麦是一种抗寒农作物，富含粗纤维和多种营养。
Qiáomài shì yìzhǒng kànghán nóngzuòwù，fùhán cūxiānwéi hé duōzhǒng yíngyǎng。
Buckwheat is a kind of cold-resistant crop containing coarse fiber and is very nourishing.
他做什么事情都这么忙叨，总是粗心大意的。
Tā zuò shénme shìqing dōu zhème mángdāo，zǒngshì cūxīn dàyì de。
He\'s always preoccupied when doing everything, and is always careless.
他的样子傻大黑粗，看着不像个文化人。
Tā de yàngzi shǎdàhēicū，kàn zhe bú xiàng gè wénhuàrén。
He looks clumzy and hulky, not like a well-educated man.
药面太粗了，再磨细点。
Yàomiàn tài cū le，zài mó xì diǎn。
The medicine powder is too coarse, keep grinding it.
过去人们吃的粗粮成了现代都市人的珍馐。
Guòqù rénmen chī de cūliáng chéng le xiàndài dūshì rén de zhēnxiū。
The coarse grain people ate in the past have became delicacies in modern cities.
几年不见，这棵树的枝干长粗了不少。
Jǐ nián bújiàn，zhè kē shù de zhīgàn zhǎngcū le bùshǎo。
The trunk of this tree has grown thicker within these past years.
他喜欢在粗糙的纸面上写字。
Tā xǐhuan zài cūcāo de zhǐmiàn shàng xiězì。
He likes to write on rough papers.
你这样粗心，会把文件皱折坏的！
Nǐ zhèyàng cūxīn，huì bǎ wénjiàn zhòuzhé huài de！
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
他们厂只能对工业品进行粗加工。
Tāmen chǎng zhǐnéng duì gōngyèpǐn jìnxíng cū jiāgōng。
Their factory can only perform preliminary processing for industrial products.
粗知一二
cūzhī yī\'èr
have a sketchy understanding
他态度粗暴。
Tā tàidùcūbào。
He has a rough manner.
粗心导致她没考好。
Cūxīn dǎozhì tā méikǎohǎo。
Because of her carelessness she failed the exam.
粗略的分类
cūluède fēnlèi
rough classification
粗犷
cūguǎng
rough and uncouth
粗茶淡饭，糊弄着吃吧。
Cūchádànfàn，hùnòngzhe chī bā.
It\'s just simple fare, but I hope it will do.
粗鲁
cūlǔ
coarse
粗野
Cūyě
rough
他责怪孩子太粗心。
Tā zéguài háizǐ tài cūxīn。
He accused the child of being thoughtless.
我将译文和原文粗粗对了一遍。
这棵树足有两抱粗。
粱则无矣，粗则有之

粗粮细粮花搭着吃。

这种粗俗广告让人看了添堵。

这篇文章写得很粗陋

粗犷剽悍。
财大气粗。
他这个人气粗，得罪了不少人。
粗暴而又强横。
上下一般粗。
这种毛料手感粗糙。
粗纱筒管。
你是文人，我是大老粗。
原作较粗糙。

她粗鲁地离开了他。

Thee speaks harshly.
你说话太粗鲁。
a thick pipe
粗管
She is slender, whereas he is stout.
她很瘦弱，而他却又粗又壮。
a rude appraisal
粗略的评价
rudeness savoring of contempt
带有轻蔑的粗鲁
Rudeness is about the only thing I don\'t like about him.
粗俗无礼是我唯一不喜欢他的地方。
He is so rude, he behaves like an animal.
他太粗鲁了，简直就像个野兽。
He subjected himself to a poor diet.
他饱受粗茶淡饭之苦。
He can have some very good points, even if he is rude most of the time.
虽然他大多数时候都很粗鲁，但还是有些优点的。
The headline is in bold print.
标题用的是粗体字。
A wild guy suddenly fired a shotgun.
yī gè hěn cū bào de jiā huǒ tū rán kāi le yī qiāng
一个很粗暴的家伙突然开了一枪
The girl sitting next me talks rough.
坐在我旁边的女孩说话很粗鲁。
His skin was rough and weather beaten from years of working the land under harsh conditions.
长年在环境恶劣的土地上工作，他的皮肤因饱经风霜而变得很粗糙。
The texture of this cloth is too rough to be used for children\'s clothing.
这中布料质地粗糙，不适合制作儿童服装。
My mother does not support rude behavior.
我妈妈不能忍受粗鲁的行为。
The porter was so rude that he didn\'t tip him.
他没有付小费，因为看门人很粗鲁。
In this kind of document, we use a specific bold type.
在这种文档中，我们使用一种特殊的粗体字。
Don\'t be so careless in your work next time.
下次工作时不要那么粗心。
She has to endure much cruel treatment from her boyfriend.
她不得不忍受男友的粗暴对待。
While climbing in the mountains, you need thick ropes.
爬山的时候你需要一条粗绳子。
The brush enables fine details to be painted with thin or thick paint.
画笔的功用在于可使下笔处有粗有细。
A yellow card system will be used to monitor unsportsmanlike behavior, rough play and improper conduct.
黄牌警告制度是对那些没有运动精神的行为，粗野行为和不恰当行为的一种监督。
in bold
[TYP] 用粗体字
Must you be so careless?
你偏要这么粗心吗？
roughly speaking
粗略地说
I\'m sorry I was so short with you.
对不起，我对你太粗暴无礼了。
it\'s 20 cm thick
有20厘米粗
She bought this miserable handicraft from the old lady.
她从那个老太太手里买下了这件粗劣的手工艺品。
This man is very rude. He punches people when he gets angry.
这个人很粗野，他一生气就打人。
This is just a rude sketch and I will show you a detailed one tomorrow.
这只是张粗略的草图，明天我会给你张详细的图。
Mom is too uncareful to bring the money.
妈妈太粗心大意以至于忘了带钱。
George Biley is not a ordinary yokel.
乔治·贝利不是一个普通的粗人。
His carelessness is demonstrated by his messy house.
他凌乱的家表明他是个粗心的人。
The draft statement failed to make the masses understand.
大众没有理解这个粗略的声明。
This novel reads more like it was manufactured.
这本小说越读越有粗制滥造的嫌疑。
It is careless of you to neglect your son of his medicine-taking.
你太粗心了，竟然忘记给你儿子吃药。
Only a few people possess the remotest idea of the facts.
只有少数人对这些事实粗知一二。
Her features were thick but in perfect proportion and harmony.
她的相貌有些粗俗，但各部分之间显得优美和谐。
His robust behavior offended everyone at the party.
他粗野的行为惹恼了晚会上的每个人。
Carelessness is a vice in his characteristics.
粗心是他的一个缺点。
His violent attitude irritated the crowd.
他粗暴的态度激怒了众人。
Dick suddenly changed from a well-behaved child into a loutish adolescent.
迪克突然从一个有礼貌的小孩变成一个粗野的少年。
This bus is not well-suited to rough roads.
这公共汽车不太适合跑粗糙的路。
People get rude and whiny when they are exhausted.
人们在精疲力竭的时候会变得粗野，爱发牢骚。
No mother will hire a careless babysitter.
Méiyǒu mǔqīn huì pìnqǐng cūxīn de bǎomǔ。
没有母亲会聘请粗心的保姆。
I have been known to make a careless error every now and then.
Dàjiā dōu zhīdào wǒ zǒngshì shíbùshí fàn xiē cūxīn de cuòwù。
大家都知道我总是时不时犯些粗心的错误。
Critics argue that the solvent was too fierce to use on such a delicate painting.
Pīpíngjiāmen chēng zhège fāngfǎ tài cūbào le bú shìhé shǐyòng zài zhèyàng jīngměi de huàzuò shàng。
批评家们称这个方法太粗暴了不适合使用在这样精美的画作上。
The negligent mother was demanded to court by the Department of Family Services.
Nàgè cūxīn de māma bèi jiātíng fúwùbù yāoqiú gào shàng fǎtíng。
那个粗心的妈妈被家庭服务部要求告上法庭。
Many cats have been exposed by careless owners.
Xǔduō māo bèi cūxīn de zhǔrén qì yú hùwài。
许多猫被粗心的主人弃于户外。
The bold lettering jumps out at the reader.
Cūtǐ zì zài dúzhě miànqián tūxiǎn chūlái。
粗体字在读者面前突显出来。
The texture came out sounding rough and strange.
Zhèzhǒng hùnzá de lè tiáo tīng qǐlái yòu cūyě yòu gǔguài。
这种混杂的乐调听起来又粗野又古怪。
He has thick arms and a thicker neck.
Tā yǒuzhe jiēshi de bìbǎng hé cūzhuàng de bógěng。

Tā bǎ gùshi jiǎng de hěn cūsú，zàizuò de rén dōu gǎnjǐn bìkāi le。
他把故事讲得很粗俗，在座的人都赶紧避开了。
Their frolic in the surf threatened to become ugly.
Tāmen zài chōnglàng guòchéng zhōng de xīnào yǒu biàn de cūsú de wēixiǎn。
他们在冲浪过程中的嬉闹有变得粗俗的危险。
His cavelier curtness of manner was exasperating.
Tā cūlǔ qīngshuài de jǔzhǐ ràng rén nǎonù。
他粗鲁轻率的举止让人恼怒。
财大气粗。
The sleekness of his appearance reminded me of his financial successes.
Tā huózhuāng de guāngxiān gàosu wǒ tā cáidàqìcū。
他着装的光鲜告诉我他财大气粗。
最小公倍数
zuìxiǎo gōngbèishù
least (or lowest) common multiple
The least common multiple of 12 and 18 is 36.
12 hé 18 de zuì xiǎo gōngbèishù shì 36。
12和18的最小公倍数是36。
The city\'s population density has grown twofold over the last ten years.
Chéngshì de rénkǒumìdù yǐjīng zài guòqù shínián zēngjiāle liǎngbèi。
城市的人口密度已经在过去十年增加了两倍。
工作量加倍的发给双薪
gōngzuòliàng jiābèi de fāgěi shuāngxīn
give double pay for double work
With a fraction of sympathy, we would reap double gratitude.
我们付出一份同情心，收获的将是双倍的感激。
I prayed the boss\'s approval of my project by promising double turnover.
我承诺会得到双倍的利润，希望老板批准我的项目。
He hit a few doubles during the game.
Tā zài bǐsài zhōng dǎchūle jǐ gè shuāngbèi défēn。
他在比赛中打出了几个双倍得分。
I can tell the difference between a flat and a double flat notation.
Wǒ kěyǐ fēnbié jiàng bànyīn fúhào yǔ shuāngbèi jiàng bànyīn fúhào zhījiān de qūbié。
我可以分别降半音符号与双倍降半音符号之间的区别。
If you want it done in half the time , you\'ve got to have twice as many people.
Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng yòng yì shíjiān wánchéng tā，nǐ jiùyào shuāngbèi shùliàng de rén。
如果你想用一时间完成它，你就要双倍数量的人。
这个联动装置使我们的工作事半功倍。
Zhège liándòng zhuāngzhì shǐ wǒmen de gōngzuò shìbàngōngbèi。
The linkage equipment makes our work get twice the result with half the effort.
事半功倍
shìbàngōngbèi
get twice the result with half the effort
把&quot;事半功倍&quot;说成&quot;事倍功半&quot;，满拧！
事半功倍
事半功倍
宜其事倍而功半。
十倍
shí bèi
ten times; tenfold
二的五倍是十。
Èr de wǔ bèi shì shí。
Five times two is ten.
十是五的两倍。
Shí shì wǔ de liǎng bèi。
Ten is twice as much as five.
什(十倍)则围之。
to profit tenfold
获取十倍的利润
This brand is 10 times better than the one you like.
这个牌子比你喜欢的那个要好十倍。
Four times three equals twelve.
Sì de sān bèi děngyú shí\'èr。
四的三倍等于十二。
The city\'s population density has grown twofold over the last ten years.
Chéngshì de rénkǒumìdù yǐjīng zài guòqù shínián zēngjiāle liǎngbèi。
城市的人口密度已经在过去十年增加了两倍。
股价已经长了三倍，你还不打算卖？
Gǔjià yǐjing zhǎng le sān bèi，nǐ hái bùdǎsuàn mài？
The stock price has tripled, don\'t you plan to sell it?
他倍道兼程，终于在第三天赶了回来。
Tā bèidào jiānchéng，zhōng yúzàidìsān tiān gǎn le huílái。
He doubled his speed and finally made his way back on the third day.
销售额成倍乃至两倍、三倍地增长。也说乃至于。
to be treble the amount/size of sth
是某物数量/大小的三倍

这个国家的工业产量是我们的三倍。

Human triploid fetuses are usually spontaneously aborted.

最小公倍数
zuìxiǎo gōngbèishù
least (or lowest) common multiple
公倍数
12 is a common multiple of 2,3,4, and 6.
12是2、3、4和6的公倍(数)
The least common multiple of 12 and 18 is 36.
12 hé 18 de zuì xiǎo gōngbèishù shì 36。
12和18的最小公倍数是36。

The land price in Shanghai has increased  several times in the last few years.
出口项目去年增加了一倍。
Chūkǒu xiàngmù qùnián zēngjiāle yíbèi。
Export items doubled last year.
国民收入按不变价格计算增加了 1．31 倍。
Guómín shōurù àn bú biàn jiàgé jìsuàn zēngjiā le yīdiǎnsānyī bèi。
At constant prices, national income increased by 1.31 times.
干劲倍增。
产量倍增
力量倍增。
产量成倍增加。
客运量成倍增长。
身价倍增。
科技投入成倍增加。
销售额成倍乃至两倍、三倍地增长。也说乃至于。
随着环保意识、健康意识的增强，各种绿色食品倍受欢迎。
The tax rate will be multiplied up at the end of the year.
Shuìlǜ zài niándǐ jiāng huì chéngbèi zēngzhǎng。
税率在年底将会成倍增长。
He managed to multiply his profits.
Tā shèfǎ shǐ tā de lìrùn búduàn bèizēng。
他设法使他的利润不断倍增。
The good news sent her spirits aloft.
Zhège hǎoxiāoxī lìng tā jīngshen bèizēng。
这个好消息令她精神倍增。
This multiplication of cells is a natural correlate of growth.
Xìbāo de bèizēng shì yí gè zìrán de zēngzhǎng guòchéng。
细胞的倍增是一个自然的增长过程。
The errors increased multiplicatively.
Cuòwù chéngbèi de zēngjiā
错误成倍地增加
An exponent is a mathematical notation indicating the power to which a number is to be raised.
Zhǐshù shì yí gè shùxué fúhào，biǎomíng shùzì zēng bèi de liàng。
指数是一个数学符号，表明数字增倍的量。
Manufacturing capacity is expected to increase three-folds by the end of this month.
Shēngchǎnnénglì yùjì zài běnyuè dǐ jiāng zēngjiā sān bèi。
生产能力预计在本月底将增加三倍。
He will double up on his bet.
Tā jiāng tā de dǔzhù zēngjiā yí bèi。
他将他的赌注增加一倍。
The university plans to more than double its students by building an additional campus.
Zhè suǒ dàxué jìhuà zài xiūjiàn yí zuò xiàoyuán，yǐbiàn shǐ xuésheng shùliàng zēngjiā yíbèi yǐshàng。
这所大学计划再修建一座校园，以便使学生数量增加一倍以上。
He acted illegitimately when he increased the rent fourfold.
Tā bǎ zūjīn zēngjiā sì bèi，qí zuòfǎ shì bù héfǎ de。
他把租金增加四倍，其做法是不合法的。
The  number of Category 4 and 5 hurricanes worldwide has nearly doubled over the past 35 years.
在过去的35年里，全世界4级、5级的飓风数量几乎增加了一倍。
The city\'s population density has grown twofold over the last ten years.
Chéngshì de rénkǒumìdù yǐjīng zài guòqù shínián zēngjiāle liǎngbèi。
城市的人口密度已经在过去十年增加了两倍。
The number of tigers have tripled in the past year.
Qùnián lǎohǔ de shùliàng zēngzhǎng le sān bèi。
去年老虎的数量增长了三倍。
The private school fees had suddenly doubled.
Sīlì xuéxiào shōufèi tūrán zēngjiāle yí bèi。
私立学校收费突然增加了一倍。
The gas expanded to twice its original volume.
Qìtǐ péngzhàng hòu，tǐjī zēngjiāle yí bèi。
气体膨胀后，体积增加了一倍。
The value of his stocks doubled during the past year.
Tā de gǔpiào jiàzhí zài qùnián zēngjiāle yí bèi。
他的股票价值在去年增加了一倍。
The dose is doubled.
Yàoliàng zēngjiāle yí bèi。
药量增加了一倍。
The population of this village increased sevenfold in the past 100 years.
Zài guòqù 100 nián lǐ，zhège cūnzhuāng de rénkǒu zēngzhǎng le qī bèi。
在过去100年里，这个村庄的人口增长了七倍。
The population of this town increased sixfold when gold was found in the surrounding hills.
Zìcóng zài zhōuwéi shānqiū shàng fāxiànle jīnzi zhīhòu，zhège zhèn shàng de rénkǒu zēngzhǎng le liù bèi。
自从在周围山丘上发现了金子之后，这个镇上的人口增长了六倍。
My investment has increased ninefold.
Wǒ de tóuzī yǐjīng zēngjiāle jiǔbèi。
我的投资已经增加了九倍。
The population increased tenfold.
Rénkǒu zēngzhǎng le 10 bèi。
人口增长了10倍。
The price increased twofold last year.
Qùnián jiàgé zēngzhǎng le liǎngbèi。

Their money increased a hundredfold.
Tāmen de qián zēngjiāle yìbǎi bèi。
他们的钱增加了一百倍。
Overcrowding made triple sessions necessary.
Rénshù guò duō，yīncǐ yǒu bìyào bǎ fǎtíng zēngzhì yuánlái de sān bèi。
人数过多，因此有必要把法庭增至原来的三倍。
It increased a millionfold.
Tā zēngzhǎng le yībǎiwàn bèi。
它增长了一百万倍。
Industrial prices had risen three times more quickly than agricultural ones.
Gōngyè chǎnpǐn zài jiàgé zēngzhǎng de sùdù shàng shì nóngyè chǎnpǐn de sānbèi。
工业产品在价格增长的速度上是农业产品的三倍。

zuìxiǎo gōngbèishù
least (or lowest) common multiple
牲畜存栏总头数比去年增加了一倍。

公倍数
The multiple of the share price increase could reach three times.
股票价格的上涨倍数可能达到三倍。
10 is a multiple of 5.
10是5的倍数。
12 is a common multiple of 2,3,4, and 6.
12是2、3、4和6的公倍(数)
If you want it done in half the time , you\'ve got to have twice as many people.
Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng yòng yì shíjiān wánchéng tā，nǐ jiùyào shuāngbèi shùliàng de rén。
如果你想用一时间完成它，你就要双倍数量的人。
36 is a multiple of 9.
36 shì 9 de bèishù。
36是9的倍数。
The least common multiple of 12 and 18 is 36.
12 hé 18 de zuì xiǎo gōngbèishù shì 36。
12和18的最小公倍数是36。

sì bèi 
four times; fourfold

Èr de wǔ bèi shì shí。

十是五的两倍。

There are rapids and dangerous shoals throughout the area, so boats must be navigated with the utmost care.

新机器的运转速度要快一倍，因而会大大降低成本。

The new machines will work twice as fast, thus greatly reducing costs.

Tā bèidào jiānchéng，zhōng yúzàidìsān tiān gǎn le huílái。
He doubled his speed and finally made his way back on the third day.
久居他乡遇到故人，他心中倍感亲切。

He felt extremely excited to meet his old friends after living in a foreign country for a long time.
这次考试难度较大，我们需要倍加努力。
Zhècì kǎoshì nándù jiàodà，wǒmen xūyào bèijiā nǔlì。
We need to work much harder to prepare for this difficult test.
这个高倍率显微镜是他们实验室刚买的。
Zhège gāobèilǜ xiǎnwēijìng shì tāmen shíyànshì gāng mǎi de。
Their lab recently got this microscope with magnifying power.
性格开朗的她一进公司就倍受欢迎。
Xìnggé kāilǎng de tā yí jìn gōngsī jiù bèishòu huānyíng。
With a cheerful personality, she has been well liked since the first day she joined company.
老板的支持和鼓励让他对工作信心倍增。

The support and encouragement from his boss doubled his confidence on the job.
她为自己的不孕而倍感苦恼。
Tā wèi zìjǐ de búyùn ér bèigǎn kǔnǎo。
She is depressed by her inability to get pregnant.
近几年，这里居民的收入成倍增长。

In recent years, the revenue of the citizens has increased remarkably.
这个低倍望远镜是他前年买的。
Zhège dībèi wàngyuǎnjìng shì tā qiánnián mǎi de。
He bought this low power telescope the year before last.
她不希望自己的理想都成为肥皂泡，所以加倍努力。
Tā bùxīwàng zìjǐ de lǐxiǎng dōu chéngwéi féizàopào，suǒyǐ jiābèi nǔlì。
She works hard to make her dreams come true.
用这架高倍望远镜可以看到月亮上的环形山。

You can see round mountains on the moon through this high-powered telescope.

His articles are abundant in content, and well received by the public.

His son was strong and mighty with a very healthy body.
这件事总是处理不了，让他倍感煎心。

He feels depressed, because he failed in dealing with this matter.

Zhège liándòng zhuāngzhì shǐ wǒmen de gōngzuò shìbàngōngbèi。
The linkage equipment makes our work get twice the result with half the effort.
要想成为人中龙凤，就要付出多倍的努力。

If you want to be a virtuous and talented person, you have to redouble your efforts.
今年牝牛的产奶量是去年同期的一倍。
Jīnnián pìnniú de chǎnnǎiliàng shì qùnián tóngqī de yíbèi。
The milk produced by the cows is twice that of last year in the same period.
再向前就是深谷了，你们一定要加倍小心！
Zài xiàng qián jiùshì shēngǔ le，nǐmén yídìng yào jiābèi xiǎoxīn ！
There is a deep valley ahead. You can\'t be too careful!
现在的军事武器不知要比旧式抬枪的威力大多少倍。
Xiànzài de jūnshì wǔqì bùzhī yào bǐ jiùshì táiqiāng de wēilì dà duōshǎo bèi。
Military weapons today are far more powerful than the jingalls of old times.
这次冒险吉凶未卜，你们都要加倍小心。
Zhècì màoxiǎn jíxiōng wèibǔ，nǐmén dōuyào jiābèi xiǎoxīn。
This adventure is unpredicable, you must take care of yourselves.
他细心地对她问寒问暖，令她倍受感动。
Tā xìxīn de duì tā wènhán wènnuǎn，lìng tā bèishòu gǎndòng。
He enquires about her well being with concern, which touches her a great deal.
物议让她倍感压力，精神几乎崩溃。
Wùyì ràng tā bèigǎn yālì，jīngshen jīhū bēngkuì。
Public censure puts her under great pressure to the extent of breaking down.
希有动物需要我们人类加倍去保护。
Xīyǒu dòngwù xūyào wǒmen rénlèi jiābèi qù bǎohù。
We need to protect the rare animals.
现在的物价水平，相当于建国初的10倍。
Xiànzài de wùjià shuǐpíng，xiāngdāngyú jiànguó chū de shíbèi。
The price level today is 10 times that of the early period of China\'s construction.
这个月效益工资都快是基本工资的两倍了。
Zhège yuè xiàoyì gōngzī dōu kuài shì jīběn gōngzī de liǎng bèi le。
The bonus pay for this month is almost twice that of the basic salary.
经过几年的发展，我的工资已经涨到原薪的3倍了。
Jīngguò jǐnián de fāzhǎn，wǒ de gōngzī yǐjing zhǎngdào yuánxīn de sānbèi le。
After increasing for several years, my salary has tripled.
上海的地价比前几年增涨了几倍。
Shànghǎi de dìjià bǐ qián jǐnián zēngzhǎng le jǐ bèi。
The land price in Shanghai has increased  several times in the last few years.
通过高倍太空望远镜可以清楚地看到宇宙尘。
Tōngguò gāobèi tàikōng wàngyuǎnjìng kěyǐ qīngchu de kàndào yǔzhòuchén。
Through high-power space telescopes, people can see cosmic dust clearly.
这本书的厚度是那本书的3倍。
Zhèběnshūde hòudù shì nà běnshūde sānbèi。
This book is three times thicker than that one.

Prices have doubled.
事半功倍
shìbàngōngbèi
get twice the result with half the effort
新政策出笼后，倍受抨击。
Xīnzhèngcè chūlónghòu，bèishòu pēngjī。
When the new policies came out, they were heavily criticized.
他身处他乡，倍感孤独。
Tā shēnchǔtāxiāng，bèigǎn gūdú。
When he\'s away from home he feels twice as lonely.
下个月油价可能加倍。
Xiàgè yuè yóujià kěnéng jiābèi.
Next month the price of oil may double.
值夜班要加倍警惕。
Zhíyèbān yào jiābèi jǐngtì.

Jīnnián de chǎnliàng shì qùnián de wǔbèi。
This year\'s output is five times last year\'s.
出口项目去年增加了一倍。
Chūkǒu xiàngmù qùnián zēngjiāle yíbèi。
Export items doubled last year.

宿命论者
sùmìnglùnzhě
a fatalist

màijīnɡ yúɡānyóu

燕麦
yànmài
oats
to feed oats to horses
用燕麦喂马

水果和燕麦粥是很好的早餐。

I don\'t like corn, particularly oat.

Oats grow best in the wetter, cooler parts of the country and are much more tolerant of poor, acid soils.
Yànmài zài zhège guójiā liángshuǎng duōyǔ de dìqū shēngzhǎng zuìhǎo，bìngqiě gèng néng dǐkàng pínjí suānxìng de tǔrǎng。
燕麦在这个国家凉爽多雨的地区生长最好，并且更能抵抗贫瘠酸性的土壤。
The grind of the oats will be an all day affair.
Mó zhèxiē yànmài xūyào gàn yì zhěngtiān。
磨这些燕麦需要干一整天。

Bǎ yànmài jiāgōng chéng cū mòfěn。

颗粒饱满的小麦
kēlì bǎomǎn de xiǎomài 
plump-eared wheat
这里小麦同水稻的年产量约为一与三之比。
Zhèlǐ xiǎomài tóng shuǐdào de niánchǎnliàng yuē wéi yī yù sān zhǐ bǐ。
Here the annual yield of wheat and rice is in a ratio of about one to three.
这儿小麦常年亩产三百公斤。
Zhèr xiǎomài chángnián mǔchǎn sānbǎi gōngjīn。
In this area the per mu yield of wheat for an average year is 300 kilograms.
小麦正在抽穗。
Xiǎomài zhèngzài chōusuì。
The wheat is in the ear.
除水稻外，我们还种棉花和小麦。
Chú shuǐdào wài，wǒmen hái zhòng miánhuā hé xiǎomài。
Besides rice, we grow cotton and wheat.
金黄的小麦在微风中荡漾。
Jīnhuáng de xiǎomài zài wēifēng zhōng dàngyàng。
The golden wheat rippled in the breeze.
小麦已经登场。
Xiǎomài yǐjing dēngcháng。
The wheat has been carried to the threshing ground.
这个地区最适宜种小麦。
Zhège dìqū zuì shìyí zhòng xiǎomài。
This area is most suitable for growing wheat.

shōugē xiǎomài

Xiǎomài zhǎng de hěn zhuózhuàng。
The wheat has grown sturdy.
今年的小麦又丰收了，我们应该扩大仓容了。
Jīnnián de xiǎomài yòu fēngshōu le，wǒmen yīnggāi kuòdà cāngróng le。
With a repeated good wheat harvest, we should enlarge our granaries space.
他把小麦茬子堆在了田埂边上。
Tā bǎ xiǎomàicházi duīzài le tiángěng biānshàng。
He piled the wheat stubble along the ridge of the fields.
赤霉菌的出现使小麦减产。

The appearance of gibberella has brought a reduction in wheat output.
在我们这儿，仍实行小麦、玉米单作。

Wheat and corn are the only crops planted in our region.
我们要做好防治小麦敌害的工作。

他收割完地里的玉米，开始准备冬小麦的播种。

He embarked on the preparations for planting winter wheat immediately after he had finished harvesting corn.
又到了忙碌的夏收时节，小麦该开割了。
Yòu dào le mánglù de xiàshōu shíjié，xiǎomài gāi kāigē le。
Another busy summer harvesting time has arrived. It is time to reap the wheat.
又到了小麦开镰的季节，农忙即将开始。

With the coming of the season for reaping wheat, the busy harvest season will start.
他家的羊又啃青了，啃掉的那些可都是越冬小麦啊！

xiǎomàiɡǎnxiùbìnɡ
wheat stem rust

xuǎnyù liángzhòngxiǎomài
develop improved varieties of wheat by selection

yí piàn yīnyīn nènlǜ de màimiáo

yǐnjìn xīn de xiǎomài pǐnzhǒng

màijiē

他望着那碧油油的麦田，心中满是喜悦。
Tā wàng zhe nà bìyóuyóu de màitián，xīn zhōng mǎn shì xǐyuè。
He was filled with joy when he looked at the green cornfield.
布谷鸟一叫，乡亲们都知道要割麦子了。
Bùgǔniǎo yí jiào，xiāngqīnmen dōu zhīdào yào gēmàizi le。
The farmers know it is time to reap their crops when the cuckoo sings.
今年的小麦又丰收了，我们应该扩大仓容了。
Jīnnián de xiǎomài yòu fēngshōu le，wǒmen yīnggāi kuòdà cāngróng le。
With a repeated good wheat harvest, we should enlarge our granaries space.
他把小麦茬子堆在了田埂边上。
Tā bǎ xiǎomàicházi duīzài le tiángěng biānshàng。
He piled the wheat stubble along the ridge of the fields.
赤霉菌的出现使小麦减产。
Chìméijūn de chūxiàn shǐ xiǎomài jiǎnchǎn。
The appearance of gibberella has brought a reduction in wheat output.
这面是用春麦磨的，做出的馒头香甜可口。
Zhè miàn shì yòng chūnmài mó de，zuò chū de mántou xiāngtián kěkǒu。
This flour is made out of spring wheat and steamed bread made by the flour is very tasty.
在我们这儿，仍实行小麦、玉米单作。
Zài wǒmen zhèr，réng shíxíng xiǎomài、yùmǐ dānzuò。
Wheat and corn are the only crops planted in our region.
我们要做好防治小麦敌害的工作。
Wǒmen yào zuò hǎo fángzhì xiǎomài díhài de gōngzuò。
We should succeed in preventing and controlling insect pests of wheat.
他收割完地里的玉米，开始准备冬小麦的播种。
Tā shōugē wán dìlǐ de yùmǐ，kāishǐ zhǔnbèi dōngxiǎomài de bōzhòng。
He embarked on the preparations for planting winter wheat immediately after he had finished harvesting corn.
夏收时每天记工的方法是根据你打下的麦子的重量来记工分。
Xiàshōu shí měitiān jìgōng de fāngfǎ shì gēnjù nǐ dǎxià de màizi de zhòngliàng lái jì gōngfēn。
During the summer harvest, your working amount is measured by the weight of the wheat you have reaped.
我和哥哥用架子车装了一车麦子拉回家。
Wǒ hé gēge yòng jiàzichē zhuāng le yì chē màizi lā huíjiā。
My elder brother and I loaded the handcart with wheat and pulled it home.
这一片金晃晃的麦田真美啊。
Zhè yípiàn jīnhuǎnghuǎng de màitián zhēn měi a。
This golden field is so beautiful.
又到了忙碌的夏收时节，小麦该开割了。
Yòu dào le mánglù de xiàshōu shíjié，xiǎomài gāi kāigē le。
Another busy summer harvesting time has arrived. It is time to reap the wheat.
又到了小麦开镰的季节，农忙即将开始。
Yòu dào le xiǎomài kāilián de jìjié，nóngmáng jíjiāng kāishǐ。
With the coming of the season for reaping wheat, the busy harvest season will start.
荞麦是一种抗寒农作物，富含粗纤维和多种营养。
Qiáomài shì yìzhǒng kànghán nóngzuòwù，fùhán cūxiānwéi hé duōzhǒng yíngyǎng。
Buckwheat is a kind of cold-resistant crop containing coarse fiber and is very nourishing.
他家的羊又啃青了，啃掉的那些可都是越冬小麦啊！
Tā jiā de yáng yòu kěnqīng le，kěndiào de nàxiē kě dōushì yuè dōng xiǎomài a！
Their goats are eating winter wheat again.
明天就要开始耧播小麦了。
Míngtiān jiùyào kāishǐ lóubō xiǎomài le。
We should start sowing wheat with drills tomorrow.
今年的裸大麦收成很好，又是一个丰收年。
Jīnnián de luǒdàmài shōuchéng hěnhǎo，yòushì yígè fēngshōunián。
Highland barley has had another good harvest this year.
很多金黄色的麦草堆在了路边。
Hěnduō jīnhuángsè de màicǎo duīzài le lùbiān。
Plenty of golden wheat straw is piled on the roadside.
他这几天打算清理地里的麦茬儿。
Tā zhè jǐtiān dǎsuàn qīnglǐ dì lǐ de màichár。
He is going to clear away wheat stubble in the field.
在下雨之前一定要把麦垛收好，免得淋湿了。
Zài xiàyǔ zhīqián yídìng yào bǎ màiduò shōuhǎo，miǎndé línshī le。
Pile the grain stack before it rains, or it will get wet.
这种保健品是以麦饭石为原料制成的。
Zhèzhǒng bǎojiànpǐn shì yǐ màifànshí wéi yuánliào zhìchéng de。
The health products are made from medicinal stones.
孩子折了一截麦杆儿，在空地上比划着。
Háizi zhé le yì jié màigǎnr，zài kòngdìshàng bǐhuà zhe。
The child broke a straw of wheat and scratched on the clearing.
相比白酒而言，我更喜欢喝麦酒。
Xiāngbǐ báijiǔ éryán，wǒ gèng xǐhuan hē màijiǔ。
I prefer beer to liquor.
他正在用扫把清扫撒落在地上的麦糠。
Tā zhèngzài yòng sǎobǎ qīngsǎo sǎluòzài dìshàng de màikāng。
He is clearing wheat husk on the floor with a broom.
今年收割上来的麦粒非常饱满。
Jīnnián shōugē shànglái de màilì fēicháng bǎomǎn。
The grains of wheat are plump this year.
这些草帽都是用麦拵制成的。
Zhèxiē cǎomào dōushì yòng màicún zhìchéng de。
All these straw hats are made from the top of wheat straw.
这些小麦都在面坊里被加工成了面粉。

The wheat has been processed into flour in the flour mill.
现在这个季节正是小麦生长的盛期。

Now is the peak season for wheat.
收秋之后紧接着就要种麦，农忙时节就是这样一刻也不得清闲。
Shōuqiū zhīhòu jǐnjiē zhe jiùyào zhòngmài，nóngmáng shíjié jiùshì zhèyàng yíkè yě bùdé qīngxián。
Wheat has to be planted immediately after the autumn harvest, so there is no time for rest during the busy season.
我家都已经摊场了，他家的麦子还没收割完。
Wǒjiā dōu yǐjing tānchǎng le，tā jiā de màizi hái méi shōugē wán。
We have spread our wheat out to dry in the sun, but they haven\'t even finished reaping.

Tā zhèngzài yòng yàozi bǎ màizi kǔnbǎng qǐlái。

乡里新开了一家专门进行元麦深加工的工厂。

损失惨重
sǔnshī cǎnzhòng
suffer heavy (or grievous) losses
惨重失败
cǎnzhòngshībài 
a disastrous defeat
伤亡惨重
shāngwángcǎnzhòng
suffer heavy casualties

Both sides lost a lot in this bloody war.
旱魔使这个村庄损失惨重。

The severe drought caused heavy losses to the village.
今年这个村遭受了严重的涝害，百姓们损失惨重。

军队削平了叛乱，可伤亡惨重。
Jūnduì xuēpíng le pànluàn，kě shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
The army suppressed the insurrection at the cost of heavy casualties.
这场遭遇战打得十分艰苦，敌我双方伤亡惨重。

This contact battle is very hard. Both the enemy, and us have suffered heavy casualties.
