球迷们疯狂地争斗起来，看台倒坍，酿成惨祸。
Qiúmímen fēngkuáng de zhēngdòu qǐlái，kàntái dǎotān，niàngchéngcǎnhuò。
When the football fans got into a frenzied fight, the spectators\' stand collapsed and a horrible disaster occurred.
渡船翻了，一场惨剧发生了。
Dùchuán fān le，yìcháng cǎnjù fāshēng le。
The ferry capsized and a disaster occurred.
惨绝人寰的暴行
cǎnjuérénhuán de bàoxíng
an atrocity of unparalleled savagery
一场惨绝人寰的浩劫
yìcháng cǎnjuérénhuán de hàojié 
a holocaust tragic beyond compare
他听到这个不幸的消息，不禁惨然。
Tā tīngdào zhège búxìng de xiāoxi，bújīn cǎnrán。
He couldn\'t but feel deeply grieved at this sad news.
他惨死于车祸。
Tā cǎnsǐ yú chēhuò。
He died a tragic death in a traffic accident.
惨痛的教训
cǎntòng de jiàoxùn 
a bitter lesson
一起惨痛的事件
yì qǐ cǎntòng de shìjiàn 
a most distressing incident
遭受惨无人道的迫害
zāoshòu cǎnwúréndào de pòhài 
be subjected to inhuman persecution
损失惨重
sǔnshī cǎnzhòng
suffer heavy (or grievous) losses
惨重失败
cǎnzhòngshībài 
a disastrous defeat
伤亡惨重
shāngwángcǎnzhòng
suffer heavy casualties
一声爆炸，霎时间血肉横飞，其惨状不忍卒睹。
Yì shēngbàozhà，shàshíjiān xuèròuhéngfēi，qí cǎnzhuàngbùrěnzúdǔ。
A loud explosion sent flesh and blood flying in every direction—a sight too horrible to look at.
这座在战争中惨遭破坏的城市已经复原。
Zhèzuò zài zhànzhēng zhōng cǎnzāo pòhuài de chéngshì yǐjing fùyuán。
The city, which was destroyed in the war, has been restored.
悲惨的境遇
bēicǎn de jìngyù
a hard lot
悲惨的命运
bēicǎn de mìngyùn
a tragic lot
凄惨的声音
qīcǎn de shēngyīn
sad (or plaintive) cries
凄惨的景象
qīcǎn de jǐng xiàng
a heartrending sight
生活凄惨
shēnɡhuó qīcǎn
lead a wretched existence; lead a miserable life
千千万万的平民百姓在战争中惨遭杀害。
Qiānqiānwànwàn de píngmín bǎixìngzài zhànzhēng zhōng cǎn zāo shāhài。
Thousands upon thousands of civilians were slaughtered during the wars.
惨遭杀戮
cǎnzāo shālù
be massacred in cold blood
影片情节十分悲惨，观众无不为之感动。
Yǐngpiàn qíngjié shífēn bēicǎn，guānzhòngwúbú wèi zhī gǎndòng。
The film was so sad that none were unmoved.
惨淡经营
cǎndànjīngyíng
keep (an enterprise, etc.) going by painstaking effort; take great pains to carry on one\'s work under difficult circumstances
他怎么也没想到，会突然遇到如此惨变。
Tā zěnme yě méi xiǎngdào，huì tūrán yùdào rúcǐ cǎnbiàn。
He didn\'t expect to suffer such an unfortunate incident.
突然间他脸色惨变，浑身发抖。
Tūránjiān tā liǎnsè cǎnbiàn，húnshēn fādǒu。
Suddenly, his face changed colour and he trembled from head to toe.
这首诗充分表现出了作者惨怛的心情。
Zhèshǒushī chōngfèn biǎoxiànchū le zuòzhě cǎndá de xīnqíng。
This poem well shows his depression.
如此惨毒的刑罚，是应该被废止的。
Rúcǐ cǎndú de xíngfá，shì yīnggāi bèi fèizhǐ de。
Such a cruel penalty should be abolished.
不知从哪里传来了一声惨嚎，吓得他魂不附体。
Bùzhī cóng nǎlǐ chuánlái le yìshēng cǎnháo，xià de tā húnbúfùtǐ。
A miserable shout from nobody-knew-where scared him out of his wits.
地面上有一片惨红的血迹。
Dìmiàn shàng yǒu yípiàn cǎnhóng de xuèjì。
There is some rufous blood on the floor.
这件惨黄的上衣和她的气质不相配。
Zhèjiàn cǎnhuáng de shàngyī hé tā de qìzhì bùxiāngpèi。
This dark yellow coat doesn\'t match her strain.
诗人一路上看到了人民流离失所的惨景。
Shīrén yílùshàng kàndào le rénmín liúlíshīsuǒ de cǎnjǐng。
Along the way the poet witnessed the deplorable situation where people had been forced to leave their homes, and wander seeking refuge.
惨苦的生活使他失去了年轻人应有的朝气。
Cǎnkǔ de shēnghuó shǐ tā shīqù le niánqīngrén yīngyǒu de zhāoqì。
His gloomy life deprived him of young people\'s cheerful demeanor.
出现如此惨况，大家始料未及。
Chūxiàn rúcǐ cǎnkuàng，dàjiā shǐliào wèijí。
The people didn\'t expect such bad conditions.
惨厉的叫声惊醒了沉睡中的人们。
Cǎnlì de jiàoshēng jīngxǐng le chénshuì zhōng de rénmen。
The miserable shouting woke people from their sleep.
有时候，他会再次想起那惨烈的一幕。
Yǒu shíhou，tā huì zàicì xiǎngqǐ nà cǎnliè de yí mù。
Sometimes, he would remember that tragic and heroic scene.
刘胡兰牺牲得非常惨烈。
Liú Húlán xīshēng de fēicháng cǎnliè。
Liu Hulan died tragically and heroically.
经过一番惨烈的战斗，我军终于占领了敌人的阵地。
Jīngguò yì fān cǎnliè de zhàndòu，wǒ jūn zhōng yú zhānlǐng le dírén de zhèndì。
After an intense fight, our army finally conquered the enemy\'s position.
他一个人坐在门口，神情惨戚。
Tā yígèrén zuò zài ménkǒu，shénqíng cǎnqī。
He sat by himself in the doorway with a sad expression on his face.
离情惨切，他禁不住掉下泪来。
Líqíng cǎnqiè，tā jīnbúzhù diàoxiàlèilái。
He couldn\'t help shedding tears at the sad parting scene.
解放前，人民过着惨无天日的生活。
Jiěfàng qián，rénmín guò zhe cǎnwú tiānrì de shēnghuó。
Before liberation, people lead deplorable lives.
如此惨象，使人震惊。
Rúcǐ cǎnxiàng,shǐrén zhènjīng.
The people are shocked to see such a terrible scene.
这位英勇的人民警察惨遭歹徒的杀害。
Zhèwèi yīngyǒng de rénmín jǐngchá cǎnzāo dǎitú de shāhài。
This brave policeman was cruelly murdered by the scoundrels.
如今，这里的市场也是一片愁云惨雾。
Rújīn，zhèlǐ de shìchǎng yěshì yípiàn chóuyún cǎnwù。
Nowadays the market here is also gloomy.
战后的村子满目创痍，景象惨不忍睹。
Zhànhòu de cūnzi mǎnmù chuàngyí，jǐng xiàng cǎnbùrěndǔ。
Scenes of devastation were everywhere in the village after the war, so horrible that one could hardly bear to look at them.
这次喋血大战，双方都损失惨重。
Zhècì diéxuè dàzhàn，shuāngfāng dōu sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
Both sides lost a lot in this bloody war.
旱魔使这个村庄损失惨重。
Hànmó shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
The severe drought caused heavy losses to the village.
灾民越聚越多，呼饥号寒，其状甚惨。
Zāimín yuè jù yuè duō，hūjī háohán，qízhuàng shèncǎn。
The refugees population increased.  They groaned and cried because of starvation, presenting a miserable scene.
今年这个村遭受了严重的涝害，百姓们损失惨重。
Jīnnián zhège cūn zāoshòu le yánzhòng de làohài，bǎixìngmen sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
This year the village has suffered a serious water logging catastrophe. The common people have had heavy losses.
他被打得遍体鳞伤，惨不忍睹。
Tā bèi dǎ de biàntǐ línshāng，cǎnbùrěndǔ。
He was beaten black and blue, which was too horrible to look at.
昨天小区里闹贼了，听说被盗的那家损失惨重。
Zuótiān xiǎoqū lǐ nàozéi le，tīngshuō bèi dào de nàjiā sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
Burglars broke into the housing estate yesterday, I heard that that family suffered heavy losses.
枪战进行了一天一夜，双方都损失惨重。
Qiāngzhàn jìnxíng le yìtiān yí yè，shuāngfāng dōu sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
The gunfight endured all day long, both sides suffering heavy loss.
军队削平了叛乱，可伤亡惨重。
Jūnduì xuēpíng le pànluàn，kě shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
The army suppressed the insurrection at the cost of heavy casualties.
她冶容凄惨，令人怜惜。
Tā yěróng qīcǎn，lìngrén liánxī。
She has a bewitching appearance which arouses people\'s tender affections.
走近了看，这座哥特式建筑阴惨恐怖。
Zǒujìn le kàn，zhè zuò gētèshì jiànzhù yīncǎn kǒngbù。
Approaching nearer, the Gothic building is gloomy and heart-rending.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
这场遭遇战打得十分艰苦，敌我双方伤亡惨重。
Zhèchǎng zāoyùzhàn dǎ de shífēn jiānkǔ，díwǒ shuāngfāng shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
This contact battle is very hard. Both the enemy, and us have suffered heavy casualties.
几年的惨淡经营后，生意终于出现了转机。
Jǐniánde cǎndànjīngyíng hòu，shēngyi zhōngyú chūxiànle zhuǎnjī。
After several years\' hard work, the business finally turned around.
悲惨的下场

an old sailor in sad retirement ashore
一个在陆上过着悲惨的退休生活的老水手
a sorry sight
悲惨的光景，可怜的情景
a wan smile
惨淡的笑容
We have to keep the memory of Hiroshima and Nagasaki alive in order to avoid similar tragedies in the future.
我们要记得广岛和长崎事件，以避免将来再次发生类似惨剧。
During the war, the American army suffered great losses.
在这场战争中，美军损失惨重。
She was a sorry sight after the earthquake destroyed everything.
她一切都被地震毁掉了，非常悲惨。
Carl had an awful childhood, but it didn\'t make him bitter.
卡尔的童年很凄惨，但这并没有让他愤世嫉俗。
Our university suffered a bitter defeat in the last game against our rivals.
我们大学的校队在上一场与对手的交锋中遭遇惨败。
The CD and music industry are doing badly because of the recession.
因为经济衰退，光盘和音乐行业经营惨淡。
It\'s a poor do if they can\'t read the large signs.
如果他们连最大的标记都看不清，那可就惨了。

heavy casualties

to die a natural/violent death

悲惨景象
Early reports suggested that he would lose heavily.
早期报告显示出他会惨败。
Waul, what a tragic world!
啊！这个悲惨的世界！
Business competition can be fiendish at times.
商业竞争有时是很惨烈的。
There was heavy bloodshed in their first encounter at sea.
第一次海上冲突，他们双方都伤亡惨重。
Even the most dismal and unstable circumstances can become something to be clung to.
Jíshǐ zuì qīcǎn hé bù wěndìng de qíngkuàng yīrán kěyǐ chéngwéi zhídé jiānchí de qíngkuàng。
即使最凄惨和不稳定的情况依然可以成为值得坚持的情况。
Tragically, his beloved \'s coach was struck by lightning and she died.
Bēicǎn de shì，tā àiren de jiàochē zāodào léijī，tā búxìng shēnwáng。
悲惨的是，他爱人的轿车遭到雷击，她不幸身亡。
His tale was a sad one.
Tā de gùshi hěn qīcǎn。
他的故事很凄惨。
She died three years ago in a tragic fall down a flight of stairs.
Tā sǐ yú sān nián qián de yì chǎng lóutī tāntā de cǎnjù zhōng。
她死于三年前的一场楼梯坍塌的惨剧中。
The university was shocked at the tragic incident.
Dàxué rényuán dōu bèi zhè chǎng bēicǎn de shìgù zhènjīng le。
大学人员都被这场悲惨的事故震惊了。
No manager has looked more miserable of late than Gareth.
Zuìjìn，méiyǒu bǐ Jiāléisī kànshàngqù gèng bēicǎn de jīnglǐrén le。
最近，没有比加雷斯看上去更悲惨的经理人了。
What looks like a dead end may only be the result of personal weakness.
Nàxiē kànsì mìngzhōng zhùdìng de bēicǎn jìngdì，yěxǔ jǐnjǐn shì gèrén ruòdiǎn ér dǎozhì de jiéguǒ。
那些看似命中注定的悲惨境地，也许仅仅是个人弱点而导致的结果。
Can you imagine a worse fate than being condemned to listen to the endless trivia?
Nǐ néng xiǎngxiàng bǐ bèipò língtīng wú zhǐjìng de xùdāo gèng bēicǎn de mìngyùn ma？
你能想象比被迫聆听无止境的絮叨更悲惨的命运吗？
The company was in dark days with very heavy losses.
Gōngsī sǔnshī cǎnzhòng，chǔjìng jiānnán。
公司损失惨重，处境艰难。
The situation was tragic in the extreme.
Dāngshí de qíngkuàng zhēnshì jíqí bēicǎn。
当时的情况真是极其悲惨。
I tried to make it up to her, but failed miserably.
Wǒ xiǎng hé tā chóngguīyúhǎo， dàn què bēicǎn de shībài le。
我想和她重归于好，但却悲惨地失败了。
It\'s one in the eye for people who take pop music too seriously.
Duì nàxiē bǎ liúxíngyīnyuè kàn de tài rènzhēn de rén láishuō zhè zhēnshì yì chǎng cǎnbài。
对那些把流行音乐看得太认真的人来说这真是一场惨败。
She was Juliet to the life，poor，tragic Juliet.
Tā jiǎnzhí jiùshì Zhūlìyè zàishì，kělián bēicǎn de Zhūlìyè yā。
她简直就是茱丽叶在世，可怜悲惨的茱丽叶呀。
The shabby room struck her as extraordinarily pathetic.
Pòjiù de fángwū ràng tā juéde tèbié bēicǎn。
破旧的房屋让她觉得特别悲惨。
He came to a bad end.
Tā de jiéjú hěn cǎn。
他的结局很惨。
The play failed big at the box office.
Zhè bù xì piàofáng cǎnbài。
这部戏票房惨败。
The misery and wretchedness of those slums is intolerable.
Pínmínqū de rénmen guòzhe fēicháng bēicǎn de shēnghuó。
贫民区的人们过着非常悲惨的生活。
Our capital concern was to avoid defeat.
Wǒmen shǒuyào guānxīn de shì bìmiǎn cǎnbài。
我们首要关心的是避免惨败。
As he looks at the mess he has left behind he must wonder how the Brits so often managed to succeed in the kind of situation where he has so dismally failed.
Dāng tā kànzhe zìjǐ diū xià de yì duī làntānzǐ shí，kěndìng xiǎng zhīdào Yīngguórén shì rúhé jīngcháng zài xiàng tā zhèyàng cǎnbài de qíngkuàng xià shèfǎ chénggōng de。
当他看着自己丢下的一堆烂摊子时，肯定想知道英国人是如何经常在像他这样惨败的情况下设法成功的。
She wrote a book about her harsh experiences as a comfort woman.
Tā xiěle yì běn yǒuguān tā zuò wèi\'ānfù de cǎntòng jīnglì de shū。
她写了一本有关她做慰安妇的惨痛经历的书。
He has compiled a record second to none in its wretchedness.
Tā zài qí bēicǎn fāngmiàn chuàngxiàle wúrénqjí de jìlù。
他在其悲惨方面创下了无人企及的纪录。
The child\'s misery would move even the most obdurate heart.
Zhège háizi de bēicǎn zāoyù jíshǐ zuì lěngkù de xīncháng yě huì wéizhīdòngqíng。
这个孩子的悲惨遭遇即使最冷酷的心肠也会为之动情。
When you\'re alone Christmas is the pits.
Gūdān shí，Shèngdànjié shì yí jiàn zuì bēicǎn de shì。
孤单时，圣诞节是一件最悲惨的事。
We had long anticipated his cadaverous end.
Wǒmen zǎojiù yùjiàn dàole tā qīcǎn de jiéjú。
我们早就预见到了他凄惨的结局。
It was utter and complete balagan!
Zhè juéduì shì wánquán de cǎnbài！
这绝对是完全的惨败！
Politicians shed crocodile tears over the plight of the unemployed.
Zhèngkèmen miànduì shīyè rényuán de bēicǎn zhuàngkuàng liúxiàle xūjiǎ de yǎnlèi。
政客们面对失业人员的悲惨状况流下了虚假的眼泪。
He met his waterloo.
Tā zāoyùle cǎnbài。
他遭遇了惨败。
Her wan face suddenly flushed.
Tā cǎnbài de liǎn shàng tūrán fàn qǐ hóngyùn。
她惨败的脸上突然泛起红晕。
Waul, what a tragic world!

悲惨的遭遇

The film was so sad that none were unmoved.

悲惨景象

啊！这个悲惨的世界！

悲惨的是，他爱人的轿车遭到雷击，她不幸身亡。

What looks like a dead end may only be the result of personal weakness.

The situation was tragic in the extreme.

The child\'s misery would move even the most obdurate heart.

事已至此，何必再追询呢。
Shì yǐ zhìcǐ，hébì zài zhuīxún ne。
What\'s done is done, why keep on asking?

to ask sb\'s opinion

答复他的询问
dáfù tā de xúnwèn

ask us about our studies
询问病状
xúnwèn bìnɡzhuànɡ
inquire about sb.\'s illness
我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。

我向投递员询问有没有我的包裹。

There is an enquiry office at the company, you can go there if you have any questions.

She asked after you.
她询问你的情况(或她问候你)。

她向我询问有关你和你的家庭情况。

to ask sb the time
向某人询问时间
